44  module sfccyc_module
45  implicit none
46  save
47 !
48 ! grib code for each parameter - used in subroutines sfccycle and setrmsk.
49 !
50  integer kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdzor,kpdais,kpdtg3,kpdplr,kpdgla,
51  & kpdmxi,kpdscv,kpdsmc,kpdoro,kpdmsk,kpdstc,kpdacn,kpdveg,
52  & kpdvet,kpdsot
53  &, kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs
54  &, kpdsnd, kpdabs_0, kpdabs_1, kpdalb(4)
55  parameter(kpdtsf=11, kpdwet=86, kpdsno=65, kpdzor=83,
56 ! 1 kpdalb=84, kpdais=91, kpdtg3=11, kpdplr=224,
57  1 kpdais=91, kpdtg3=11, kpdplr=224,
58  2 kpdgla=238, kpdmxi=91, kpdscv=238, kpdsmc=144,
59  3 kpdoro=8, kpdmsk=81, kpdstc=11, kpdacn=91, kpdveg=87,
60 !cbosu max snow albedo uses a grib id number of 159, not 255.
61  & kpdvmn=255, kpdvmx=255,kpdslp=236, kpdabs_0=255,
62  & kpdvet=225, kpdsot=224,kpdabs_1=159,
63  & kpdsnd=66 )
64 !
65  integer, parameter :: kpdalb_0(4)=(/212,215,213,216/)
66  integer, parameter :: kpdalb_1(4)=(/189,190,191,192/)
67  integer, parameter :: kpdalf(2)=(/214,217/)
68 !
69  integer, parameter :: xdata=5000, ydata=2500, mdata=xdata*ydata
70  integer :: veg_type_landice
71  integer :: soil_type_landice
72 !
73  end module sfccyc_module
74  subroutine sfccycle(lugb,len,lsoil,sig1t,deltsfc
75  &, iy,im,id,ih,fh
76  &, rla, rlo, slmask,orog,orog_uf,use_ufo,nst_anl
77  &, sihfcs,sicfcs,sitfcs
78  &, swdfcs,slcfcs
79  &, vmnfcs,vmxfcs,slpfcs,absfcs
80  &, tsffcs,snofcs,zorfcs,albfcs,tg3fcs
81  &, cnpfcs,smcfcs,stcfcs,slifcs,aisfcs

84  &, sz_nml,input_nml_file
85  &, ialb,isot,ivegsrc,tile_num_ch,i_index,j_index)
86 !

88  use sfccyc_module

90  character(len=*), intent(in) :: tile_num_ch
91  integer,intent(in) :: i_index(len), j_index(len)
92  logical use_ufo, nst_anl

171  & monfcs, monmer, mondif, landice
172  character(len=*), intent(in) :: input_nml_file(sz_nml)
173 
174  integer num_parthds
175 !
176 ! variable naming conventions:
177 !
178 ! oro .. orography
179 ! alb .. albedo
180 ! wet .. soil wetness as defined for bucket model
181 ! sno .. snow depth
182 ! zor .. surface roughness length
183 ! vet .. vegetation type
184 ! plr .. plant evaporation resistance
185 ! tsf .. surface skin temperature. sea surface temp. over ocean.
186 ! tg3 .. deep soil temperature (at 500cm)
187 ! stc .. soil temperature (lsoil layrs)
188 ! smc .. soil moisture (lsoil layrs)
189 ! scv .. snow cover (not snow depth)
190 ! ais .. sea ice mask (0 or 1)
191 ! acn .. sea ice concentration (fraction)
192 ! gla .. glacier (permanent snow) mask (0 or 1)
193 ! mxi .. maximum sea ice extent (0 or 1)
194 ! msk .. land ocean mask (0=ocean 1=land)
195 ! cnp .. canopy water content
196 ! cv .. convective cloud cover
197 ! cvb .. convective cloud base
198 ! cvt .. convective cloud top
199 ! sli .. land/sea/sea-ice mask. (1/0/2 respectively)
200 ! veg .. vegetation cover
201 ! sot .. soil type
202 !cwu [+2l] add sih & sic
203 ! sih .. sea ice thickness
204 ! sic .. sea ice concentration
205 !clu [+6l] add swd,slc,vmn,vmx,slp,abs
206 ! swd .. actual snow depth
207 ! slc .. liquid soil moisture (lsoil layers)
208 ! vmn .. vegetation cover minimum
209 ! vmx .. vegetation cover maximum
210 ! slp .. slope type
211 ! abs .. maximum snow albedo
212 
213 !
214 ! definition of land/sea mask. sllnd for land and slsea for sea.
215 ! definition of sea/ice mask. aicice for ice, aicsea for sea.
216 ! tgice=max ice temperature
217 ! rlapse=lapse rate for sst correction due to surface angulation
218 !
219  parameter(sllnd =1.0,slsea =0.0)
220  parameter(aicice=1.0,aicsea=0.0)
221  parameter(tgice=271.2)
222  parameter(rlapse=0.65e-2)
223 !
224 ! max/min of fields for check and replace.
225 !
226 ! ???lmx .. max over bare land
227 ! ???lmn .. min over bare land
228 ! ???omx .. max over open ocean
229 ! ???omn .. min over open ocean
230 ! ???smx .. max over snow surface (land and sea-ice)
231 ! ???smn .. min over snow surface (land and sea-ice)
232 ! ???imx .. max over bare sea ice
233 ! ???imn .. min over bare sea ice
234 ! ???jmx .. max over snow covered sea ice
235 ! ???jmn .. min over snow covered sea ice
236 !
237  parameter(orolmx=8000.,orolmn=-1000.,oroomx=3000.,oroomn=-1000.,
238  & orosmx=8000.,orosmn=-1000.,oroimx=3000.,oroimn=-1000.,
239  & orojmx=3000.,orojmn=-1000.)
240 ! parameter(alblmx=0.80,alblmn=0.06,albomx=0.06,albomn=0.06,
241 ! & albsmx=0.80,albsmn=0.06,albimx=0.80,albimn=0.80,
242 ! & albjmx=0.80,albjmn=0.80)
243 !cwu [-3l/+9l] change min/max for alb; add min/max for sih & sic
244 ! parameter(alblmx=0.80,alblmn=0.01,albomx=0.01,albomn=0.01,
245 ! & albsmx=0.80,albsmn=0.01,albimx=0.01,albimn=0.01,
246 ! & albjmx=0.01,albjmn=0.01)
247 ! note: the range values for bare land and snow covered land
248 ! (alblmx, alblmn, albsmx, albsmn) are set below
249 ! based on whether the old or new radiation is selected
250  parameter(albomx=0.06,albomn=0.06,
251  & albimx=0.80,albimn=0.06,
252  & albjmx=0.80,albjmn=0.06)
253  parameter(sihlmx=0.0,sihlmn=0.0,sihomx=5.0,sihomn=0.0,
254  & sihsmx=5.0,sihsmn=0.0,sihimx=5.0,sihimn=0.10,
255  & sihjmx=5.0,sihjmn=0.10,glacir_hice=3.0)
256 !cwu change sicimn & sicjmn Jan 2015
257 ! parameter(siclmx=0.0,siclmn=0.0,sicomx=1.0,sicomn=0.0,
258 ! & sicsmx=1.0,sicsmn=0.0,sicimx=1.0,sicimn=0.50,
259 ! & sicjmx=1.0,sicjmn=0.50)
260 !
261 ! parameter(sihlmx=0.0,sihlmn=0.0,sihomx=8.0,sihomn=0.0,
262 ! & sihsmx=8.0,sihsmn=0.0,sihimx=8.0,sihimn=0.10,
263 ! & sihjmx=8.0,sihjmn=0.10,glacir_hice=3.0)
264  parameter(siclmx=0.0,siclmn=0.0,sicomx=1.0,sicomn=0.0,
265  & sicsmx=1.0,sicsmn=0.0,sicimx=1.0,sicimn=0.15,
266  & sicjmx=1.0,sicjmn=0.15)
267 
268  parameter(wetlmx=0.15,wetlmn=0.00,wetomx=0.15,wetomn=0.15,
269  & wetsmx=0.15,wetsmn=0.15,wetimx=0.15,wetimn=0.15,
270  & wetjmx=0.15,wetjmn=0.15)
271  parameter(snolmx=0.0,snolmn=0.0,snoomx=0.0,snoomn=0.0,
272  & snosmx=55000.,snosmn=0.001,snoimx=0.,snoimn=0.0,
273  & snojmx=10000.,snojmn=0.01)
274  parameter(zorlmx=300.,zorlmn=1.0,zoromx=1.0,zoromn=1.e-05,
275  & zorsmx=300.,zorsmn=1.0,zorimx=1.0,zorimn=1.0,
276  & zorjmx=1.0,zorjmn=1.0)
277  parameter(plrlmx=1000.,plrlmn=0.0,plromx=1000.0,plromn=0.0,
278  & plrsmx=1000.,plrsmn=0.0,plrimx=1000.,plrimn=0.0,
279  & plrjmx=1000.,plrjmn=0.0)
280 !clu [-1l/+1l] relax tsfsmx (for noah lsm)
281  parameter(tsflmx=353.,tsflmn=173.0,tsfomx=313.0,tsfomn=271.2,
282  & tsfsmx=305.0,tsfsmn=173.0,tsfimx=271.2,tsfimn=173.0,
283  & tsfjmx=273.16,tsfjmn=173.0)
284 ! parameter(tsflmx=353.,tsflmn=173.0,tsfomx=313.0,tsfomn=271.21,
285 !* & tsfsmx=273.16,tsfsmn=173.0,tsfimx=271.21,tsfimn=173.0,
286 ! & tsfsmx=305.0,tsfsmn=173.0,tsfimx=271.21,tsfimn=173.0,
287  parameter(tg3lmx=310.,tg3lmn=200.0,tg3omx=310.0,tg3omn=200.0,
288  & tg3smx=310.,tg3smn=200.0,tg3imx=310.0,tg3imn=200.0,
289  & tg3jmx=310.,tg3jmn=200.0)
290  parameter(stclmx=353.,stclmn=173.0,stcomx=313.0,stcomn=200.0,
291  & stcsmx=310.,stcsmn=200.0,stcimx=310.0,stcimn=200.0,
292  & stcjmx=310.,stcjmn=200.0)
293 !landice mods force a flag value of soil moisture of 1.0
294 ! at non-land points
295  parameter(smclmx=0.55,smclmn=0.0,smcomx=1.0,smcomn=1.0,
296  & smcsmx=0.55,smcsmn=0.0,smcimx=1.0,smcimn=1.0,
297  & smcjmx=1.0,smcjmn=1.0)
298  parameter(scvlmx=0.0,scvlmn=0.0,scvomx=0.0,scvomn=0.0,
299  & scvsmx=1.0,scvsmn=1.0,scvimx=0.0,scvimn=0.0,
300  & scvjmx=1.0,scvjmn=1.0)
301  parameter(veglmx=1.0,veglmn=0.0,vegomx=0.0,vegomn=0.0,
302  & vegsmx=1.0,vegsmn=0.0,vegimx=0.0,vegimn=0.0,
303  & vegjmx=0.0,vegjmn=0.0)
304  parameter(vmnlmx=1.0,vmnlmn=0.0,vmnomx=0.0,vmnomn=0.0,
305  & vmnsmx=1.0,vmnsmn=0.0,vmnimx=0.0,vmnimn=0.0,
306  & vmnjmx=0.0,vmnjmn=0.0)
307  parameter(vmxlmx=1.0,vmxlmn=0.0,vmxomx=0.0,vmxomn=0.0,
308  & vmxsmx=1.0,vmxsmn=0.0,vmximx=0.0,vmximn=0.0,
309  & vmxjmx=0.0,vmxjmn=0.0)
310  parameter(slplmx=9.0,slplmn=1.0,slpomx=0.0,slpomn=0.0,
311  & slpsmx=9.0,slpsmn=1.0,slpimx=0.,slpimn=0.,
312  & slpjmx=0.,slpjmn=0.)
313 ! note: the range values for bare land and snow covered land
314 ! (alblmx, alblmn, albsmx, albsmn) are set below
315 ! based on whether the old or new radiation is selected
316  parameter(absomx=0.0,absomn=0.0,
317  & absimx=0.0,absimn=0.0,
318  & absjmx=0.0,absjmn=0.0)
319 ! vegetation type
320  parameter(vetlmx=20.,vetlmn=1.0,vetomx=0.0,vetomn=0.0,
321  & vetsmx=20.,vetsmn=1.0,vetimx=0.,vetimn=0.,
322  & vetjmx=0.,vetjmn=0.)
323 ! soil type
324  parameter(sotlmx=16.,sotlmn=1.0,sotomx=0.0,sotomn=0.0,
325  & sotsmx=16.,sotsmn=1.0,sotimx=0.,sotimn=0.,
326  & sotjmx=0.,sotjmn=0.)
327 ! fraction of vegetation for strongly and weakly zeneith angle dependent
328 ! albedo
329  parameter(alslmx=1.0,alslmn=0.0,alsomx=0.0,alsomn=0.0,
330  & alssmx=1.0,alssmn=0.0,alsimx=0.0,alsimn=0.0,
331  & alsjmx=0.0,alsjmn=0.0)
332 !
333 ! criteria used for monitoring
334 !
335  parameter(epstsf=0.01,epsalb=0.001,epssno=0.01,
336  & epswet=0.01,epszor=0.0000001,epsplr=1.,epsoro=0.,
337  & epssmc=0.0001,epsscv=0.,eptsfc=0.01,epstg3=0.01,
338  & epsais=0.,epsacn=0.01,epsveg=0.01,
339  & epssih=0.001,epssic=0.001,
340  & epsvmn=0.01,epsvmx=0.01,epsabs=0.001,epsslp=0.01,
341  & epsvet=.01,epssot=.01,epsalf=.001)
342 !
343 ! quality control of analysis snow and sea ice
344 !
345 ! qctsfs .. surface temperature above which no snow allowed
346 ! qcsnos .. snow depth above which snow must exist
347 ! qctsfi .. sst above which sea-ice is not allowed
348 !
349 !clu relax qctsfs (for noah lsm)
350 !* parameter(qctsfs=283.16,qcsnos=100.,qctsfi=280.16)
351 !* parameter(qctsfs=288.16,qcsnos=100.,qctsfi=280.16)
352  parameter(qctsfs=293.16,qcsnos=100.,qctsfi=280.16)
353 !
354 !cwu [-2l]
355 !* ice concentration for ice limit (55 percent)
356 !
357 !* parameter(aislim=0.55)
358 !
359 ! parameters to obtain snow depth from snow cover and temperature
360 !
361 ! parameter(snwmin=25.,snwmax=100.)
362  parameter(snwmin=5.0,snwmax=100.)
363  real (kind=kind_io8), parameter :: ten=10.0, one=1.0
364 !
365 ! coeeficients of blending forecast and interpolated clim
366 ! (or analyzed) fields over sea or land(l) (not for clouds)
367 ! 1.0 = use of forecast
368 ! 0.0 = replace with interpolated analysis
369 !
370 ! these values are set for analysis mode.
371 !
372 ! variables land sea
373 ! ---------------------------------------------------------
374 ! surface temperature forecast analysis
375 ! surface temperature forecast forecast (over sea ice)
376 ! albedo analysis analysis
377 ! sea-ice analysis analysis
378 ! snow analysis forecast (over sea ice)
379 ! roughness analysis forecast
380 ! plant resistance analysis analysis
381 ! soil wetness (layer) weighted average analysis
382 ! soil temperature forecast analysis
383 ! canopy waver content forecast forecast
384 ! convective cloud cover forecast forecast
385 ! convective cloud bottm forecast forecast
386 ! convective cloud top forecast forecast
387 ! vegetation cover analysis analysis
388 ! vegetation type analysis analysis
389 ! soil type analysis analysis
390 ! sea-ice thickness forecast forecast
391 ! sea-ice concentration analysis analysis
392 ! vegetation cover min analysis analysis
393 ! vegetation cover max analysis analysis
394 ! max snow albedo analysis analysis
395 ! slope type analysis analysis
396 ! liquid soil wetness analysis-weighted analysis
397 ! actual snow depth analysis-weighted analysis
398 !
399 ! note: if analysis file is not given, then time interpolated climatology
400 ! is used. if analyiss file is given, it will be used as far as the
401 ! date and time matches. if they do not match, it uses forecast.
402 !
403 ! critical percentage value for aborting bad points when lgchek=.true.
404 !
405  logical lgchek
406  data lgchek/.true./
407  data critp1,critp2,critp3/80.,80.,25./
408 !
409 ! integer kpdalb(4), kpdalf(2)
410 ! data kpdalb/212,215,213,216/, kpdalf/214,217/
411 ! save kpdalb, kpdalf
412 !
413 ! mask orography and variance on gaussian grid
414 !
415  real (kind=kind_io8) slmask(len),orog(len), orog_uf(len)
416  &, orogd(len)
417  real (kind=kind_io8) rla(len), rlo(len)
418 !
419 ! permanent/extremes
420 !
421  character*500 fnglac,fnmxic
422  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: glacir(:),amxice(:),tsfcl0(:)
423 !
424 ! tsfcl0 is the climatological tsf at fh=0
425 !
426 ! climatology surface fields (last character 'c' or 'clm' indicate climatology)
427 !
428  character*500 fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
429  & fnplrc,fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,
430  & fnvegc,fnvetc,fnsotc
431  &, fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnslpc,fnabsc, fnalbc2
432  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfclm(len), wetclm(len), snoclm(len),
433  & zorclm(len), albclm(len,4), aisclm(len),
434  & tg3clm(len), acnclm(len), cnpclm(len),
435  & cvclm(len), cvbclm(len), cvtclm(len),
436  & scvclm(len), tsfcl2(len), vegclm(len),
437  & vetclm(len), sotclm(len), alfclm(len,2), sliclm(len),
438  & smcclm(len,lsoil), stcclm(len,lsoil)
439  &, sihclm(len), sicclm(len)
440  &, vmnclm(len), vmxclm(len), slpclm(len), absclm(len)
441 !
442 ! analyzed surface fields (last character 'a' or 'anl' indicate analysis)
443 !
444  character*500 fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
445  & fnplra,fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,
446  & fnvega,fnveta,fnsota
447  &, fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnslpa,fnabsa
448 !
449  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len), wetanl(len), snoanl(len),
450  & zoranl(len), albanl(len,4), aisanl(len),
451  & tg3anl(len), acnanl(len), cnpanl(len),
452  & cvanl(len), cvbanl(len), cvtanl(len),
453  & scvanl(len), tsfan2(len), veganl(len),
454  & vetanl(len), sotanl(len), alfanl(len,2), slianl(len),
455  & smcanl(len,lsoil), stcanl(len,lsoil)
456  &, sihanl(len), sicanl(len)
457  &, vmnanl(len), vmxanl(len), slpanl(len), absanl(len)
458 !
459  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfan0(len) ! sea surface temperature analysis at ft=0.
460 !
461 ! predicted surface fields (last characters 'fcs' indicates forecast)
462 !
463  real (kind=kind_io8) tsffcs(len), wetfcs(len), snofcs(len),
464  & zorfcs(len), albfcs(len,4), aisfcs(len),
465  & tg3fcs(len), acnfcs(len), cnpfcs(len),
466  & cvfcs(len), cvbfcs(len), cvtfcs(len),
467  & slifcs(len), vegfcs(len),
468  & vetfcs(len), sotfcs(len), alffcs(len,2),
469  & smcfcs(len,lsoil), stcfcs(len,lsoil)
470  &, sihfcs(len), sicfcs(len), sitfcs(len)
471  &, vmnfcs(len), vmxfcs(len), slpfcs(len), absfcs(len)
472  &, swdfcs(len), slcfcs(len,lsoil)
473 !
474 ! ratio of sigma level 1 wind and 10m wind (diagnozed by model and not touched
475 ! in this program).
476 !
477  real (kind=kind_io8) f10m (len)
478  real (kind=kind_io8) fsmcl(25),fsmcs(25),fstcl(25),fstcs(25)
479  real (kind=kind_io8) fcsmcl(25),fcsmcs(25),fcstcl(25),fcstcs(25)
480 
481 !clu [+1l] add swratio (soil moisture liquid-to-total ratio)
482  real (kind=kind_io8) swratio(len,lsoil)
483 !clu [+1l] add fixratio (option to adjust slc from smc)
484  logical fixratio(lsoil)
485 !
486  integer icsmcl(25), icsmcs(25), icstcl(25), icstcs(25)
487 !
488  real (kind=kind_io8) csmcl(25), csmcs(25)
489  real (kind=kind_io8) cstcl(25), cstcs(25)
490 !
491  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(mdata)
492  character*500 fnmskh
493  integer kpd7, kpd9
494 !
495  logical icefl1(len), icefl2(len)
496 !
497 ! input and output surface fields (bges) file names
498 !
499 !
500 ! sigma level 1 temperature for dead start
501 !
502  real (kind=kind_io8) sig1t(len)
503 !
504  character*32 label
505 !
506 ! = 1 ==> forecast is used
507 ! = 0 ==> analysis (or climatology) is used
508 !
509 ! output file ... primary surface file for radiation and forecast
510 !
511 ! rec. 1 label
512 ! rec. 2 date record
513 ! rec. 3 tsf
514 ! rec. 4 soilm(two layers) ----> 4 layers
515 ! rec. 5 snow
516 ! rec. 6 soilt(two layers) ----> 4 layers
517 ! rec. 7 tg3
518 ! rec. 8 zor
519 ! rec. 9 cv
520 ! rec. 10 cvb
521 ! rec. 11 cvt
522 ! rec. 12 albedo (four types)
523 ! rec. 13 slimsk
524 ! rec. 14 vegetation cover
525 ! rec. 14 plantr -----> skip this record
526 ! rec. 15 f10m -----> canopy
527 ! rec. 16 canopy water content (cnpanl) -----> f10m
528 ! rec. 17 vegetation type
529 ! rec. 18 soil type
530 ! rec. 19 zeneith angle dependent vegetation fraction (two types)
531 ! rec. 20 uustar
532 ! rec. 21 ffmm
533 ! rec. 22 ffhh
534 !cwu add sih & sic
535 ! rec. 23 sih(one category only)
536 ! rec. 24 sic
537 !clu [+8l] add prcp, flag, swd, slc, vmn, vmx, slp, abs
538 ! rec. 25 tprcp
539 ! rec. 26 srflag
540 ! rec. 27 swd
541 ! rec. 28 slc (4 layers)
542 ! rec. 29 vmn
543 ! rec. 30 vmx
544 ! rec. 31 slp
545 ! rec. 32 abs
546 
547 !
548 ! debug only
549 ! ldebug=.true. creates bges files for climatology and analysis
550 ! lqcbgs=.true. quality controls input bges file before merging (should have been
551 ! qced in the forecast program)
552 !
553  logical ldebug,lqcbgs
554  logical lprnt
555 !
556 ! debug only
557 !
558  character*500 fndclm,fndanl
559 !
560  logical lanom
561 
562 !
563  namelist/namsfc/fnglac,fnmxic,
564  & fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
565  & fnplrc,fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,
566  & fnvegc,fnvetc,fnsotc,fnalbc2,
567  & fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnslpc,fnabsc,
568  & fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
569  & fnplra,fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,
570  & fnvega,fnveta,fnsota,
571  & fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnslpa,fnabsa,
572  & fnmskh,
573  & ldebug,lgchek,lqcbgs,critp1,critp2,critp3,
574  & fndclm,fndanl,
575  & lanom,
576  & ftsfl,ftsfs,falbl,falbs,faisl,faiss,fsnol,fsnos,
577  & fzorl,fzors,fplrl,fplrs,fsmcl,fsmcs,
578  & fstcl,fstcs,fvegl,fvegs,fvetl,fvets,fsotl,fsots,
579  & fctsfl,fctsfs,fcalbl,fcalbs,fcsnol,fcsnos,
580  & fczorl,fczors,fcplrl,fcplrs,fcsmcl,fcsmcs,
581  & fcstcl,fcstcs,fsalfl,fsalfs,fcalfl,flalfs,
582  & fsihl,fsicl,fsihs,fsics,aislim,sihnew,
583  & fvmnl,fvmns,fvmxl,fvmxs,fslpl,fslps,
584  & fabsl,fabss,
585  & ictsfl,ictsfs,icalbl,icalbs,icsnol,icsnos,
586  & iczorl,iczors,icplrl,icplrs,icsmcl,icsmcs,
587  & icstcl,icstcs,icalfl,icalfs,
588  & gausm, deads, qcmsk, znlst,
589  & monclm, monanl, monfcs, monmer, mondif, igrdbg,
590  & blnmsk, bltmsk, landice
591 !
592  data gausm/.true./, deads/.false./, blnmsk/0.0/, bltmsk/90.0/
593  &, qcmsk/.false./, znlst/.false./, igrdbg/-1/
594  &, monclm/.false./, monanl/.false./, monfcs/.false./
595  &, monmer/.false./, mondif/.false./, landice/.true./
596 !
597 ! defaults file names
598 !
599  data fnmskh/'global_slmask.t126.grb'/
600  data fnalbc/'global_albedo4.1x1.grb'/
601  data fnalbc2/'global_albedo4.1x1.grb'/
602  data fntsfc/'global_sstclim.2x2.grb'/
603  data fnsotc/'global_soiltype.1x1.grb'/
604  data fnvegc/'global_vegfrac.1x1.grb'/
605  data fnvetc/'global_vegtype.1x1.grb'/
606  data fnglac/'global_glacier.2x2.grb'/
607  data fnmxic/'global_maxice.2x2.grb'/
608  data fnsnoc/'global_snoclim.1.875.grb'/
609  data fnzorc/'global_zorclim.1x1.grb'/
610  data fnaisc/'global_iceclim.2x2.grb'/
611  data fntg3c/'global_tg3clim.2.6x1.5.grb'/
612  data fnsmcc/'global_soilmcpc.1x1.grb'/
613 !clu [+4l] add fn()c for vmn, vmx, abs, slp
614  data fnvmnc/'global_shdmin.0.144x0.144.grb'/
615  data fnvmxc/'global_shdmax.0.144x0.144.grb'/
616  data fnslpc/'global_slope.1x1.grb'/
617  data fnabsc/'global_snoalb.1x1.grb'/
618 !
619  data fnwetc/' '/
620  data fnplrc/' '/
621  data fnstcc/' '/
622  data fnscvc/' '/
623  data fnacnc/' '/
624 !
625  data fntsfa/' '/
626  data fnweta/' '/
627  data fnsnoa/' '/
628  data fnzora/' '/
629  data fnalba/' '/
630  data fnaisa/' '/
631  data fnplra/' '/
632  data fntg3a/' '/
633  data fnsmca/' '/
634  data fnstca/' '/
635  data fnscva/' '/
636  data fnacna/' '/
637  data fnvega/' '/
638  data fnveta/' '/
639  data fnsota/' '/
640 !clu [+4l] add fn()a for vmn, vmx, abs, slp
641  data fnvmna/' '/
642  data fnvmxa/' '/
643  data fnslpa/' '/
644  data fnabsa/' '/
645 !
646  data ldebug/.false./, lqcbgs/.true./
647  data fndclm/' '/
648  data fndanl/' '/
649  data lanom/.false./
650 !
651 ! default relaxation time in hours to analysis or climatology
652  data ftsfl/99999.0/, ftsfs/0.0/
653  data falbl/0.0/, falbs/0.0/
654  data falfl/0.0/, falfs/0.0/
655  data faisl/0.0/, faiss/0.0/
656  data fsnol/0.0/, fsnos/99999.0/
657  data fzorl/0.0/, fzors/99999.0/
658  data fplrl/0.0/, fplrs/0.0/
659  data fvetl/0.0/, fvets/99999.0/
660  data fsotl/0.0/, fsots/99999.0/
661  data fvegl/0.0/, fvegs/99999.0/
662 !cwu [+4l] add f()l and f()s for sih, sic and aislim, sihlim
663  data fsihl/99999.0/, fsihs/99999.0/
664 ! data fsicl/99999.0/, fsics/99999.0/
665  data fsicl/0.0/, fsics/0.0/
666 ! default ice concentration limit (50%), new ice thickness (20cm)
667 !cwu change ice concentration limit (15%) Jan 2015
668 ! data aislim/0.50/, sihnew/0.2/
669  data aislim/0.15/, sihnew/0.2/
670 !clu [+4l] add f()l and f()s for vmn, vmx, abs, slp
671  data fvmnl/0.0/, fvmns/99999.0/
672  data fvmxl/0.0/, fvmxs/99999.0/
673  data fslpl/0.0/, fslps/99999.0/
674  data fabsl/0.0/, fabss/99999.0/
675 ! default relaxation time in hours to climatology if analysis missing
676  data fctsfl/99999.0/, fctsfs/99999.0/
677  data fcalbl/99999.0/, fcalbs/99999.0/
678  data fcsnol/99999.0/, fcsnos/99999.0/
679  data fczorl/99999.0/, fczors/99999.0/
680  data fcplrl/99999.0/, fcplrs/99999.0/
681 ! default flag to apply climatological annual cycle
682  data ictsfl/0/, ictsfs/1/
683  data icalbl/1/, icalbs/1/
684  data icalfl/1/, icalfs/1/
685  data icsnol/0/, icsnos/0/
686  data iczorl/1/, iczors/0/
687  data icplrl/1/, icplrs/0/
688 !
689  data ccnp/1.0/
690  data ccv/1.0/, ccvb/1.0/, ccvt/1.0/
691 !
692  data ifp/0/
693 !
694  save ifp,fnglac,fnmxic,
695  & fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
696  & fnplrc,fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,fnvegc,
697  & fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
698  & fnplra,fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,fnvega,
699  & fnvetc,fnveta,
700  & fnsotc,fnsota,
701 !clu [+2l] add fn()c and fn()a for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
702  & fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnabsc,fnslpc,
703  & fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnabsa,fnslpa,
704  & ldebug,lgchek,lqcbgs,critp1,critp2,critp3,
705  & fndclm,fndanl,
706  & lanom,
707  & ftsfl,ftsfs,falbl,falbs,faisl,faiss,fsnol,fsnos,
708  & fzorl,fzors,fplrl,fplrs,fsmcl,fsmcs,falfl,falfs,
709  & fstcl,fstcs,fvegl,fvegs,fvetl,fvets,fsotl,fsots,
710  & fctsfl,fctsfs,fcalbl,fcalbs,fcsnol,fcsnos,
711  & fczorl,fczors,fcplrl,fcplrs,fcsmcl,fcsmcs,
712  & fcstcl,fcstcs,fcalfl,fcalfs,
713 !cwu [+1l] add f()l and f()s for sih, sic and aislim, sihnew
714  & fsihl,fsihs,fsicl,fsics,aislim,sihnew,
715 !clu [+2l] add f()l and f()s for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
716  & fvmnl,fvmns,fvmxl,fvmxs,fslpl,fslps,
717  & fabsl,fabss,
718  & ictsfl,ictsfs,icalbl,icalbs,icsnol,icsnos,
719  & iczorl,iczors,icplrl,icplrs,icsmcl,icsmcs,
720  & icstcl,icstcs,icalfl,icalfs,
721  & gausm, deads, qcmsk,
722  & monclm, monanl, monfcs, monmer, mondif, igrdbg,
723  & grboro, grbmsk,
724 !
725  & ctsfl, ctsfs, calbl, calfl, calbs, calfs, csmcs,
726  & csnol, csnos, czorl, czors, cplrl, cplrs, cstcl,
727  & cstcs, cvegl, cvwgs, cvetl, cvets, csotl, csots,
728  & csmcl
729 !cwu [+1l] add c()l and c()s for sih, sic
730  &, csihl, csihs, csicl, csics
731 !clu [+2l] add c()l and c()s for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
732  &, cvmnl, cvmns, cvmxl, cvmxs, cslpl, cslps,
733  & cabsl, cabss
734  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, blnmsk, bltmsk
735  &, glacir, amxice, tsfcl0
736  &, caisl, caiss, cvegs
737 !
738  lprnt = .false.
739  iprnt = 1
740 ! do i=1,len
741 ! if (ifp .eq. 0 .and. rla(i) .gt. 80.0) print *,' rla=',rla(i)
742 ! *,' rlo=',rlo(i)
743 ! tem1 = abs(rla(i) - 48.75)
744 ! tem2 = abs(rlo(i) - (-68.50))
745 ! if(tem1 .lt. 0.25 .and. tem2 .lt. 0.50) then
746 ! lprnt = .true.
747 ! iprnt = i
748 ! print *,' lprnt=',lprnt,' iprnt=',iprnt
749 ! print *,' rla(i)=',rla(i),' rlo(i)=',rlo(i)
750 ! endif
751 ! enddo
752  if (ialb == 1) then
753  kpdabs = kpdabs_1
754  kpdalb = kpdalb_1
755  alblmx = .99
756  albsmx = .99
757  alblmn = .01
758  albsmn = .01
759  abslmx = 1.0
760  abssmx = 1.0
761  abssmn = .01
762  abslmn = .01
763  else
764  kpdabs = kpdabs_0
765  kpdalb = kpdalb_0
766  alblmx = .80
767  albsmx = .80
768  alblmn = .06
769  albsmn = .06
770  abslmx = .80
771  abssmx = .80
772  abslmn = .01
773  abssmn = .01
774  endif
775  if(ifp.eq.0) then
776  ifp = 1
777  do k=1,lsoil
778  fsmcl(k) = 99999.
779  fsmcs(k) = 0.
780  fstcl(k) = 99999.
781  fstcs(k) = 0.
782  enddo
783 #ifdef INTERNAL_FILE_NML
784  read(input_nml_file, nml=namsfc)
785 #else
786 ! print *,' in sfcsub nlunit=',nlunit,' me=',me,' ialb=',ialb
787  rewind(nlunit)
788  read (nlunit,namsfc)
789 #endif
790 ! write(6,namsfc)
791 !
792  if (me .eq. 0) then
793  print *,'ftsfl,falbl,faisl,fsnol,fzorl=',
794  & ftsfl,falbl,faisl,fsnol,fzorl
795  print *,'fsmcl=',fsmcl(1:lsoil)
796  print *,'fstcl=',fstcl(1:lsoil)
797  print *,'ftsfs,falbs,faiss,fsnos,fzors=',
798  & ftsfs,falbs,faiss,fsnos,fzors
799  print *,'fsmcs=',fsmcs(1:lsoil)
800  print *,'fstcs=',fstcs(1:lsoil)
801  print *,' aislim=',aislim,' sihnew=',sihnew
802  print *,' isot=', isot,' ivegsrc=',ivegsrc
803  endif
804 
805  if (ivegsrc == 2) then ! sib
806  veg_type_landice=13
807  else
808  veg_type_landice=15
809  endif
810  if (isot == 0) then
811  soil_type_landice=9
812  else
813  soil_type_landice=16
814  endif
815 !
816  deltf = deltsfc / 24.0
817 !
818  ctsfl=0. !... tsfc over land
819  if(ftsfl.ge.99999.) ctsfl=1.
820  if((ftsfl.gt.0.).and.(ftsfl.lt.99999)) ctsfl=exp(-deltf/ftsfl)
821 !
822  ctsfs=0. !... tsfc over sea
823  if(ftsfs.ge.99999.) ctsfs=1.
824  if((ftsfs.gt.0.).and.(ftsfs.lt.99999)) ctsfs=exp(-deltf/ftsfs)
825 !
826  do k=1,lsoil
827  csmcl(k)=0. !... soilm over land
828  if(fsmcl(k).ge.99999.) csmcl(k)=1.
829  if((fsmcl(k).gt.0.).and.(fsmcl(k).lt.99999))
830  & csmcl(k)=exp(-deltf/fsmcl(k))
831  csmcs(k)=0. !... soilm over sea
832  if(fsmcs(k).ge.99999.) csmcs(k)=1.
833  if((fsmcs(k).gt.0.).and.(fsmcs(k).lt.99999))
834  & csmcs(k)=exp(-deltf/fsmcs(k))
835  enddo
836 !
837  calbl=0. !... albedo over land
838  if(falbl.ge.99999.) calbl=1.
839  if((falbl.gt.0.).and.(falbl.lt.99999)) calbl=exp(-deltf/falbl)
840 !
841  calfl=0. !... fraction field for albedo over land
842  if(falfl.ge.99999.) calfl=1.
843  if((falfl.gt.0.).and.(falfl.lt.99999)) calfl=exp(-deltf/falfl)
844 !
845  calbs=0. !... albedo over sea
846  if(falbs.ge.99999.) calbs=1.
847  if((falbs.gt.0.).and.(falbs.lt.99999)) calbs=exp(-deltf/falbs)
848 !
849  calfs=0. !... fraction field for albedo over sea
850  if(falfs.ge.99999.) calfs=1.
851  if((falfs.gt.0.).and.(falfs.lt.99999)) calfs=exp(-deltf/falfs)
852 !
853  caisl=0. !... sea ice over land
854  if(faisl.ge.99999.) caisl=1.
855  if((faisl.gt.0.).and.(faisl.lt.99999)) caisl=1.
856 !
857  caiss=0. !... sea ice over sea
858  if(faiss.ge.99999.) caiss=1.
859  if((faiss.gt.0.).and.(faiss.lt.99999)) caiss=1.
860 !
861  csnol=0. !... snow over land
862  if(fsnol.ge.99999.) csnol=1.
863  if((fsnol.gt.0.).and.(fsnol.lt.99999)) csnol=exp(-deltf/fsnol)
864 ! using the same way to bending snow as narr when fsnol is the negative value
865 ! the magnitude of fsnol is the thread to determine the lower and upper bound
866 ! of final swe
867  if(fsnol.lt.0.)csnol=fsnol
868 !
869  csnos=0. !... snow over sea
870  if(fsnos.ge.99999.) csnos=1.
871  if((fsnos.gt.0.).and.(fsnos.lt.99999)) csnos=exp(-deltf/fsnos)
872 !
873  czorl=0. !... roughness length over land
874  if(fzorl.ge.99999.) czorl=1.
875  if((fzorl.gt.0.).and.(fzorl.lt.99999)) czorl=exp(-deltf/fzorl)
876 !
877  czors=0. !... roughness length over sea
878  if(fzors.ge.99999.) czors=1.
879  if((fzors.gt.0.).and.(fzors.lt.99999)) czors=exp(-deltf/fzors)
880 !
881 ! cplrl=0. !... plant resistance over land
882 ! if(fplrl.ge.99999.) cplrl=1.
883 ! if((fplrl.gt.0.).and.(fplrl.lt.99999)) cplrl=exp(-deltf/fplrl)
884 !
885 ! cplrs=0. !... plant resistance over sea
886 ! if(fplrs.ge.99999.) cplrs=1.
887 ! if((fplrs.gt.0.).and.(fplrs.lt.99999)) cplrs=exp(-deltf/fplrs)
888 !
889  do k=1,lsoil
890  cstcl(k)=0. !... soilt over land
891  if(fstcl(k).ge.99999.) cstcl(k)=1.
892  if((fstcl(k).gt.0.).and.(fstcl(k).lt.99999))
893  & cstcl(k)=exp(-deltf/fstcl(k))
894  cstcs(k)=0. !... soilt over sea
895  if(fstcs(k).ge.99999.) cstcs(k)=1.
896  if((fstcs(k).gt.0.).and.(fstcs(k).lt.99999))
897  & cstcs(k)=exp(-deltf/fstcs(k))
898  enddo
899 !
900  cvegl=0. !... vegetation fraction over land
901  if(fvegl.ge.99999.) cvegl=1.
902  if((fvegl.gt.0.).and.(fvegl.lt.99999)) cvegl=exp(-deltf/fvegl)
903 !
904  cvegs=0. !... vegetation fraction over sea
905  if(fvegs.ge.99999.) cvegs=1.
906  if((fvegs.gt.0.).and.(fvegs.lt.99999)) cvegs=exp(-deltf/fvegs)
907 !
908  cvetl=0. !... vegetation type over land
909  if(fvetl.ge.99999.) cvetl=1.
910  if((fvetl.gt.0.).and.(fvetl.lt.99999)) cvetl=exp(-deltf/fvetl)
911 !
912  cvets=0. !... vegetation type over sea
913  if(fvets.ge.99999.) cvets=1.
914  if((fvets.gt.0.).and.(fvets.lt.99999)) cvets=exp(-deltf/fvets)
915 !
916  csotl=0. !... soil type over land
917  if(fsotl.ge.99999.) csotl=1.
918  if((fsotl.gt.0.).and.(fsotl.lt.99999)) csotl=exp(-deltf/fsotl)
919 !
920  csots=0. !... soil type over sea
921  if(fsots.ge.99999.) csots=1.
922  if((fsots.gt.0.).and.(fsots.lt.99999)) csots=exp(-deltf/fsots)
923 
924 !cwu [+16l]---------------------------------------------------------------
925 !
926  csihl=0. !... sea ice thickness over land
927  if(fsihl.ge.99999.) csihl=1.
928  if((fsihl.gt.0.).and.(fsihl.lt.99999)) csihl=exp(-deltf/fsihl)
929 !
930  csihs=0. !... sea ice thickness over sea
931  if(fsihs.ge.99999.) csihs=1.
932  if((fsihs.gt.0.).and.(fsihs.lt.99999)) csihs=exp(-deltf/fsihs)
933 !
934  csicl=0. !... sea ice concentration over land
935  if(fsicl.ge.99999.) csicl=1.
936  if((fsicl.gt.0.).and.(fsicl.lt.99999)) csicl=exp(-deltf/fsicl)
937 !
938  csics=0. !... sea ice concentration over sea
939  if(fsics.ge.99999.) csics=1.
940  if((fsics.gt.0.).and.(fsics.lt.99999)) csics=exp(-deltf/fsics)
941 
942 !clu [+32l]---------------------------------------------------------------
943 !
944  cvmnl=0. !... min veg cover over land
945  if(fvmnl.ge.99999.) cvmnl=1.
946  if((fvmnl.gt.0.).and.(fvmnl.lt.99999)) cvmnl=exp(-deltf/fvmnl)
947 !
948  cvmns=0. !... min veg cover over sea
949  if(fvmns.ge.99999.) cvmns=1.
950  if((fvmns.gt.0.).and.(fvmns.lt.99999)) cvmns=exp(-deltf/fvmns)
951 !
952  cvmxl=0. !... max veg cover over land
953  if(fvmxl.ge.99999.) cvmxl=1.
954  if((fvmxl.gt.0.).and.(fvmxl.lt.99999)) cvmxl=exp(-deltf/fvmxl)
955 !
956  cvmxs=0. !... max veg cover over sea
957  if(fvmxs.ge.99999.) cvmxs=1.
958  if((fvmxs.gt.0.).and.(fvmxs.lt.99999)) cvmxs=exp(-deltf/fvmxs)
959 !
960  cslpl=0. !... slope type over land
961  if(fslpl.ge.99999.) cslpl=1.
962  if((fslpl.gt.0.).and.(fslpl.lt.99999)) cslpl=exp(-deltf/fslpl)
963 !
964  cslps=0. !... slope type over sea
965  if(fslps.ge.99999.) cslps=1.
966  if((fslps.gt.0.).and.(fslps.lt.99999)) cslps=exp(-deltf/fslps)
967 !
968  cabsl=0. !... snow albedo over land
969  if(fabsl.ge.99999.) cabsl=1.
970  if((fabsl.gt.0.).and.(fabsl.lt.99999)) cabsl=exp(-deltf/fabsl)
971 !
972  cabss=0. !... snow albedo over sea
973  if(fabss.ge.99999.) cabss=1.
974  if((fabss.gt.0.).and.(fabss.lt.99999)) cabss=exp(-deltf/fabss)
975 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
976 !
977 ! read a high resolution mask field for use in grib interpolation
978 !
979  call hmskrd(lugb,imsk,jmsk,fnmskh,
980  & kpdmsk,slmskh,gausm,blnmsk,bltmsk,me)
981 ! if (qcmsk) call qcmask(slmskh,sllnd,slsea,imsk,jmsk,rla,rlo)
982 !
983  if (me .eq. 0) then
984  write(6,*) ' '
985  write(6,*) ' lugb=',lugb,' len=',len, ' lsoil=',lsoil
986  write(6,*) 'iy=',iy,' im=',im,' id=',id,' ih=',ih,' fh=',fh
987  &, ' sig1t(1)=',sig1t(1)
988  &, ' gausm=',gausm,' blnmsk=',blnmsk,' bltmsk=',bltmsk
989  write(6,*) ' '
990  endif
991 !
992 ! reading permanent/extreme features (glacier points and maximum ice extent)
993 !
994  allocate (tsfcl0(len))
995  allocate (glacir(len))
996  allocate (amxice(len))
997 !
998 ! read glacier
999 !
1000  kpd9 = -1
1001  kpd7 = -1
1002  call fixrdc(lugb,fnglac,kpdgla,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
1003  & glacir,len,iret
1004  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gausm, blnmsk, bltmsk
1005  &, rla, rlo, me)
1006 ! znnt=1.
1007 ! call nntprt(glacir,len,znnt)
1008 !
1009 ! read maximum ice extent
1010 !
1011  kpd7 = -1
1012  call fixrdc(lugb,fnmxic,kpdmxi,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
1013  & amxice,len,iret
1014  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gausm, blnmsk, bltmsk
1015  &, rla, rlo, me)
1016 ! znnt=1.
1017 ! call nntprt(amxice,len,znnt)
1018 !
1019  crit=0.5
1020  call rof01(glacir,len,'ge',crit)
1021  call rof01(amxice,len,'ge',crit)
1022 !
1023 ! quality control max ice limit based on glacier points
1024 !
1025  call qcmxice(glacir,amxice,len,me)
1026 !
1027  endif ! first time loop finished
1028 !
1029  do i=1,len
1030  sliclm(i) = 1.
1031  snoclm(i) = 0.
1032  icefl1(i) = .true.
1033  enddo
1034 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsffcsin=',tsffcs(iprnt)
1035 !
1036 ! read climatology fields
1037 !
1038  if (me .eq. 0) then
1039  write(6,*) '=============='
1040  write(6,*) 'climatology'
1041  write(6,*) '=============='
1042  endif
1043 !
1044  percrit=critp1
1045 !
1046  call clima(lugb,iy,im,id,ih,fh,len,lsoil,slmask,
1047  & fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
1048  & fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,fnvegc,
1049  & fnvetc,fnsotc,
1050  & fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnslpc,fnabsc,
1051  & tsfclm,tsfcl2,wetclm,snoclm,zorclm,albclm,aisclm,
1052  & tg3clm,cvclm ,cvbclm,cvtclm,
1053  & cnpclm,smcclm,stcclm,sliclm,scvclm,acnclm,vegclm,
1054  & vetclm,sotclm,alfclm,
1055  & vmnclm,vmxclm,slpclm,absclm,
1056  & kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdzor,kpdalb,kpdais,
1057  & kpdtg3,kpdscv,kpdacn,kpdsmc,kpdstc,kpdveg,
1058  & kpdvet,kpdsot,kpdalf,tsfcl0,
1059  & kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,
1060  & deltsfc, lanom
1061  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, rla, rlo, gausm, blnmsk, bltmsk,me
1062  &, lprnt,iprnt,fnalbc2,ialb,tile_num_ch,i_index,j_index)
1063 ! if(lprnt) print *,'tsfclm=',tsfclm(iprnt),' tsfcl2=',tsfcl2(iprnt)
1064 !
1065 ! scale surface roughness and albedo to model required units
1066 !
1067  zsca=100.
1068  call scale(zorclm,len,zsca)
1069  zsca=0.01
1070  call scale(albclm,len,zsca)
1071  call scale(albclm(1,2),len,zsca)
1072  call scale(albclm(1,3),len,zsca)
1073  call scale(albclm(1,4),len,zsca)
1074  call scale(alfclm,len,zsca)
1075  call scale(alfclm(1,2),len,zsca)
1076 !clu [+4l] scale vmn, vmx, abs from percent to fraction
1077  zsca=0.01
1078  call scale(vmnclm,len,zsca)
1079  call scale(vmxclm,len,zsca)
1080  call scale(absclm,len,zsca)
1081 
1082 !
1083 ! set albedo over ocean to albomx
1084 !
1085  call albocn(albclm,slmask,albomx,len)
1086 !
1087 ! make sure vegetation type and soil type are non zero over land
1088 !
1089  call landtyp(vetclm,sotclm,slpclm,slmask,len)
1090 !
1091 !cwu [-1l/+1l]
1092 !* ice concentration or ice mask (only ice mask used in the model now)
1093 ! ice concentration and ice mask (both are used in the model now)
1094 !
1095  if(fnaisc(1:8).ne.' ') then
1096 !cwu [+5l/-1l] update sihclm, sicclm
1097  do i=1,len
1098  sihclm(i) = 3.0*aisclm(i)
1099  sicclm(i) = aisclm(i)
1100  if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.1..and.
1101  & sicclm(i).ne.1.) then
1102  sicclm(i) = sicimx
1103  sihfcs(i) = glacir_hice
1104  endif
1105  enddo
1106  crit=aislim
1107 !* crit=0.5
1108  call rof01(aisclm,len,'ge',crit)
1109  elseif(fnacnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
1110 !cwu [+4l] update sihclm, sicclm
1111  do i=1,len
1112  sihclm(i) = 3.0*acnclm(i)
1113  sicclm(i) = acnclm(i)
1114  if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.1..and.
1115  & sicclm(i).ne.1.) then
1116  sicclm(i) = sicimx
1117  sihfcs(i) = glacir_hice
1118  endif
1119  enddo
1120  call rof01(acnclm,len,'ge',aislim)
1121  do i=1,len
1122  aisclm(i) = acnclm(i)
1123  enddo
1124  endif
1125 !
1126 ! quality control of sea ice mask
1127 !
1128  call qcsice(aisclm,glacir,amxice,aicice,aicsea,sllnd,slmask,
1129  & rla,rlo,len,me)
1130 !
1131 ! set ocean/land/sea-ice mask
1132 !
1133  call setlsi(slmask,aisclm,len,aicice,sliclm)
1134 ! if(lprnt) print *,' aisclm=',aisclm(iprnt),' sliclm='
1135 ! *,sliclm(iprnt),' slmask=',slmask(iprnt)
1136 !
1137 ! write(6,*) 'sliclm'
1138 ! znnt=1.
1139 ! call nntprt(sliclm,len,znnt)
1140 !
1141 ! quality control of snow
1142 !
1143  call qcsnow(snoclm,slmask,aisclm,glacir,len,snosmx,landice,me)
1144 !
1145  call setzro(snoclm,epssno,len)
1146 !
1147 ! snow cover handling (we assume climatological snow depth is available)
1148 ! quality control of snow depth (note that snow should be corrected first
1149 ! because it influences tsf
1150 !
1151  kqcm=1
1152  call qcmxmn('snow ',snoclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1153  & snolmx,snolmn,snoomx,snoomn,snoimx,snoimn,
1154  & snojmx,snojmn,snosmx,snosmn,epssno,
1155  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1156 ! write(6,*) 'snoclm'
1157 ! znnt=1.
1158 ! call nntprt(snoclm,len,znnt)
1159 !
1160 ! get snow cover from snow depth array
1161 !
1162  if(fnscvc(1:8).eq.' ') then
1163  call getscv(snoclm,scvclm,len)
1164  endif
1165 !
1166 ! set tsfc over snow to tsfsmx if greater
1167 !
1168  call snosfc(snoclm,tsfclm,tsfsmx,len,me)
1169 ! call snosfc(snoclm,tsfcl2,tsfsmx,len)
1170 
1171 !
1172 ! quality control
1173 !
1174  do i=1,len
1175  icefl2(i) = sicclm(i) .gt. 0.99999
1176  enddo
1177  kqcm=1
1178  call qcmxmn('tsfc ',tsfclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl2,
1179  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
1180  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
1181  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1182  call qcmxmn('tsf2 ',tsfcl2,sliclm,snoclm,icefl2,
1183  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
1184  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
1185  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1186  do kk = 1, 4
1187  call qcmxmn('albc ',albclm(1,kk),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1188  & alblmx,alblmn,albomx,albomn,albimx,albimn,
1189  & albjmx,albjmn,albsmx,albsmn,epsalb,
1190  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1191  enddo
1192  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
1193  call qcmxmn('wetc ',wetclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1194  & wetlmx,wetlmn,wetomx,wetomn,wetimx,wetimn,
1195  & wetjmx,wetjmn,wetsmx,wetsmn,epswet,
1196  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1197  endif
1198  call qcmxmn('zorc ',zorclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1199  & zorlmx,zorlmn,zoromx,zoromn,zorimx,zorimn,
1200  & zorjmx,zorjmn,zorsmx,zorsmn,epszor,
1201  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1202 ! if(fnplrc(1:8).ne.' ') then
1203 ! call qcmxmn('plntc ',plrclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1204 ! & plrlmx,plrlmn,plromx,plromn,plrimx,plrimn,
1205 ! & plrjmx,plrjmn,plrsmx,plrsmn,epsplr,
1206 ! & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1207 ! endif
1208  call qcmxmn('tg3c ',tg3clm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1209  & tg3lmx,tg3lmn,tg3omx,tg3omn,tg3imx,tg3imn,
1210  & tg3jmx,tg3jmn,tg3smx,tg3smn,epstg3,
1211  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1212 !
1213 ! get soil temp and moisture (after all the qcs are completed)
1214 !
1215  if(fnsmcc(1:8).eq.' ') then
1216  call getsmc(wetclm,len,lsoil,smcclm,me)
1217  endif
1218  call qcmxmn('smc1c ',smcclm(1,1),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1219  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1220  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1221  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1222  call qcmxmn('smc2c ',smcclm(1,2),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1223  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1224  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1225  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1226 !clu [+8l] add smcclm(3:4)
1227  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1228  call qcmxmn('smc3c ',smcclm(1,3),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1229  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1230  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1231  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1232  call qcmxmn('smc4c ',smcclm(1,4),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1233  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1234  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1235  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1236  endif
1237  if(fnstcc(1:8).eq.' ') then
1238  call getstc(tsfclm,tg3clm,sliclm,len,lsoil,stcclm,tsfimx)
1239  endif
1240  call qcmxmn('stc1c ',stcclm(1,1),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1241  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1242  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1243  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1244  call qcmxmn('stc2c ',stcclm(1,2),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1245  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1246  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1247  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1248 !clu [+8l] add stcclm(3:4)
1249  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1250  call qcmxmn('stc3c ',stcclm(1,3),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1251  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1252  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1253  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1254  call qcmxmn('stc4c ',stcclm(1,4),sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1255  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1256  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1257  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1258  endif
1259  call qcmxmn('vegc ',vegclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1260  & veglmx,veglmn,vegomx,vegomn,vegimx,vegimn,
1261  & vegjmx,vegjmn,vegsmx,vegsmn,epsveg,
1262  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1263  call qcmxmn('vetc ',vetclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1264  & vetlmx,vetlmn,vetomx,vetomn,vetimx,vetimn,
1265  & vetjmx,vetjmn,vetsmx,vetsmn,epsvet,
1266  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1267  call qcmxmn('sotc ',sotclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1268  & sotlmx,sotlmn,sotomx,sotomn,sotimx,sotimn,
1269  & sotjmx,sotjmn,sotsmx,sotsmn,epssot,
1270  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1271 !cwu [+8l] ---------------------------------------------------------------
1272  call qcmxmn('sihc ',sihclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1273  & sihlmx,sihlmn,sihomx,sihomn,sihimx,sihimn,
1274  & sihjmx,sihjmn,sihsmx,sihsmn,epssih,
1275  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1276  call qcmxmn('sicc ',sicclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1277  & siclmx,siclmn,sicomx,sicomn,sicimx,sicimn,
1278  & sicjmx,sicjmn,sicsmx,sicsmn,epssic,
1279  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1280 !clu [+16l] ---------------------------------------------------------------
1281  call qcmxmn('vmnc ',vmnclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1282  & vmnlmx,vmnlmn,vmnomx,vmnomn,vmnimx,vmnimn,
1283  & vmnjmx,vmnjmn,vmnsmx,vmnsmn,epsvmn,
1284  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1285  call qcmxmn('vmxc ',vmxclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1286  & vmxlmx,vmxlmn,vmxomx,vmxomn,vmximx,vmximn,
1287  & vmxjmx,vmxjmn,vmxsmx,vmxsmn,epsvmx,
1288  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1289  call qcmxmn('slpc ',slpclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1290  & slplmx,slplmn,slpomx,slpomn,slpimx,slpimn,
1291  & slpjmx,slpjmn,slpsmx,slpsmn,epsslp,
1292  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1293  call qcmxmn('absc ',absclm,sliclm,snoclm,icefl1,
1294  & abslmx,abslmn,absomx,absomn,absimx,absimn,
1295  & absjmx,absjmn,abssmx,abssmn,epsabs,
1296  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1297 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
1298 !
1299 ! monitoring prints
1300 !
1301  if (monclm) then
1302  if (me .eq. 0) then
1303  print *,' '
1304  print *,'monitor of time and space interpolated climatology'
1305  print *,' '
1306 ! call count(sliclm,snoclm,len)
1307  print *,' '
1308  call monitr('tsfclm',tsfclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1309  call monitr('albclm',albclm(1,1),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1310  call monitr('albclm',albclm(1,2),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1311  call monitr('albclm',albclm(1,3),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1312  call monitr('albclm',albclm(1,4),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1313  call monitr('aisclm',aisclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1314  call monitr('snoclm',snoclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1315  call monitr('scvclm',scvclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1316  call monitr('smcclm1',smcclm(1,1),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1317  call monitr('smcclm2',smcclm(1,2),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1318  call monitr('stcclm1',stcclm(1,1),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1319  call monitr('stcclm2',stcclm(1,2),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1320 !clu [+4l] add smcclm(3:4) and stcclm(3:4)
1321  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1322  call monitr('smcclm3',smcclm(1,3),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1323  call monitr('smcclm4',smcclm(1,4),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1324  call monitr('stcclm3',stcclm(1,3),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1325  call monitr('stcclm4',stcclm(1,4),sliclm,snoclm,len)
1326  endif
1327  call monitr('tg3clm',tg3clm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1328  call monitr('zorclm',zorclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1329 ! if (gaus) then
1330  call monitr('cvaclm',cvclm ,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1331  call monitr('cvbclm',cvbclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1332  call monitr('cvtclm',cvtclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1333 ! endif
1334  call monitr('sliclm',sliclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1335 ! call monitr('plrclm',plrclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1336  call monitr('orog ',orog ,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1337  call monitr('vegclm',vegclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1338  call monitr('vetclm',vetclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1339  call monitr('sotclm',sotclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1340 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic
1341  call monitr('sihclm',sihclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1342  call monitr('sicclm',sicclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1343 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
1344  call monitr('vmnclm',vmnclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1345  call monitr('vmxclm',vmxclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1346  call monitr('slpclm',slpclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1347  call monitr('absclm',absclm,sliclm,snoclm,len)
1348  endif
1349  endif
1350 !
1351 !
1352  if (me .eq. 0) then
1353  write(6,*) '=============='
1354  write(6,*) ' analysis'
1355  write(6,*) '=============='
1356  endif
1357 !
1358 ! fill in analysis array with climatology before reading analysis.
1359 !
1360  call filanl(tsfanl,tsfan2,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,aisanl,
1361  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
1362  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,scvanl,veganl,
1363  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,
1364  & sihanl,sicanl,
1365  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
1366  & tsfclm,tsfcl2,wetclm,snoclm,zorclm,albclm,aisclm,
1367  & tg3clm,cvclm ,cvbclm,cvtclm,
1368  & cnpclm,smcclm,stcclm,sliclm,scvclm,vegclm,
1369  & vetclm,sotclm,alfclm,
1370  & sihclm,sicclm,
1371  & vmnclm,vmxclm,slpclm,absclm,
1372  & len,lsoil)
1373 !
1374 ! reverse scaling to match with grib analysis input
1375 !
1376  zsca=0.01
1377  call scale(zoranl,len, zsca)
1378  zsca=100.
1379  call scale(albanl,len,zsca)
1380  call scale(albanl(1,2),len,zsca)
1381  call scale(albanl(1,3),len,zsca)
1382  call scale(albanl(1,4),len,zsca)
1383  call scale(alfanl,len,zsca)
1384  call scale(alfanl(1,2),len,zsca)
1385 !clu [+4l] reverse scale for vmn, vmx, abs
1386  zsca=100.
1387  call scale(vmnanl,len,zsca)
1388  call scale(vmxanl,len,zsca)
1389  call scale(absanl,len,zsca)
1390 !
1391  percrit=critp2
1392 !
1393 ! read analysis fields
1394 !
1395  call analy(lugb,iy,im,id,ih,fh,len,lsoil,slmask,
1396  & fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
1397  & fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,fnvega,
1398  & fnveta,fnsota,
1399  & fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnslpa,fnabsa,
1400  & tsfanl,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,aisanl,
1401  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
1402  & smcanl,stcanl,slianl,scvanl,acnanl,veganl,
1403  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,tsfan0,
1404  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
1405  & kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdsnd,kpdzor,kpdalb,kpdais,
1406  & kpdtg3,kpdscv,kpdacn,kpdsmc,kpdstc,kpdveg,
1407  & kpdvet,kpdsot,kpdalf,
1408  & kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,
1409  & irttsf,irtwet,irtsno,irtzor,irtalb,irtais,
1410  & irttg3,irtscv,irtacn,irtsmc,irtstc,irtveg,
1411  & irtvet,irtsot,irtalf
1412  &, irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs,
1413  & imsk, jmsk, slmskh, rla, rlo, gausm, blnmsk, bltmsk
1414  &, me, lanom)
1415 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsfanl=',tsfanl(iprnt)
1416 !
1417 ! scale zor and alb to match forecast model units
1418 !
1419  zsca=100.
1420  call scale(zoranl,len, zsca)
1421  zsca=0.01
1422  call scale(albanl,len,zsca)
1423  call scale(albanl(1,2),len,zsca)
1424  call scale(albanl(1,3),len,zsca)
1425  call scale(albanl(1,4),len,zsca)
1426  call scale(alfanl,len,zsca)
1427  call scale(alfanl(1,2),len,zsca)
1428 !clu [+4] scale vmn, vmx, abs from percent to fraction
1429  zsca=0.01
1430  call scale(vmnanl,len,zsca)
1431  call scale(vmxanl,len,zsca)
1432  call scale(absanl,len,zsca)
1433 !
1434 ! interpolate climatology but fixing initial anomaly
1435 !
1436  if(fh > 0.0 .and. fntsfa(1:8) /= ' ' .and. lanom) then
1437  call anomint(tsfan0,tsfclm,tsfcl0,tsfanl,len)
1438  endif
1439 !
1440 ! if the tsfanl is at sea level, then bring it to the surface using
1441 ! unfiltered orography (for lakes). if the analysis is at lake surface
1442 ! as in the nst model, then this call should be removed - moorthi 09/23/2011
1443 !
1444  if (use_ufo .and. .not. nst_anl) then
1445  ztsfc = 0.0
1446  call tsfcor(tsfanl,orog_uf,slmask,ztsfc,len,rlapse)
1447  endif
1448 !
1449 ! ice concentration or ice mask (only ice mask used in the model now)
1450 !
1451  if(fnaisa(1:8).ne.' ') then
1452 !cwu [+5l/-1l] update sihanl, sicanl
1453  do i=1,len
1454  sihanl(i) = 3.0*aisanl(i)
1455  sicanl(i) = aisanl(i)
1456  if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.1..and.
1457  & sicanl(i).ne.1.) then
1458  sicanl(i) = sicimx
1459  sihfcs(i) = glacir_hice
1460  endif
1461  enddo
1462  crit=aislim
1463 !* crit=0.5
1464  call rof01(aisanl,len,'ge',crit)
1465  elseif(fnacna(1:8).ne.' ') then
1466 !cwu [+17l] update sihanl, sicanl
1467  do i=1,len
1468  sihanl(i) = 3.0*acnanl(i)
1469  sicanl(i) = acnanl(i)
1470  if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.1..and.
1471  & sicanl(i).ne.1.) then
1472  sicanl(i) = sicimx
1473  sihfcs(i) = glacir_hice
1474  endif
1475  enddo
1476  crit=aislim
1477  do i=1,len
1478  if((slianl(i).eq.0.).and.(sicanl(i).ge.crit)) then
1479  slianl(i)=2.
1480 ! print *,'cycle - new ice form: fice=',sicanl(i)
1481  else if((slianl(i).ge.2.).and.(sicanl(i).lt.crit)) then
1482  slianl(i)=0.
1483 ! print *,'cycle - ice free: fice=',sicanl(i)
1484  else if((slianl(i).eq.1.).and.(sicanl(i).ge.sicimn)) then
1485 ! print *,'cycle - land covered by sea-ice: fice=',sicanl(i)
1486  sicanl(i)=0.
1487  endif
1488  enddo
1489 ! znnt=10.
1490 ! call nntprt(acnanl,len,znnt)
1491 ! if(lprnt) print *,' acnanl=',acnanl(iprnt)
1492 ! do i=1,len
1493 ! if (acnanl(i) .gt. 0.3 .and. aisclm(i) .eq. 1.0
1494 ! & .and. aisfcs(i) .ge. 0.75) acnanl(i) = aislim
1495 ! enddo
1496 ! if(lprnt) print *,' acnanl=',acnanl(iprnt)
1497  call rof01(acnanl,len,'ge',aislim)
1498  do i=1,len
1499  aisanl(i)=acnanl(i)
1500  enddo
1501  endif
1502 ! if(lprnt) print *,' aisanl1=',aisanl(iprnt),' glacir='
1503 ! &,glacir(iprnt),' slmask=',slmask(iprnt)
1504 !
1505  call qcsice(aisanl,glacir,amxice,aicice,aicsea,sllnd,slmask,
1506  & rla,rlo,len,me)
1507 !
1508 ! set ocean/land/sea-ice mask
1509 !
1510  call setlsi(slmask,aisanl,len,aicice,slianl)
1511 ! if(lprnt) print *,' aisanl=',aisanl(iprnt),' slianl='
1512 ! *,slianl(iprnt),' slmask=',slmask(iprnt)
1513 !
1514 !
1515  do k=1,lsoil
1516  do i=1,len
1517  if (slianl(i) .eq. 0) then
1518  smcanl(i,k) = smcomx
1519  stcanl(i,k) = tsfanl(i)
1520  endif
1521  enddo
1522  enddo
1523 
1524 ! write(6,*) 'slianl'
1525 ! znnt=1.
1526 ! call nntprt(slianl,len,znnt)
1527 !cwu [+8l]----------------------------------------------------------------------
1528  call qcmxmn('siha ',sihanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1529  & sihlmx,sihlmn,sihomx,sihomn,sihimx,sihimn,
1530  & sihjmx,sihjmn,sihsmx,sihsmn,epssih,
1531  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1532  call qcmxmn('sica ',sicanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1533  & siclmx,siclmn,sicomx,sicomn,sicimx,sicimn,
1534  & sicjmx,sicjmn,sicsmx,sicsmn,epssic,
1535  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1536 !
1537 ! set albedo over ocean to albomx
1538 !
1539  call albocn(albanl,slmask,albomx,len)
1540 !
1541 ! quality control of snow and sea-ice
1542 ! process snow depth or snow cover
1543 !
1544  if(fnsnoa(1:8).ne.' ') then
1545  call setzro(snoanl,epssno,len)
1546  call qcsnow(snoanl,slmask,aisanl,glacir,len,ten,landice,me)
1547  if (.not.landice) then
1548  call snodpth2(glacir,snosmx,snoanl, len, me)
1549  endif
1550  kqcm=1
1551  call snosfc(snoanl,tsfanl,tsfsmx,len,me)
1552  call qcmxmn('snoa ',snoanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1553  & snolmx,snolmn,snoomx,snoomn,snoimx,snoimn,
1554  & snojmx,snojmn,snosmx,snosmn,epssno,
1555  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1556  call getscv(snoanl,scvanl,len)
1557  call qcmxmn('sncva ',scvanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1558  & scvlmx,scvlmn,scvomx,scvomn,scvimx,scvimn,
1559  & scvjmx,scvjmn,scvsmx,scvsmn,epsscv,
1560  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1561  else
1562  crit=0.5
1563  call rof01(scvanl,len,'ge',crit)
1564  call qcsnow(scvanl,slmask,aisanl,glacir,len,one,landice,me)
1565  call qcmxmn('sncva ',scvanl,slianl,scvanl,icefl1,
1566  & scvlmx,scvlmn,scvomx,scvomn,scvimx,scvimn,
1567  & scvjmx,scvjmn,scvsmx,scvsmn,epsscv,
1568  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1569  call snodpth(scvanl,slianl,tsfanl,snoclm,
1570  & glacir,snwmax,snwmin,landice,len,snoanl,me)
1571  call qcsnow(scvanl,slmask,aisanl,glacir,len,snosmx,landice,me)
1572  call snosfc(snoanl,tsfanl,tsfsmx,len,me)
1573  call qcmxmn('snowa ',snoanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1574  & snolmx,snolmn,snoomx,snoomn,snoimx,snoimn,
1575  & snojmx,snojmn,snosmx,snosmn,epssno,
1576  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1577  endif
1578 !
1579  do i=1,len
1580  icefl2(i) = sicanl(i) .gt. 0.99999
1581  enddo
1582  call qcmxmn('tsfa ',tsfanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl2,
1583  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
1584  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
1585  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1586  do kk = 1, 4
1587  call qcmxmn('alba ',albanl(1,kk),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1588  & alblmx,alblmn,albomx,albomn,albimx,albimn,
1589  & albjmx,albjmn,albsmx,albsmn,epsalb,
1590  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1591  enddo
1592  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnweta(1:8).ne.' ' ) then
1593  call qcmxmn('weta ',wetanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1594  & wetlmx,wetlmn,wetomx,wetomn,wetimx,wetimn,
1595  & wetjmx,wetjmn,wetsmx,wetsmn,epswet,
1596  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1597  endif
1598  call qcmxmn('zora ',zoranl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1599  & zorlmx,zorlmn,zoromx,zoromn,zorimx,zorimn,
1600  & zorjmx,zorjmn,zorsmx,zorsmn,epszor,
1601  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1602 ! if(fnplrc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnplra(1:8).ne.' ' ) then
1603 ! call qcmxmn('plna ',plranl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1604 ! & plrlmx,plrlmn,plromx,plromn,plrimx,plrimn,
1605 ! & plrjmx,plrjmn,plrsmx,plrsmn,epsplr,
1606 ! & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1607 ! endif
1608  call qcmxmn('tg3a ',tg3anl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1609  & tg3lmx,tg3lmn,tg3omx,tg3omn,tg3imx,tg3imn,
1610  & tg3jmx,tg3jmn,tg3smx,tg3smn,epstg3,
1611  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1612 !
1613 ! get soil temp and moisture
1614 !
1615  if(fnsmca(1:8).eq.' ' .and. fnsmcc(1:8).eq.' ') then
1616  call getsmc(wetanl,len,lsoil,smcanl,me)
1617  endif
1618  call qcmxmn('smc1a ',smcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1619  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1620  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1621  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1622  call qcmxmn('smc2a ',smcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1623  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1624  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1625  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1626 !clu [+8l] add smcanl(3:4)
1627  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1628  call qcmxmn('smc3a ',smcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1629  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1630  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1631  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1632  call qcmxmn('smc4a ',smcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1633  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1634  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1635  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1636  endif
1637  if(fnstca(1:8).eq.' ') then
1638  call getstc(tsfanl,tg3anl,slianl,len,lsoil,stcanl,tsfimx)
1639  endif
1640  call qcmxmn('stc1a ',stcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1641  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1642  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1643  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1644  call qcmxmn('stc2a ',stcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1645  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1646  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1647  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1648 !clu [+8l] add stcanl(3:4)
1649  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1650  call qcmxmn('stc3a ',stcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1651  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1652  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1653  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1654  call qcmxmn('stc4a ',stcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1655  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1656  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1657  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1658  endif
1659  call qcmxmn('vega ',veganl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1660  & veglmx,veglmn,vegomx,vegomn,vegimx,vegimn,
1661  & vegjmx,vegjmn,vegsmx,vegsmn,epsveg,
1662  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1663  call qcmxmn('veta ',vetanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1664  & vetlmx,vetlmn,vetomx,vetomn,vetimx,vetimn,
1665  & vetjmx,vetjmn,vetsmx,vetsmn,epsvet,
1666  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1667  call qcmxmn('sota ',sotanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1668  & sotlmx,sotlmn,sotomx,sotomn,sotimx,sotimn,
1669  & sotjmx,sotjmn,sotsmx,sotsmn,epssot,
1670  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1671 !clu [+16l]----------------------------------------------------------------------
1672  call qcmxmn('vmna ',vmnanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1673  & vmnlmx,vmnlmn,vmnomx,vmnomn,vmnimx,vmnimn,
1674  & vmnjmx,vmnjmn,vmnsmx,vmnsmn,epsvmn,
1675  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1676  call qcmxmn('vmxa ',vmxanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1677  & vmxlmx,vmxlmn,vmxomx,vmxomn,vmximx,vmximn,
1678  & vmxjmx,vmxjmn,vmxsmx,vmxsmn,epsvmx,
1679  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1680  call qcmxmn('slpa ',slpanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1681  & slplmx,slplmn,slpomx,slpomn,slpimx,slpimn,
1682  & slpjmx,slpjmn,slpsmx,slpsmn,epsslp,
1683  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1684  call qcmxmn('absa ',absanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
1685  & abslmx,abslmn,absomx,absomn,absimx,absimn,
1686  & absjmx,absjmn,abssmx,abssmn,epsabs,
1687  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1688 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1689 !
1690 ! monitoring prints
1691 !
1692  if (monanl) then
1693  if (me .eq. 0) then
1694  print *,' '
1695  print *,'monitor of time and space interpolated analysis'
1696  print *,' '
1697 ! call count(slianl,snoanl,len)
1698  print *,' '
1699  call monitr('tsfanl',tsfanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1700  call monitr('albanl',albanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1701  call monitr('aisanl',aisanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1702  call monitr('snoanl',snoanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1703  call monitr('scvanl',scvanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1704  call monitr('smcanl1',smcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
1705  call monitr('smcanl2',smcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
1706  call monitr('stcanl1',stcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
1707  call monitr('stcanl2',stcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
1708 !clu [+4l] add smcanl(3:4) and stcanl(3:4)
1709  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1710  call monitr('smcanl3',smcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
1711  call monitr('smcanl4',smcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
1712  call monitr('stcanl3',stcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
1713  call monitr('stcanl4',stcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
1714  endif
1715  call monitr('tg3anl',tg3anl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1716  call monitr('zoranl',zoranl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1717 ! if (gaus) then
1718  call monitr('cvaanl',cvanl ,slianl,snoanl,len)
1719  call monitr('cvbanl',cvbanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1720  call monitr('cvtanl',cvtanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1721 ! endif
1722  call monitr('slianl',slianl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1723 ! call monitr('plranl',plranl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1724  call monitr('orog ',orog ,slianl,snoanl,len)
1725  call monitr('veganl',veganl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1726  call monitr('vetanl',vetanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1727  call monitr('sotanl',sotanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1728 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic
1729  call monitr('sihanl',sihanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1730  call monitr('sicanl',sicanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1731 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
1732  call monitr('vmnanl',vmnanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1733  call monitr('vmxanl',vmxanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1734  call monitr('slpanl',slpanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1735  call monitr('absanl',absanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
1736  endif
1737 
1738  endif
1739 !
1740 ! read in forecast fields if needed
1741 !
1742  if (me .eq. 0) then
1743  write(6,*) '=============='
1744  write(6,*) ' fcst guess'
1745  write(6,*) '=============='
1746  endif
1747 !
1748  percrit=critp2
1749 !
1750  if(deads) then
1751 !
1752 ! fill in guess array with analysis if dead start.
1753 !
1754  percrit=critp3
1755  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'this run is dead start run'
1756  call filfcs(tsffcs,wetfcs,snofcs,zorfcs,albfcs,
1757  & tg3fcs,cvfcs ,cvbfcs,cvtfcs,
1758  & cnpfcs,smcfcs,stcfcs,slifcs,aisfcs,
1759  & vegfcs,vetfcs,sotfcs,alffcs,
1760 !cwu [+1l] add ()fcs for sih, sic
1761  & sihfcs,sicfcs,
1762 !clu [+1l] add ()fcs for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
1763  & vmnfcs,vmxfcs,slpfcs,absfcs,
1764  & tsfanl,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,
1765  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
1766  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,aisanl,
1767  & veganl,vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,
1768 !cwu [+1l] add ()anl for sih, sic
1769  & sihanl,sicanl,
1770 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
1771  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
1772  & len,lsoil)
1773  if(sig1t(1).ne.0.) then
1774  call usesgt(sig1t,slianl,tg3anl,len,lsoil,tsffcs,stcfcs,
1775  & tsfimx)
1776  do i=1,len
1777  icefl2(i) = sicfcs(i) .gt. 0.99999
1778  enddo
1779  kqcm=1
1780  call qcmxmn('tsff ',tsffcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl2,
1781  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
1782  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
1783  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1784  call qcmxmn('stc1f ',stcfcs(1,1),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1785  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1786  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1787  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1788  call qcmxmn('stc2f ',stcfcs(1,2),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1789  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1790  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1791  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1792  endif
1793  else
1794  percrit=critp2
1795 !
1796 ! make reverse angulation correction to tsf
1797 ! make reverse orography correction to tg3
1798 !
1799  if (use_ufo) then
1800  orogd = orog - orog_uf
1801 !
1802 ! The tiled version of the substrate temperature is properly
1803 ! adjusted to the terrain. Only invoke when using the old
1804 ! global tg3 grib file.
1805 !
1806  if ( index(fntg3c, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! global file
1807  ztsfc = 1.0
1808  call tsfcor(tg3fcs,orogd,slmask,ztsfc,len,-rlapse)
1809  endif
1810  ztsfc = 0.
1811  call tsfcor(tsffcs,orogd,slmask,ztsfc,len,-rlapse)
1812  else
1813  ztsfc = 0.
1814  call tsfcor(tsffcs,orog,slmask,ztsfc,len,-rlapse)
1815  endif
1816 
1817 !clu [+12l] --------------------------------------------------------------
1818 !
1819 ! compute soil moisture liquid-to-total ratio over land
1820 !
1821  do j=1, lsoil
1822  do i=1, len
1823  if(smcfcs(i,j) .ne. 0.) then
1824  swratio(i,j) = slcfcs(i,j)/smcfcs(i,j)
1825  else
1826  swratio(i,j) = -999.
1827  endif
1828  enddo
1829  enddo
1830 !clu -----------------------------------------------------------------------
1831 !
1832  if(lqcbgs .and. irtacn .eq. 0) then
1833  call qcsli(slianl,slifcs,len,me)
1834  call albocn(albfcs,slmask,albomx,len)
1835  do i=1,len
1836  icefl2(i) = sicfcs(i) .gt. 0.99999
1837  enddo
1838  kqcm=1
1839  call qcmxmn('snof ',snofcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1840  & snolmx,snolmn,snoomx,snoomn,snoimx,snoimn,
1841  & snojmx,snojmn,snosmx,snosmn,epssno,
1842  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1843  call qcmxmn('tsff ',tsffcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl2,
1844  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
1845  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
1846  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1847  do kk = 1, 4
1848  call qcmxmn('albf ',albfcs(1,kk),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1849  & alblmx,alblmn,albomx,albomn,albimx,albimn,
1850  & albjmx,albjmn,albsmx,albsmn,epsalb,
1851  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1852  enddo
1853  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnweta(1:8).ne.' ' )
1854  & then
1855  call qcmxmn('wetf ',wetfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1856  & wetlmx,wetlmn,wetomx,wetomn,wetimx,wetimn,
1857  & wetjmx,wetjmn,wetsmx,wetsmn,epswet,
1858  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1859  endif
1860  call qcmxmn('zorf ',zorfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1861  & zorlmx,zorlmn,zoromx,zoromn,zorimx,zorimn,
1862  & zorjmx,zorjmn,zorsmx,zorsmn,epszor,
1863  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1864 ! if(fnplrc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnplra(1:8).ne.' ' )
1865 ! call qcmxmn('plnf ',plrfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1866 ! & plrlmx,plrlmn,plromx,plromn,plrimx,plrimn,
1867 ! & plrjmx,plrjmn,plrsmx,plrsmn,epsplr,
1868 ! & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1869 ! endif
1870  call qcmxmn('tg3f ',tg3fcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1871  & tg3lmx,tg3lmn,tg3omx,tg3omn,tg3imx,tg3imn,
1872  & tg3jmx,tg3jmn,tg3smx,tg3smn,epstg3,
1873  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1874 !cwu [+8l] ---------------------------------------------------------------
1875  call qcmxmn('sihf ',sihfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1876  & sihlmx,sihlmn,sihomx,sihomn,sihimx,sihimn,
1877  & sihjmx,sihjmn,sihsmx,sihsmn,epssih,
1878  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1879  call qcmxmn('sicf ',sicfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1880  & siclmx,siclmn,sicomx,sicomn,sicimx,sicimn,
1881  & sicjmx,sicjmn,sicsmx,sicsmn,epssic,
1882  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1883  call qcmxmn('smc1f ',smcfcs(1,1),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1884  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1885  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1886  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1887  call qcmxmn('smc2f ',smcfcs(1,2),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1888  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1889  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1890  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1891 !clu [+8l] add smcfcs(3:4)
1892  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1893  call qcmxmn('smc3f ',smcfcs(1,3),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1894  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1895  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1896  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1897  call qcmxmn('smc4f ',smcfcs(1,4),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1898  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
1899  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
1900  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1901  endif
1902  call qcmxmn('stc1f ',stcfcs(1,1),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1903  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1904  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1905  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1906  call qcmxmn('stc2f ',stcfcs(1,2),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1907  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1908  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1909  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1910 !clu [+8l] add stcfcs(3:4)
1911  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1912  call qcmxmn('stc3f ',stcfcs(1,3),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1913  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1914  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1915  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1916  call qcmxmn('stc4f ',stcfcs(1,4),slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1917  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
1918  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
1919  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1920  endif
1921  call qcmxmn('vegf ',vegfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1922  & veglmx,veglmn,vegomx,vegomn,vegimx,vegimn,
1923  & vegjmx,vegjmn,vegsmx,vegsmn,epsveg,
1924  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1925  call qcmxmn('vetf ',vetfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1926  & vetlmx,vetlmn,vetomx,vetomn,vetimx,vetimn,
1927  & vetjmx,vetjmn,vetsmx,vetsmn,epsvet,
1928  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1929  call qcmxmn('sotf ',sotfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1930  & sotlmx,sotlmn,sotomx,sotomn,sotimx,sotimn,
1931  & sotjmx,sotjmn,sotsmx,sotsmn,epssot,
1932  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1933 
1934 !clu [+16l] ---------------------------------------------------------------
1935  call qcmxmn('vmnf ',vmnfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1936  & vmnlmx,vmnlmn,vmnomx,vmnomn,vmnimx,vmnimn,
1937  & vmnjmx,vmnjmn,vmnsmx,vmnsmn,epsvmn,
1938  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1939  call qcmxmn('vmxf ',vmxfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1940  & vmxlmx,vmxlmn,vmxomx,vmxomn,vmximx,vmximn,
1941  & vmxjmx,vmxjmn,vmxsmx,vmxsmn,epsvmx,
1942  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1943  call qcmxmn('slpf ',slpfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1944  & slplmx,slplmn,slpomx,slpomn,slpimx,slpimn,
1945  & slpjmx,slpjmn,slpsmx,slpsmn,epsslp,
1946  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1947  call qcmxmn('absf ',absfcs,slifcs,snofcs,icefl1,
1948  & abslmx,abslmn,absomx,absomn,absimx,absimn,
1949  & absjmx,absjmn,abssmx,abssmn,epsabs,
1950  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
1951 !clu -----------------------------------------------------------------------
1952  endif
1953  endif
1954 !
1955  if (monfcs) then
1956  if (me .eq. 0) then
1957  print *,' '
1958  print *,'monitor of guess'
1959  print *,' '
1960 ! call count(slifcs,snofcs,len)
1961  print *,' '
1962  call monitr('tsffcs',tsffcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1963  call monitr('albfcs',albfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1964  call monitr('aisfcs',aisfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1965  call monitr('snofcs',snofcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1966  call monitr('smcfcs1',smcfcs(1,1),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1967  call monitr('smcfcs2',smcfcs(1,2),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1968  call monitr('stcfcs1',stcfcs(1,1),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1969  call monitr('stcfcs2',stcfcs(1,2),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1970 !clu [+4l] add smcfcs(3:4) and stcfcs(3:4)
1971  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
1972  call monitr('smcfcs3',smcfcs(1,3),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1973  call monitr('smcfcs4',smcfcs(1,4),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1974  call monitr('stcfcs3',stcfcs(1,3),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1975  call monitr('stcfcs4',stcfcs(1,4),slifcs,snofcs,len)
1976  endif
1977  call monitr('tg3fcs',tg3fcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1978  call monitr('zorfcs',zorfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1979 ! if (gaus) then
1980  call monitr('cvafcs',cvfcs ,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1981  call monitr('cvbfcs',cvbfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1982  call monitr('cvtfcs',cvtfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1983 ! endif
1984  call monitr('slifcs',slifcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1985 ! call monitr('plrfcs',plrfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1986  call monitr('orog ',orog ,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1987  call monitr('vegfcs',vegfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1988  call monitr('vetfcs',vetfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1989  call monitr('sotfcs',sotfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1990 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic
1991  call monitr('sihfcs',sihfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1992  call monitr('sicfcs',sicfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1993 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
1994  call monitr('vmnfcs',vmnfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1995  call monitr('vmxfcs',vmxfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1996  call monitr('slpfcs',slpfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1997  call monitr('absfcs',absfcs,slifcs,snofcs,len)
1998  endif
1999  endif
2000 !
2001 !... update annual cycle in the sst guess..
2002 !
2003 ! if(lprnt) print *,'tsfclm=',tsfclm(iprnt),' tsfcl2=',tsfcl2(iprnt)
2004 ! *,' tsffcs=',tsffcs(iprnt),' slianl=',slianl(iprnt)
2005 
2006  if (fh-deltsfc > -0.001 ) then
2007  do i=1,len
2008  if(slianl(i) == 0.0) then
2009  tsffcs(i) = tsffcs(i) + (tsfclm(i) - tsfcl2(i))
2010  endif
2011  enddo
2012  endif
2013 !
2014 ! quality control analysis using forecast guess
2015 !
2016  call qcbyfc(tsffcs,snofcs,qctsfs,qcsnos,qctsfi,len,lsoil,
2017  & snoanl,aisanl,slianl,tsfanl,albanl,
2018  & zoranl,smcanl,
2019  & smcclm,tsfsmx,albomx,zoromx,me)
2020 !
2021 ! blend climatology and predicted fields
2022 !
2023  if(me .eq. 0) then
2024  write(6,*) '=============='
2025  write(6,*) ' merging'
2026  write(6,*) '=============='
2027  endif
2028 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsffcs=',tsffcs(iprnt)
2029 !
2030  percrit=critp3
2031 !
2032 ! merge analysis and forecast. note tg3, ais are not merged
2033 !
2034  call merge(len,lsoil,iy,im,id,ih,fh,deltsfc,
2035  & sihfcs,sicfcs,
2036  & vmnfcs,vmxfcs,slpfcs,absfcs,
2037  & tsffcs,wetfcs,snofcs,zorfcs,albfcs,aisfcs,
2038  & cvfcs ,cvbfcs,cvtfcs,
2039  & cnpfcs,smcfcs,stcfcs,slifcs,vegfcs,
2040  & vetfcs,sotfcs,alffcs,
2041  & sihanl,sicanl,
2042  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
2043  & tsfanl,tsfan2,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,aisanl,
2044  & cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
2045  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,veganl,
2046  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,
2047  & ctsfl,calbl,caisl,csnol,csmcl,czorl,cstcl,cvegl,
2048  & ctsfs,calbs,caiss,csnos,csmcs,czors,cstcs,cvegs,
2049  & ccv,ccvb,ccvt,ccnp,cvetl,cvets,csotl,csots,
2050  & calfl,calfs,
2051  & csihl,csihs,csicl,csics,
2052  & cvmnl,cvmns,cvmxl,cvmxs,cslpl,cslps,cabsl,cabss,
2053  & irttsf,irtwet,irtsno,irtzor,irtalb,irtais,
2054  & irttg3,irtscv,irtacn,irtsmc,irtstc,irtveg,
2055  & irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs,
2056  & irtvet,irtsot,irtalf,landice,me)
2057 
2058  call setzro(snoanl,epssno,len)
2059 
2060 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tanlm=',tsfanl(iprnt),' tfcsm=',tsffcs(iprnt)
2061 ! if(lprnt) print *,' sliam=',slianl(iprnt),' slifm=',slifcs(iprnt)
2062 
2063 !
2064 ! new ice/melted ice
2065 !
2066  call newice(slianl,slifcs,tsfanl,tsffcs,len,lsoil,
2067 !cwu [+1l] add sihnew, aislim, sihanl & sicanl
2068  & sihnew,aislim,sihanl,sicanl,
2069  & albanl,snoanl,zoranl,smcanl,stcanl,
2070  & albomx,snoomx,zoromx,smcomx,smcimx,
2071 !cwu [-1l/+1l] change albimx to albimn - note albimx & albimn have been modified
2072 ! & tsfomn,tsfimx,albimx,zorimx,tgice,
2073  & tsfomn,tsfimx,albimn,zorimx,tgice,
2074  & rla,rlo,me)
2075 
2076 ! if(lprnt) print *,'tsfanl=',tsfanl(iprnt),' tsffcs=',tsffcs(iprnt)
2077 ! if(lprnt) print *,' slian=',slianl(iprnt),' slifn=',slifcs(iprnt)
2078 !
2079 ! set tsfc to tsnow over snow
2080 !
2081  call snosfc(snoanl,tsfanl,tsfsmx,len,me)
2082 !
2083  do i=1,len
2084  icefl2(i) = sicanl(i) .gt. 0.99999
2085  enddo
2086  kqcm=0
2087  call qcmxmn('snowm ',snoanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2088  & snolmx,snolmn,snoomx,snoomn,snoimx,snoimn,
2089  & snojmx,snojmn,snosmx,snosmn,epssno,
2090  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2091  call qcmxmn('tsfm ',tsfanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl2,
2092  & tsflmx,tsflmn,tsfomx,tsfomn,tsfimx,tsfimn,
2093  & tsfjmx,tsfjmn,tsfsmx,tsfsmn,epstsf,
2094  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2095  do kk = 1, 4
2096  call qcmxmn('albm ',albanl(1,kk),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2097  & alblmx,alblmn,albomx,albomn,albimx,albimn,
2098  & albjmx,albjmn,albsmx,albsmn,epsalb,
2099  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2100  enddo
2101  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnweta(1:8).ne.' ' )
2102  & then
2103  call qcmxmn('wetm ',wetanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2104  & wetlmx,wetlmn,wetomx,wetomn,wetimx,wetimn,
2105  & wetjmx,wetjmn,wetsmx,wetsmn,epswet,
2106  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2107  endif
2108  call qcmxmn('zorm ',zoranl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2109  & zorlmx,zorlmn,zoromx,zoromn,zorimx,zorimn,
2110  & zorjmx,zorjmn,zorsmx,zorsmn,epszor,
2111  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2112 ! if(fnplrc(1:8).ne.' ' .or. fnplra(1:8).ne.' ' )
2113 ! & then
2114 ! call qcmxmn('plntm ',plranl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2115 ! & plrlmx,plrlmn,plromx,plromn,plrimx,plrimn,
2116 ! & plrjmx,plrjmn,plrsmx,plrsmn,epsplr,
2117 ! & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2118 ! endif
2119  call qcmxmn('stc1m ',stcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2120  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
2121  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
2122  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2123  call qcmxmn('stc2m ',stcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2124  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
2125  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
2126  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2127 !clu [+8l] add stcanl(3:4)
2128  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
2129  call qcmxmn('stc3m ',stcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2130  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
2131  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
2132  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2133  call qcmxmn('stc4m ',stcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2134  & stclmx,stclmn,stcomx,stcomn,stcimx,stcimn,
2135  & stcjmx,stcjmn,stcsmx,stcsmn,eptsfc,
2136  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2137  endif
2138  call qcmxmn('smc1m ',smcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2139  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
2140  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
2141  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2142  call qcmxmn('smc2m ',smcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2143  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
2144  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
2145  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2146 !clu [+8l] add smcanl(3:4)
2147  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
2148  call qcmxmn('smc3m ',smcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2149  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
2150  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
2151  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2152  call qcmxmn('smc4m ',smcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2153  & smclmx,smclmn,smcomx,smcomn,smcimx,smcimn,
2154  & smcjmx,smcjmn,smcsmx,smcsmn,epssmc,
2155  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2156  endif
2157  kqcm=1
2158  call qcmxmn('vegm ',veganl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2159  & veglmx,veglmn,vegomx,vegomn,vegimx,vegimn,
2160  & vegjmx,vegjmn,vegsmx,vegsmn,epsveg,
2161  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2162  call qcmxmn('vetm ',vetanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2163  & vetlmx,vetlmn,vetomx,vetomn,vetimx,vetimn,
2164  & vetjmx,vetjmn,vetsmx,vetsmn,epsvet,
2165  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2166  call qcmxmn('sotm ',sotanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2167  & sotlmx,sotlmn,sotomx,sotomn,sotimx,sotimn,
2168  & sotjmx,sotjmn,sotsmx,sotsmn,epssot,
2169  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2170 !cwu [+8l] add sih, sic,
2171  call qcmxmn('sihm ',sihanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2172  & sihlmx,sihlmn,sihomx,sihomn,sihimx,sihimn,
2173  & sihjmx,sihjmn,sihsmx,sihsmn,epssih,
2174  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2175  call qcmxmn('sicm ',sicanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2176  & siclmx,siclmn,sicomx,sicomn,sicimx,sicimn,
2177  & sicjmx,sicjmn,sicsmx,sicsmn,epssic,
2178  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2179 !clu [+16l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
2180  call qcmxmn('vmnm ',vmnanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2181  & vmnlmx,vmnlmn,vmnomx,vmnomn,vmnimx,vmnimn,
2182  & vmnjmx,vmnjmn,vmnsmx,vmnsmn,epsvmn,
2183  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2184  call qcmxmn('vmxm ',vmxanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2185  & vmxlmx,vmxlmn,vmxomx,vmxomn,vmximx,vmximn,
2186  & vmxjmx,vmxjmn,vmxsmx,vmxsmn,epsvmx,
2187  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2188  call qcmxmn('slpm ',slpanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2189  & slplmx,slplmn,slpomx,slpomn,slpimx,slpimn,
2190  & slpjmx,slpjmn,slpsmx,slpsmn,epsslp,
2191  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2192  call qcmxmn('absm ',absanl,slianl,snoanl,icefl1,
2193  & abslmx,abslmn,absomx,absomn,absimx,absimn,
2194  & absjmx,absjmn,abssmx,abssmn,epsabs,
2195  & rla,rlo,len,kqcm,percrit,lgchek,me)
2196 
2197 !
2198  if(me .eq. 0) then
2199  write(6,*) '=============='
2200  write(6,*) 'final results'
2201  write(6,*) '=============='
2202  endif
2203 !
2204 ! foreward correction to tg3 and tsf at the last stage
2205 !
2206 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsfbc=',tsfanl(iprnt)
2207  if (use_ufo) then
2208 !
2209 ! The tiled version of the substrate temperature is properly
2210 ! adjusted to the terrain. Only invoke when using the old
2211 ! global tg3 grib file.
2212 !
2213  if ( index(fntg3c, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! global file
2214  ztsfc = 1.
2215  call tsfcor(tg3anl,orogd,slmask,ztsfc,len,rlapse)
2216  endif
2217  ztsfc = 0.
2218  call tsfcor(tsfanl,orogd,slmask,ztsfc,len,rlapse)
2219  else
2220  ztsfc = 0.
2221  call tsfcor(tsfanl,orog,slmask,ztsfc,len,rlapse)
2222  endif
2223 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsfaf=',tsfanl(iprnt)
2224 !
2225 ! check the final merged product
2226 !
2227  if (monmer) then
2228  if(me .eq. 0) then
2229  print *,' '
2230  print *,'monitor of updated surface fields'
2231  print *,' (includes angulation correction)'
2232  print *,' '
2233 ! call count(slianl,snoanl,len)
2234  print *,' '
2235  call monitr('tsfanl',tsfanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2236  call monitr('albanl',albanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2237  call monitr('aisanl',aisanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2238  call monitr('snoanl',snoanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2239  call monitr('smcanl1',smcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
2240  call monitr('smcanl2',smcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
2241  call monitr('stcanl1',stcanl(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
2242  call monitr('stcanl2',stcanl(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
2243 !clu [+4l] add smcanl(3:4) and stcanl(3:4)
2244  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
2245  call monitr('smcanl3',smcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
2246  call monitr('smcanl4',smcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
2247  call monitr('stcanl3',stcanl(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
2248  call monitr('stcanl4',stcanl(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
2249  call monitr('tg3anl',tg3anl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2250  call monitr('zoranl',zoranl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2251  endif
2252 ! if (gaus) then
