2253  call monitr('cvaanl',cvanl ,slianl,snoanl,len)
2254  call monitr('cvbanl',cvbanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2255  call monitr('cvtanl',cvtanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2256 ! endif
2257  call monitr('slianl',slianl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2258 ! call monitr('plranl',plranl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2259  call monitr('orog ',orog ,slianl,snoanl,len)
2260  call monitr('cnpanl',cnpanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2261  call monitr('veganl',veganl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2262  call monitr('vetanl',vetanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2263  call monitr('sotanl',sotanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2264 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic,
2265  call monitr('sihanl',sihanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2266  call monitr('sicanl',sicanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2267 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
2268  call monitr('vmnanl',vmnanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2269  call monitr('vmxanl',vmxanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2270  call monitr('slpanl',slpanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2271  call monitr('absanl',absanl,slianl,snoanl,len)
2272  endif
2273  endif
2274 !
2275  if (mondif) then
2276  do i=1,len
2277  tsffcs(i) = tsfanl(i) - tsffcs(i)
2278  snofcs(i) = snoanl(i) - snofcs(i)
2279  tg3fcs(i) = tg3anl(i) - tg3fcs(i)
2280  zorfcs(i) = zoranl(i) - zorfcs(i)
2281 ! plrfcs(i) = plranl(i) - plrfcs(i)
2282 ! albfcs(i) = albanl(i) - albfcs(i)
2283  slifcs(i) = slianl(i) - slifcs(i)
2284  aisfcs(i) = aisanl(i) - aisfcs(i)
2285  cnpfcs(i) = cnpanl(i) - cnpfcs(i)
2286  vegfcs(i) = veganl(i) - vegfcs(i)
2287  vetfcs(i) = vetanl(i) - vetfcs(i)
2288  sotfcs(i) = sotanl(i) - sotfcs(i)
2289 !clu [+2l] add sih, sic
2290  sihfcs(i) = sihanl(i) - sihfcs(i)
2291  sicfcs(i) = sicanl(i) - sicfcs(i)
2292 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
2293  vmnfcs(i) = vmnanl(i) - vmnfcs(i)
2294  vmxfcs(i) = vmxanl(i) - vmxfcs(i)
2295  slpfcs(i) = slpanl(i) - slpfcs(i)
2296  absfcs(i) = absanl(i) - absfcs(i)
2297  enddo
2298  do j = 1,lsoil
2299  do i = 1,len
2300  smcfcs(i,j) = smcanl(i,j) - smcfcs(i,j)
2301  stcfcs(i,j) = stcanl(i,j) - stcfcs(i,j)
2302  enddo
2303  enddo
2304  do j = 1,4
2305  do i = 1,len
2306  albfcs(i,j) = albanl(i,j) - albfcs(i,j)
2307  enddo
2308  enddo
2309 !
2310 ! monitoring prints
2311 !
2312  if(me .eq. 0) then
2313  print *,' '
2314  print *,'monitor of difference'
2315  print *,' (includes angulation correction)'
2316  print *,' '
2317  call monitr('tsfdif',tsffcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2318  call monitr('albdif',albfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2319  call monitr('albdif1',albfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2320  call monitr('albdif2',albfcs(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
2321  call monitr('albdif3',albfcs(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
2322  call monitr('albdif4',albfcs(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
2323  call monitr('aisdif',aisfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2324  call monitr('snodif',snofcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2325  call monitr('smcanl1',smcfcs(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
2326  call monitr('smcanl2',smcfcs(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
2327  call monitr('stcanl1',stcfcs(1,1),slianl,snoanl,len)
2328  call monitr('stcanl2',stcfcs(1,2),slianl,snoanl,len)
2329 !clu [+4l] add smcfcs(3:4) and stc(3:4)
2330  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
2331  call monitr('smcanl3',smcfcs(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
2332  call monitr('smcanl4',smcfcs(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
2333  call monitr('stcanl3',stcfcs(1,3),slianl,snoanl,len)
2334  call monitr('stcanl4',stcfcs(1,4),slianl,snoanl,len)
2335  endif
2336  call monitr('tg3dif',tg3fcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2337  call monitr('zordif',zorfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2338 ! if (gaus) then
2339  call monitr('cvadif',cvfcs ,slianl,snoanl,len)
2340  call monitr('cvbdif',cvbfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2341  call monitr('cvtdif',cvtfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2342 ! endif
2343  call monitr('slidif',slifcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2344 ! call monitr('plrdif',plrfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2345  call monitr('cnpdif',cnpfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2346  call monitr('vegdif',vegfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2347  call monitr('vetdif',vetfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2348  call monitr('sotdif',sotfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2349 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic
2350  call monitr('sihdif',sihfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2351  call monitr('sicdif',sicfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2352 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
2353  call monitr('vmndif',vmnfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2354  call monitr('vmxdif',vmxfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2355  call monitr('slpdif',slpfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2356  call monitr('absdif',absfcs,slianl,snoanl,len)
2357  endif
2358  endif
2359 !
2360 !
2361  do i=1,len
2362  tsffcs(i) = tsfanl(i)
2363  snofcs(i) = snoanl(i)
2364  tg3fcs(i) = tg3anl(i)
2365  zorfcs(i) = zoranl(i)
2366 ! plrfcs(i) = plranl(i)
2367 ! albfcs(i) = albanl(i)
2368  slifcs(i) = slianl(i)
2369  aisfcs(i) = aisanl(i)
2370  cvfcs(i) = cvanl(i)
2371  cvbfcs(i) = cvbanl(i)
2372  cvtfcs(i) = cvtanl(i)
2373  cnpfcs(i) = cnpanl(i)
2374  vegfcs(i) = veganl(i)
2375  vetfcs(i) = vetanl(i)
2376  sotfcs(i) = sotanl(i)
2377 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
2378  vmnfcs(i) = vmnanl(i)
2379  vmxfcs(i) = vmxanl(i)
2380  slpfcs(i) = slpanl(i)
2381  absfcs(i) = absanl(i)
2382  enddo
2383  do j = 1,lsoil
2384  do i = 1,len
2385  smcfcs(i,j) = smcanl(i,j)
2386  if (slifcs(i) .gt. 0.0) then
2387  stcfcs(i,j) = stcanl(i,j)
2388  else
2389  stcfcs(i,j) = tsffcs(i)
2390  endif
2391  enddo
2392  enddo
2393  do j = 1,4
2394  do i = 1,len
2395  albfcs(i,j) = albanl(i,j)
2396  enddo
2397  enddo
2398  do j = 1,2
2399  do i = 1,len
2400  alffcs(i,j) = alfanl(i,j)
2401  enddo
2402  enddo
2403 
2404 !cwu [+20l] update sihfcs, sicfcs. remove sea ice over non-ice points
2405  crit=aislim
2406  do i=1,len
2407  sihfcs(i) = sihanl(i)
2408  sitfcs(i) = tsffcs(i)
2409  if (slifcs(i).ge.2.) then
2410  if (sicfcs(i).gt.crit) then
2411  tsffcs(i) = (sicanl(i)*tsffcs(i)
2412  & + (sicfcs(i)-sicanl(i))*tgice)/sicfcs(i)
2413  sitfcs(i) = (tsffcs(i)-tgice*(1.0-sicfcs(i))) / sicfcs(i)
2414  else
2415  tsffcs(i) = tsfanl(i)
2416 ! tsffcs(i) = tgice
2417  sihfcs(i) = sihnew
2418  endif
2419  endif
2420  sicfcs(i) = sicanl(i)
2421  enddo
2422  do i=1,len
2423  if (slifcs(i).lt.1.5) then
2424  sihfcs(i) = 0.
2425  sicfcs(i) = 0.
2426  sitfcs(i) = tsffcs(i)
2427  else if ((slifcs(i).ge.1.5).and.(sicfcs(i).lt.crit)) then
2428  print *,'warning: check, slifcs and sicfcs',
2429  & slifcs(i),sicfcs(i)
2430  endif
2431  enddo
2432 
2433 !
2434 ! ensure the consistency between slc and smc
2435 !
2436  do k=1, lsoil
2437  fixratio(k) = .false.
2438  if (fsmcl(k).lt.99999.) fixratio(k) = .true.
2439  enddo
2440 
2441  if(me .eq. 0) then
2442  print *,'dbgx --fixratio:',(fixratio(k),k=1,lsoil)
2443  endif
2444 
2445  do k=1, lsoil
2446  if(fixratio(k)) then
2447  do i = 1, len
2448  if(swratio(i,k) .eq. -999.) then
2449  slcfcs(i,k) = smcfcs(i,k)
2450  else
2451  slcfcs(i,k) = swratio(i,k) * smcfcs(i,k)
2452  endif
2453  if (slifcs(i) .ne. 1.0) slcfcs(i,k) = 1.0 ! flag value for non-land points.
2454  enddo
2455  endif
2456  enddo
2457 ! set liquid soil moisture to a flag value of 1.0
2458  if (landice) then
2459  do i = 1, len
2460  if (slifcs(i) .eq. 1.0 .and.
2461  & nint(vetfcs(i)) == veg_type_landice) then
2462  do k=1, lsoil
2463  slcfcs(i,k) = 1.0
2464  enddo
2465  endif
2466  enddo
2467  end if
2468 !
2469 ! ensure the consistency between snwdph and sheleg
2470 !
2471  if(fsnol .lt. 99999.) then
2472  if(me .eq. 0) then
2473  print *,'dbgx -- scale snwdph from sheleg'
2474  endif
2475  do i = 1, len
2476  if(slifcs(i).eq.1.) swdfcs(i) = 10.* snofcs(i)
2477  enddo
2478  endif
2479 
2480 ! sea ice model only uses the liquid equivalent depth.
2481 ! so update the physical depth only for display purposes.
2482 ! use the same 3:1 ratio used by ice model.
2483 
2484  do i = 1, len
2485  if (slifcs(i).ne.1) swdfcs(i) = 3.*snofcs(i)
2486  enddo
2487 
2488  do i = 1, len
2489  if(slifcs(i).eq.1.) then
2490  if(snofcs(i).ne.0. .and. swdfcs(i).eq.0.) then
2491  print *,'dbgx --scale snwdph from sheleg',
2492  + i, swdfcs(i), snofcs(i)
2493  swdfcs(i) = 10.* snofcs(i)
2494  endif
2495  endif
2496  enddo
2497 ! landice mods - impose same minimum snow depth at
2498 ! landice as noah lsm. also ensure
2499 ! lower thermal boundary condition
2500 ! and skin t is no warmer than freezing
2501 ! after adjustment to terrain.
2502  if (landice) then
2503  do i = 1, len
2504  if (slifcs(i) .eq. 1.0 .and.
2505  & nint(vetfcs(i)) == veg_type_landice) then
2506  snofcs(i) = max(snofcs(i),100.0) ! in mm
2507  swdfcs(i) = max(swdfcs(i),1000.0) ! in mm
2508  tg3fcs(i) = min(tg3fcs(i),273.15)
2509  tsffcs(i) = min(tsffcs(i),273.15)
2510  endif
2511  enddo
2512  end if
2513 !
2514 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsffcsf=',tsffcs(iprnt)
2515  return
2516  end subroutine sfccycle
2517  subroutine count(slimsk,sno,ijmax)
2518  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2519  implicit none
2520  real (kind=kind_io8) rl3,rl1,rl0,rl2,rl6,rl7,rl4,rl5
2521  integer l8,l7,l1,l2,ijmax,l0,l3,l5,l6,l4,ij
2522 !
2523  real (kind=kind_io8) slimsk(1),sno(1)
2524 !
2525 ! count number of points for the four surface conditions
2526 !
2527  l0 = 0
2528  l1 = 0
2529  l2 = 0
2530  l3 = 0
2531  l4 = 0
2532  do ij=1,ijmax
2533  if(slimsk(ij).eq.0.) l1 = l1 + 1
2534  if(slimsk(ij).eq.1. .and. sno(ij).le.0.) l0 = l0 + 1
2535  if(slimsk(ij).eq.2. .and. sno(ij).le.0.) l2 = l2 + 1
2536  if(slimsk(ij).eq.1. .and. sno(ij).gt.0.) l3 = l3 + 1
2537  if(slimsk(ij).eq.2. .and. sno(ij).gt.0.) l4 = l4 + 1
2538  enddo
2539  l5 = l0 + l3
2540  l6 = l2 + l4
2541  l7 = l1 + l6
2542  l8 = l1 + l5 + l6
2543  rl0 = float(l0) / float(l8)*100.
2544  rl3 = float(l3) / float(l8)*100.
2545  rl1 = float(l1) / float(l8)*100.
2546  rl2 = float(l2) / float(l8)*100.
2547  rl4 = float(l4) / float(l8)*100.
2548  rl5 = float(l5) / float(l8)*100.
2549  rl6 = float(l6) / float(l8)*100.
2550  rl7 = float(l7) / float(l8)*100.
2551  print *,'1) no. of not snow-covered land points ',l0,' ',rl0,' '
2552  print *,'2) no. of snow covered land points ',l3,' ',rl3,' '
2553  print *,'3) no. of open sea points ',l1,' ',rl1,' '
2554  print *,'4) no. of not snow-covered seaice points ',l2,' ',rl2,' '
2555  print *,'5) no. of snow covered sea ice points ',l4,' ',rl4,' '
2556  print *,' '
2557  print *,'6) no. of land points ',l5,' ',rl5,' '
2558  print *,'7) no. sea points (including sea ice) ',l7,' ',rl7,' '
2559  print *,' (no. of sea ice points) (',l6,')',' ',rl6,' '
2560  print *,' '
2561  print *,'9) no. of total grid points ',l8
2562 ! print *,' '
2563 ! print *,' '
2564 
2565 !
2566 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsffcsf=',tsffcs(iprnt)
2567  return
2568  end
2569  subroutine monitr(lfld,fld,slimsk,sno,ijmax)
2570  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2571  implicit none
2572  integer ij,n,ijmax
2573 !
2574  real (kind=kind_io8) fld(ijmax), slimsk(ijmax),sno(ijmax)
2575 !
2576  real (kind=kind_io8) rmax(5),rmin(5)
2577  character(len=*) lfld
2578 !
2579 ! find max/min
2580 !
2581  do n=1,5
2582  rmax(n) = -9.e20
2583  rmin(n) = 9.e20
2584  enddo
2585 !
2586  do ij=1,ijmax
2587  if(slimsk(ij).eq.0.) then
2588  rmax(1) = max(rmax(1), fld(ij))
2589  rmin(1) = min(rmin(1), fld(ij))
2590  elseif(slimsk(ij).eq.1.) then
2591  if(sno(ij).le.0.) then
2592  rmax(2) = max(rmax(2), fld(ij))
2593  rmin(2) = min(rmin(2), fld(ij))
2594  else
2595  rmax(4) = max(rmax(4), fld(ij))
2596  rmin(4) = min(rmin(4), fld(ij))
2597  endif
2598  else
2599  if(sno(ij).le.0.) then
2600  rmax(3) = max(rmax(3), fld(ij))
2601  rmin(3) = min(rmin(3), fld(ij))
2602  else
2603  rmax(5) = max(rmax(5), fld(ij))
2604  rmin(5) = min(rmin(5), fld(ij))
2605  endif
2606  endif
2607  enddo
2608 !
2609  print 100,lfld
2610  print 101,rmax(1),rmin(1)
2611  print 102,rmax(2),rmin(2), rmax(4), rmin(4)
2612  print 103,rmax(3),rmin(3), rmax(5), rmin(5)
2613 !
2614 ! print 102,rmax(2),rmin(2)
2615 ! print 103,rmax(3),rmin(3)
2616 ! print 104,rmax(4),rmin(4)
2617 ! print 105,rmax(5),rmin(5)
2618  100 format('0 *** ',a8,' ***')
2619  101 format(' open sea ......... max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2620  102 format(' land nosnow/snow .. max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4
2621  &, ' max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2622  103 format(' seaice nosnow/snow max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4
2623  &, ' max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2624 !
2625 ! 100 format('0',2x,'*** ',a8,' ***')
2626 ! 102 format(2x,' land without snow ..... max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2627 ! 103 format(2x,' seaice without snow ... max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2628 ! 104 format(2x,' land with snow ........ max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2629 ! 105 format(2x,' sea ice with snow ..... max=',e12.4,' min=',e12.4)
2630 !
2631  return
2632  end
2633  subroutine dayoyr(iyr,imo,idy,ldy)
2634  implicit none
2635  integer ldy,i,idy,iyr,imo
2636 !
2637 ! this routine figures out the day of the year given imo and idy
2638 !
2639  integer month(13)
2640  data month/0,31,28,31,30,31,30,31,31,30,31,30,31/
2641  if(mod(iyr,4).eq.0) month(3) = 29
2642  ldy = idy
2643  do i = 1, imo
2644  ldy = ldy + month(i)
2645  enddo
2646  return
2647  end
2648  subroutine hmskrd(lugb,imsk,jmsk,fnmskh,
2649  & kpds5,slmskh,gausm,blnmsk,bltmsk,me)
2650  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2651  use sfccyc_module, only : mdata, xdata, ydata
2652  implicit none
2653  integer kpds5,me,i,imsk,jmsk,lugb
2654 !
2655  character*500 fnmskh
2656 !
2657  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(mdata)
2658  logical gausm
2659  real (kind=kind_io8) blnmsk,bltmsk
2660 !
2661  imsk = xdata
2662  jmsk = ydata
2663 
2664  if (me .eq. 0) then
2665  write(6,*)' imsk=',imsk,' jmsk=',jmsk,' xdata=',xdata,' ydata='
2666  &, ydata
2667  endif
2668 
2669  call fixrdg(lugb,imsk,jmsk,fnmskh,
2670  & kpds5,slmskh,gausm,blnmsk,bltmsk,me)
2671 
2672 ! print *,'in sfc_sub, aft fixrdg,slmskh=',maxval(slmskh),
2673 ! & minval(slmskh),'mdata=',mdata,'imsk*jmsk=',imsk*jmsk
2674 
2675  do i=1,imsk*jmsk
2676  slmskh(i) = nint(slmskh(i))
2677  enddo
2678 !
2679  return
2680  end
2681  subroutine fixrdg(lugb,idim,jdim,fngrib,
2682  & kpds5,gdata,gaus,blno,blto,me)
2683  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2684  use sfccyc_module, only : mdata
2685  implicit none
2686  integer lgrib,n,lskip,jret,j,ndata,lugi,jdim,idim,lugb,
2687  & iret, me,kpds5,kdata,i,w3kindreal,w3kindint
2688 !
2689  character*(*) fngrib
2690 !
2691  real (kind=kind_io8) gdata(idim*jdim)
2692  logical gaus
2693  real (kind=kind_io8) blno,blto
2694  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: data8(:)
2695  real (kind=kind_io4), allocatable :: data4(:)
2696 !
2697  logical*1, allocatable :: lbms(:)
2698 !
2699  integer kpds(200),kgds(200)
2700  integer jpds(200),jgds(200), kpds0(200)
2701 !
2702  allocate(data8(1:idim*jdim))
2703  allocate(lbms(1:mdata))
2704  kpds = 0
2705  kgds = 0
2706  jpds = 0
2707  jgds = 0
2708  kpds0 = 0
2709 !
2710 ! if(me .eq. 0) then
2711 ! write(6,*) ' '
2712 ! write(6,*) '************************************************'
2713 ! endif
2714 !
2715  close(lugb)
2716  call baopenr(lugb,fngrib,iret)
2717  if (iret .ne. 0) then
2718  write(6,*) ' error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
2719  print *,'error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
2720  call abort
2721  endif
2722  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' file ',trim(fngrib),
2723  & ' opened. unit=',lugb
2724  lugi = 0
2725  lskip = -1
2726  n = 0
2727  jpds = -1
2728  jgds = -1
2729  jpds(5) = kpds5
2730  kpds = jpds
2731 !
2732  call getgbh(lugb,lugi,lskip,jpds,jgds,lgrib,ndata,
2733  & lskip,kpds,kgds,iret)
2734 !
2735  if(me .eq. 0) then
2736  write(6,*) ' first grib record.'
2737  write(6,*) ' kpds( 1-10)=',(kpds(j),j= 1,10)
2738  write(6,*) ' kpds(11-20)=',(kpds(j),j=11,20)
2739  write(6,*) ' kpds(21- )=',(kpds(j),j=21,22)
2740  endif
2741 !
2742  kpds0=jpds
2743  kpds0(4)=-1
2744  kpds0(18)=-1
2745  if(iret.ne.0) then
2746  write(6,*) ' error in getgbh. iret: ', iret
2747  if (iret == 99) write(6,*) ' field not found.'
2748  call abort
2749  endif
2750 !
2751  jpds = kpds0
2752  lskip = -1
2753  kdata=idim*jdim
2754  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
2755  if (w3kindreal == 8) then
2756  call getgb(lugb,lugi,kdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
2757  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data8,jret)
2758  else if (w3kindreal == 4) then
2759  allocate(data4(1:idim*jdim))
2760  call getgb(lugb,lugi,kdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
2761  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data4,jret)
2762  data8 = real(data4, kind=kind_io8)
2763  deallocate(data4)
2764  else
2765  write(0,*)' Invalid w3kindreal --- aborting'
2766  call abort
2767  endif
2768 !
2769  if(jret == 0) then
2770  if(ndata.eq.0) then
2771  write(6,*) ' error in getgb'
2772  write(6,*) ' kpds=',kpds
2773  write(6,*) ' kgds=',kgds
2774  call abort
2775  endif
2776  idim = kgds(2)
2777  jdim = kgds(3)
2778  gaus = kgds(1).eq.4
2779  blno = kgds(5)*1.d-3
2780  blto = kgds(4)*1.d-3
2781  gdata(1:idim*jdim) = data8(1:idim*jdim)
2782  if (me == 0) write(6,*) 'idim,jdim=',idim,jdim
2783  &, ' gaus=',gaus,' blno=',blno,' blto=',blto
2784  else
2785  if (me ==. 0) write(6,*) 'idim,jdim=',idim,jdim
2786  &, ' gaus=',gaus,' blno=',blno,' blto=',blto
2787  write(6,*) ' error in getgb : jret=',jret
2788  write(6,*) ' kpds(13)=',kpds(13),' kpds(15)=',kpds(15)
2789  call abort
2790  endif
2791 !
2792  deallocate(data8)
2793  deallocate(lbms)
2794  return
2795  end
2796  subroutine getarea(kgds,dlat,dlon,rslat,rnlat,wlon,elon,ijordr
2797  &, me)
2798  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2799  implicit none
2800  integer j,me,kgds11
2801  real (kind=kind_io8) f0lon,f0lat,elon,dlon,dlat,rslat,wlon,rnlat
2802 !
2803 ! get area of the grib record
2804 !
2805  integer kgds(22)
2806  logical ijordr
2807 !
2808  if (me .eq. 0) then
2809  write(6,*) ' kgds( 1-12)=',(kgds(j),j= 1,12)
2810  write(6,*) ' kgds(13-22)=',(kgds(j),j=13,22)
2811  endif
2812 !
2813  if(kgds(1).eq.0) then ! lat/lon grid
2814 !
2815  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'lat/lon grid'
2816  dlat = float(kgds(10)) * 0.001
2817  dlon = float(kgds( 9)) * 0.001
2818  f0lon = float(kgds(5)) * 0.001
2819  f0lat = float(kgds(4)) * 0.001
2820  kgds11 = kgds(11)
2821  if(kgds11.ge.128) then
2822  wlon = f0lon - dlon*(kgds(2)-1)
2823  elon = f0lon
2824  if(dlon*kgds(2).gt.359.99) then
2825  wlon =f0lon - dlon*kgds(2)
2826  endif
2827  dlon = -dlon
2828  kgds11 = kgds11 - 128
2829  else
2830  wlon = f0lon
2831  elon = f0lon + dlon*(kgds(2)-1)
2832  if(dlon*kgds(2).gt.359.99) then
2833  elon = f0lon + dlon*kgds(2)
2834  endif
2835  endif
2836  if(kgds11.ge.64) then
2837  rnlat = f0lat + dlat*(kgds(3)-1)
2838  rslat = f0lat
2839  kgds11 = kgds11 - 64
2840  else
2841  rnlat = f0lat
2842  rslat = f0lat - dlat*(kgds(3)-1)
2843  dlat = -dlat
2844  endif
2845  if(kgds11.ge.32) then
2846  ijordr = .false.
2847  else
2848  ijordr = .true.
2849  endif
2850 
2851  if(wlon.gt.180.) wlon = wlon - 360.
2852  if(elon.gt.180.) elon = elon - 360.
2853  wlon = nint(wlon*1000.) * 0.001
2854  elon = nint(elon*1000.) * 0.001
2855  rslat = nint(rslat*1000.) * 0.001
2856  rnlat = nint(rnlat*1000.) * 0.001
2857  return
2858 !
2859  elseif(kgds(1).eq.1) then ! mercator projection
2860  write(6,*) 'mercator grid'
2861  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2862  call abort
2863 !
2864  elseif(kgds(1).eq.2) then ! gnomonic projection
2865  write(6,*) 'gnomonic grid'
2866  write(6,*) 'error!! gnomonic projection not coded'
2867  call abort
2868 !
2869  elseif(kgds(1).eq.3) then ! lambert conformal
2870  write(6,*) 'lambert conformal'
2871  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2872  call abort
2873  elseif(kgds(1).eq.4) then ! gaussian grid
2874 !
2875  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'gaussian grid'
2876  dlat = 99.
2877  dlon = float(kgds( 9)) / 1000.0
2878  f0lon = float(kgds(5)) / 1000.0
2879  f0lat = 99.
2880  kgds11 = kgds(11)
2881  if(kgds11.ge.128) then
2882  wlon = f0lon
2883  elon = f0lon
2884  if(dlon*kgds(2).gt.359.99) then
2885  wlon = f0lon - dlon*kgds(2)
2886  endif
2887  dlon = -dlon
2888  kgds11 = kgds11-128
2889  else
2890  wlon = f0lon
2891  elon = f0lon + dlon*(kgds(2)-1)
2892  if(dlon*kgds(2).gt.359.99) then
2893  elon = f0lon + dlon*kgds(2)
2894  endif
2895  endif
2896  if(kgds11.ge.64) then
2897  rnlat = 99.
2898  rslat = 99.
2899  kgds11 = kgds11 - 64
2900  else
2901  rnlat = 99.
2902  rslat = 99.
2903  dlat = -99.
2904  endif
2905  if(kgds11.ge.32) then
2906  ijordr = .false.
2907  else
2908  ijordr = .true.
2909  endif
2910  return
2911 !
2912  elseif(kgds(1).eq.5) then ! polar strereographic
2913  write(6,*) 'polar stereographic grid'
2914  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2915  call abort
2916  return
2917 !
2918  elseif(kgds(1).eq.13) then ! oblique lambert conformal
2919  write(6,*) 'oblique lambert conformal grid'
2920  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2921  call abort
2922 !
2923  elseif(kgds(1).eq.50) then ! spherical coefficient
2924  write(6,*) 'spherical coefficient'
2925  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2926  call abort
2927  return
2928 !
2929  elseif(kgds(1).eq.90) then ! space view perspective
2930 ! (orthographic grid)
2931  write(6,*) 'space view perspective grid'
2932  write(6,*) 'cannot process'
2933  call abort
2934  return
2935 !
2936  else ! unknown projection. abort.
2937  write(6,*) 'error!! unknown map projection'
2938  write(6,*) 'kgds(1)=',kgds(1)
2939  print *,'error!! unknown map projection'
2940  print *,'kgds(1)=',kgds(1)
2941  call abort
2942  endif
2943 !
2944  return
2945  end
2946  subroutine subst(data,imax,jmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr)
2947  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
2948  implicit none
2949  integer i,j,ii,jj,jmax,imax,iret
2950  real (kind=kind_io8) dlat,dlon
2951 !
2952  logical ijordr
2953 !
2954  real (kind=kind_io8) data(imax,jmax)
2955  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: work(:,:)
2956 !
2957  if(.not.ijordr.or.
2958  & (ijordr.and.(dlat.gt.0..or.dlon.lt.0.))) then
2959  allocate (work(imax,jmax))
2960 
2961  if(.not.ijordr) then
2962  do j=1,jmax
2963  do i=1,imax
2964  work(i,j) = data(j,i)
2965  enddo
2966  enddo
2967  else
2968  do j=1,jmax
2969  do i=1,imax
2970  work(i,j) = data(i,j)
2971  enddo
2972  enddo
2973  endif
2974  if (dlat > 0.0) then
2975  if (dlon > 0.0) then
2976  do j=1,jmax
2977  jj = jmax - j + 1
2978  do i=1,imax
2979  data(i,jj) = work(i,j)
2980  enddo
2981  enddo
2982  else
2983  do i=1,imax
2984  data(imax-i+1,jj) = work(i,j)
2985  enddo
2986  endif
2987  else
2988  if (dlon > 0.0) then
2989  do j=1,jmax
2990  do i=1,imax
2991  data(i,j) = work(i,j)
2992  enddo
2993  enddo
2994  else
2995  do j=1,jmax
2996  do i=1,imax
2997  data(imax-i+1,j) = work(i,j)
2998  enddo
2999  enddo
3000  endif
3001  endif
3002  deallocate (work, stat=iret)
3003  endif
3004  return
3005  end
3006  subroutine la2ga(regin,imxin,jmxin,rinlon,rinlat,rlon,rlat,inttyp,
3007  & gauout,len,lmask,rslmsk,slmask
3008  &, outlat, outlon,me)
3009  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
3010  implicit none
3011  real (kind=kind_io8) wei4,wei3,wei2,sum2,sum1,sum3,wei1,sum4,
3012  & wsum,tem,wsumiv,sums,sumn,wi2j2,x,y,wi1j1,
3013  & wi1j2,wi2j1,rlat,rlon,aphi,
3014  & rnume,alamd,denom
3015  integer jy,ifills,ix,len,inttyp,me,i,j,jmxin,imxin,jq,jx,j1,j2,
3016  & ii,i1,i2,kmami,it
3017  integer nx,kxs,kxt
3018  integer, allocatable, save :: imxnx(:)
3019  integer, allocatable :: ifill(:)
3020 !
3021 ! interpolation from lat/lon or gaussian grid to other lat/lon grid
3022 !
3023  real (kind=kind_io8) outlon(len),outlat(len),gauout(len),
3024  & slmask(len)
3025  real (kind=kind_io8) regin (imxin,jmxin),rslmsk(imxin,jmxin)
3026 !
3027  real (kind=kind_io8) rinlat(jmxin), rinlon(imxin)
3028  integer iindx1(len), iindx2(len)
3029  integer jindx1(len), jindx2(len)
3030  real (kind=kind_io8) ddx(len), ddy(len), wrk(len)
3031 !
3032  logical lmask
3033 !
3034  logical first
3035  integer num_threads
3036  data first /.true./
3037  save num_threads, first
3038 !
3039  integer len_thread_m, len_thread, i1_t, i2_t
3040  integer num_parthds
3041 !
3042  if (first) then
3043  num_threads = num_parthds()
3044  first = .false.
3045  if (.not. allocated(imxnx)) allocate (imxnx(num_threads))
3046  endif
3047 !
3048 ! if (me == 0) print *,' num_threads =',num_threads,' me=',me
3049 !
3050 ! if(me .eq. 0) then
3051 ! print *,'rlon=',rlon,' me=',me
3052 ! print *,'rlat=',rlat,' me=',me,' imxin=',imxin,' jmxin=',jmxin
3053 ! endif
3054 !
3055 ! do j=1,jmxin
3056 ! if(rlat.gt.0.) then
3057 ! rinlat(j) = rlat - float(j-1)*dlain
3058 ! else
3059 ! rinlat(j) = rlat + float(j-1)*dlain
3060 ! endif
3061 ! enddo
3062 !
3063 ! if (me .eq. 0) then
3064 ! print *,'rinlat='
3065 ! print *,(rinlat(j),j=1,jmxin)
3066 ! print *,'rinlon='
3067 ! print *,(rinlon(i),i=1,imxin)
3068 !
3069 ! print *,'outlat='
3070 ! print *,(outlat(j),j=1,len)
3071 ! print *,(outlon(j),j=1,len)
3072 ! endif
3073 !
3074 ! do i=1,imxin
3075 ! rinlon(i) = rlon + float(i-1)*dloin
3076 ! enddo
3077 !
3078 ! print *,'rinlon='
3079 ! print *,(rinlon(i),i=1,imxin)
3080 !
3081  len_thread_m = (len+num_threads-1) / num_threads
3082 
3083  if (inttyp /=1) allocate (ifill(num_threads))
3084 !
3085 !$omp parallel do default(none)
3086 !$omp+private(i1_t,i2_t,len_thread,it,i,ii,i1,i2)
3087 !$omp+private(j,j1,j2,jq,ix,jy,nx,kxs,kxt,kmami)
3088 !$omp+private(alamd,denom,rnume,aphi,x,y,wsum,wsumiv,sum1,sum2)
3089 !$omp+private(sum3,sum4,wi1j1,wi2j1,wi1j2,wi2j2,wei1,wei2,wei3,wei4)
3090 !$omp+private(sumn,sums)
3091 !$omp+shared(imxin,jmxin,ifill)
3092 !$omp+shared(outlon,outlat,wrk,iindx1,rinlon,jindx1,rinlat,ddx,ddy)
3093 !$omp+shared(rlon,rlat,regin,gauout,imxnx)
3094 !$omp+private(tem)
3095 !$omp+shared(num_threads,len_thread_m,len,lmask,iindx2,jindx2,rslmsk)
3096 !$omp+shared(inttyp,me,slmask)
3097 !
3098  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
3099  i1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
3100  i2_t = min(i1_t+len_thread_m-1,len)
3101  len_thread = i2_t-i1_t+1
3102 !
3103 ! find i-index for interpolation
3104 !
3105  do i=i1_t, i2_t
3106  alamd = outlon(i)
3107  if (alamd .lt. rlon) alamd = alamd + 360.0
3108  if (alamd .gt. 360.0+rlon) alamd = alamd - 360.0
3109  wrk(i) = alamd
3110  iindx1(i) = imxin
3111  enddo
3112  do i=i1_t,i2_t
3113  do ii=1,imxin
3114  if(wrk(i) .ge. rinlon(ii)) iindx1(i) = ii
3115  enddo
3116  enddo
3117  do i=i1_t,i2_t
3118  i1 = iindx1(i)
3119  if (i1 .lt. 1) i1 = imxin
3120  i2 = i1 + 1
3121  if (i2 .gt. imxin) i2 = 1
3122  iindx1(i) = i1
3123  iindx2(i) = i2
3124  denom = rinlon(i2) - rinlon(i1)
3125  if(denom.lt.0.) denom = denom + 360.
3126  rnume = wrk(i) - rinlon(i1)
3127  if(rnume.lt.0.) rnume = rnume + 360.
3128  ddx(i) = rnume / denom
3129  enddo
3130 !
3131 ! find j-index for interplation
3132 !
3133  if(rlat.gt.0.) then
3134  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3135  jindx1(j)=0
3136  enddo
3137  do jx=1,jmxin
3138  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3139  if(outlat(j).le.rinlat(jx)) jindx1(j) = jx
3140  enddo
3141  enddo
3142  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3143  jq = jindx1(j)
3144  aphi=outlat(j)
3145  if(jq.ge.1 .and. jq .lt. jmxin) then
3146  j2=jq+1
3147  j1=jq
3148  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(rinlat(j2)-rinlat(j1))
3149  elseif (jq .eq. 0) then
3150  j2=1
3151  j1=1
3152  if(abs(90.-rinlat(j1)).gt.0.001) then
3153  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(90.-rinlat(j1))
3154  else
3155  ddy(j)=0.0
3156  endif
3157  else
3158  j2=jmxin
3159  j1=jmxin
3160  if(abs(-90.-rinlat(j1)).gt.0.001) then
3161  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(-90.-rinlat(j1))
3162  else
3163  ddy(j)=0.0
3164  endif
3165  endif
3166  jindx1(j)=j1
3167  jindx2(j)=j2
3168  enddo
3169  else
3170  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3171  jindx1(j) = jmxin+1
3172  enddo
3173  do jx=jmxin,1,-1
3174  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3175  if(outlat(j).le.rinlat(jx)) jindx1(j) = jx
3176  enddo
3177  enddo
3178  do j=i1_t,i2_t
3179  jq = jindx1(j)
3180  aphi=outlat(j)
3181  if(jq.gt.1 .and. jq .le. jmxin) then
3182  j2=jq
3183  j1=jq-1
3184  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(rinlat(j2)-rinlat(j1))
3185  elseif (jq .eq. 1) then
3186  j2=1
3187  j1=1
3188  if(abs(-90.-rinlat(j1)).gt.0.001) then
3189  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(-90.-rinlat(j1))
3190  else
3191  ddy(j)=0.0
3192  endif
3193  else
3194  j2=jmxin
3195  j1=jmxin
3196  if(abs(90.-rinlat(j1)).gt.0.001) then
3197  ddy(j)=(aphi-rinlat(j1))/(90.-rinlat(j1))
3198  else
3199  ddy(j)=0.0
3200  endif
3201  endif
3202  jindx1(j)=j1
3203  jindx2(j)=j2
3204  enddo
3205  endif
3206 !
3207 ! if (me .eq. 0 .and. inttyp .eq. 1) then
3208 ! print *,'la2ga'
3209 ! print *,'iindx1'
3210 ! print *,(iindx1(n),n=1,len)
3211 ! print *,'iindx2'
3212 ! print *,(iindx2(n),n=1,len)
3213 ! print *,'jindx1'
3214 ! print *,(jindx1(n),n=1,len)
3215 ! print *,'jindx2'
3216 ! print *,(jindx2(n),n=1,len)
3217 ! print *,'ddy'
3218 ! print *,(ddy(n),n=1,len)
3219 ! print *,'ddx'
3220 ! print *,(ddx(n),n=1,len)
3221 ! endif
3222 !
3223  sum1 = 0.
3224  sum2 = 0.
3225  sum3 = 0.
3226  sum4 = 0.
3227  if (lmask) then
3228  wei1 = 0.
3229  wei2 = 0.
3230  wei3 = 0.
3231  wei4 = 0.
3232  do i=1,imxin
3233  sum1 = sum1 + regin(i,1) * rslmsk(i,1)
3234  sum2 = sum2 + regin(i,jmxin) * rslmsk(i,jmxin)
3235  wei1 = wei1 + rslmsk(i,1)
3236  wei2 = wei2 + rslmsk(i,jmxin)
3237 !
3238  sum3 = sum3 + regin(i,1) * (1.0-rslmsk(i,1))
3239  sum4 = sum4 + regin(i,jmxin) * (1.0-rslmsk(i,jmxin))
3240  wei3 = wei3 + (1.0-rslmsk(i,1))
3241  wei4 = wei4 + (1.0-rslmsk(i,jmxin))
3242  enddo
3243 !
3244  if(wei1.gt.0.) then
3245  sum1 = sum1 / wei1
3246  else
3247  sum1 = 0.
3248  endif
3249  if(wei2.gt.0.) then
3250  sum2 = sum2 / wei2
3251  else
3252  sum2 = 0.
3253  endif
3254  if(wei3.gt.0.) then
3255  sum3 = sum3 / wei3
3256  else
3257  sum3 = 0.
3258  endif
3259  if(wei4.gt.0.) then
3260  sum4 = sum4 / wei4
3261  else
3262  sum4 = 0.
3263  endif
3264  else
3265  do i=1,imxin
3266  sum1 = sum1 + regin(i,1)
3267  sum2 = sum2 + regin(i,jmxin)
3268  enddo
3269  sum1 = sum1 / imxin
3270  sum2 = sum2 / imxin
3271  sum3 = sum1
3272  sum4 = sum2
3273  endif
3274 !
3275 ! print *,' sum1=',sum1,' sum2=',sum2
3276 ! *,' sum3=',sum3,' sum4=',sum4
3277 ! print *,' rslmsk=',(rslmsk(i,1),i=1,imxin)
3278 ! print *,' slmask=',(slmask(i),i=1,imxout)
3279 ! *,' j1=',jindx1(1),' j2=',jindx2(1)
3280 !
3281 !
3282 ! inttyp=1 take the closest point value
3283 !
3284  if(inttyp.eq.1) then
3285 
3286  do i=i1_t,i2_t
3287  jy = jindx1(i)
3288  if(ddy(i) .ge. 0.5) jy = jindx2(i)
3289  ix = iindx1(i)
3290  if(ddx(i) .ge. 0.5) ix = iindx2(i)
3291 !
3292 !cggg start
3293 !
3294  if (.not. lmask) then
3295 
3296  gauout(i) = regin(ix,jy)
3297 
3298  else
3299 
3300  if(slmask(i).eq.rslmsk(ix,jy)) then
3301 
3302  gauout(i) = regin(ix,jy)
3303 
3304  else
3305 
3306  i1 = ix
3307  j1 = jy
3308 
3309 ! spiral around until matching mask is found.
3310  do nx=1,jmxin*imxin/2
3311  kxs=sqrt(4*nx-2.5)
3312  kxt=nx-int(kxs**2/4+1)
3313  select case(mod(kxs,4))
3314  case(1)
3315  ix=i1-kxs/4+kxt
3316  jx=j1-kxs/4
3317  case(2)
3318  ix=i1+1+kxs/4
3319  jx=j1-kxs/4+kxt
3320  case(3)
3321  ix=i1+1+kxs/4-kxt
3322  jx=j1+1+kxs/4
3323  case default
3324  ix=i1-kxs/4
3325  jx=j1+kxs/4-kxt
3326  end select
3327  if(jx.lt.1) then
3328  ix=ix+imxin/2
3329  jx=2-jx
3330  elseif(jx.gt.jmxin) then
3331  ix=ix+imxin/2
3332  jx=2*jmxin-jx
3333  endif
3334  ix=modulo(ix-1,imxin)+1
3335  if(slmask(i).eq.rslmsk(ix,jx)) then
3336  gauout(i) = regin(ix,jx)
3337  go to 81
3338  endif
3339  enddo
3340 
3341 !cggg here, set the gauout value to be 0, and let's sarah's land
3342 !cggg routine assign a default.
3343 
3344  if (num_threads == 1) then
3345  print*,'no matching mask found ',i,i1,j1,ix,jx
3346  print*,'set to default value.'
3347  endif
3348  gauout(i) = 0.0
3349 
3350 
3351  81 continue
3352 
3353  end if
3354 
3355  end if
3356 
3357 !cggg end
3358 
3359  enddo
3360 ! kmami=1
3361 ! if (me == 0 .and. num_threads == 1)
3362 ! & call maxmin(gauout(i1_t),len_thread,kmami)
3363  else ! nearest neighbor interpolation
3364 
3365 !
3366 ! quasi-bilinear interpolation
3367 !
3368  ifill(it) = 0
3369  imxnx(it) = 0
3370  do i=i1_t,i2_t
3371  y = ddy(i)
3372  j1 = jindx1(i)
3373  j2 = jindx2(i)
3374  x = ddx(i)
3375  i1 = iindx1(i)
3376  i2 = iindx2(i)
3377 !
3378  wi1j1 = (1.-x) * (1.-y)
3379  wi2j1 = x *( 1.-y)
3380  wi1j2 = (1.-x) * y
3381  wi2j2 = x * y
3382 !
3383  tem = 4.*slmask(i) - rslmsk(i1,j1) - rslmsk(i2,j1)
3384  & - rslmsk(i1,j2) - rslmsk(i2,j2)
3385  if(lmask .and. abs(tem) .gt. 0.01) then
3386  if(slmask(i).eq.1.) then
3387  wi1j1 = wi1j1 * rslmsk(i1,j1)
3388  wi2j1 = wi2j1 * rslmsk(i2,j1)
3389  wi1j2 = wi1j2 * rslmsk(i1,j2)
3390  wi2j2 = wi2j2 * rslmsk(i2,j2)
3391  else
3392  wi1j1 = wi1j1 * (1.0-rslmsk(i1,j1))
3393  wi2j1 = wi2j1 * (1.0-rslmsk(i2,j1))
3394  wi1j2 = wi1j2 * (1.0-rslmsk(i1,j2))
3395  wi2j2 = wi2j2 * (1.0-rslmsk(i2,j2))
3396  endif
3397  endif
3398 !
3399  wsum = wi1j1 + wi2j1 + wi1j2 + wi2j2
3400  wrk(i) = wsum
3401  if(wsum.ne.0.) then
3402  wsumiv = 1./wsum
3403 !
3404  if(j1.ne.j2) then
3405  gauout(i) = (wi1j1*regin(i1,j1) + wi2j1*regin(i2,j1) +
3406  & wi1j2*regin(i1,j2) + wi2j2*regin(i2,j2))
3407  & *wsumiv
3408  else
3409 !
3410  if (rlat .gt. 0.0) then
3411  if (slmask(i) .eq. 1.0) then
3412  sumn = sum1
3413  sums = sum2
3414  else
3415  sumn = sum3
3416  sums = sum4
3417  endif
3418  if( j1 .eq. 1) then
3419  gauout(i) = (wi1j1*sumn +wi2j1*sumn +
3420  & wi1j2*regin(i1,j2)+wi2j2*regin(i2,j2))
3421  & * wsumiv
3422  elseif (j1 .eq. jmxin) then
3423  gauout(i) = (wi1j1*regin(i1,j1)+wi2j1*regin(i2,j1)+
3424  & wi1j2*sums +wi2j2*sums )
3425  & * wsumiv
3426  endif
3427 ! print *,' slmask=',slmask(i),' sums=',sums,' sumn=',sumn
3428 ! & ,' regin=',regin(i1,j2),regin(i2,j2),' j1=',j1,' j2=',j2
3429 ! & ,' wij=',wi1j1, wi2j1, wi1j2, wi2j2,wsumiv
3430  else
3431  if (slmask(i) .eq. 1.0) then
3432  sums = sum1
3433  sumn = sum2
3434  else
3435  sums = sum3
3436  sumn = sum4
3437  endif
3438  if( j1 .eq. 1) then
3439  gauout(i) = (wi1j1*regin(i1,j1)+wi2j1*regin(i2,j1)+
3440  & wi1j2*sums +wi2j2*sums )
3441  & * wsumiv
3442  elseif (j1 .eq. jmxin) then
3443  gauout(i) = (wi1j1*sumn +wi2j1*sumn +
3444  & wi1j2*regin(i1,j2)+wi2j2*regin(i2,j2))
3445  & * wsumiv
3446  endif
3447  endif
3448  endif ! if j1 .ne. j2
3449  endif
3450  enddo
3451  do i=i1_t,i2_t
3452  j1 = jindx1(i)
3453  j2 = jindx2(i)
3454  i1 = iindx1(i)
3455  i2 = iindx2(i)
3456  if(wrk(i) .eq. 0.0) then
3457  if(.not.lmask) then
3458  if (num_threads == 1)
3459  & write(6,*) ' la2ga called with lmask=.true. but bad',
3460  & ' rslmsk or slmask given'
3461  call abort
3462  endif
3463  ifill(it) = ifill(it) + 1
3464  if(ifill(it) <= 2 ) then
3465  if (me == 0 .and. num_threads == 1) then
3466  write(6,*) 'i1,i2,j1,j2=',i1,i2,j1,j2
3467  write(6,*) 'rslmsk=',rslmsk(i1,j1),rslmsk(i1,j2),
3468  & rslmsk(i2,j1),rslmsk(i2,j2)
3469 ! write(6,*) 'i,j=',i,j,' slmask(i)=',slmask(i)
3470  write(6,*) 'i=',i,' slmask(i)=',slmask(i)
3471  &, ' outlon=',outlon(i),' outlat=',outlat(i)
3472  endif
3473  endif
3474 ! spiral around until matching mask is found.
3475  do nx=1,jmxin*imxin/2
3476  kxs=sqrt(4*nx-2.5)
3477  kxt=nx-int(kxs**2/4+1)
3478  select case(mod(kxs,4))
3479  case(1)
3480  ix=i1-kxs/4+kxt
3481  jx=j1-kxs/4
3482  case(2)
3483  ix=i1+1+kxs/4
3484  jx=j1-kxs/4+kxt
3485  case(3)
3486  ix=i1+1+kxs/4-kxt
3487  jx=j1+1+kxs/4
3488  case default
3489  ix=i1-kxs/4
3490  jx=j1+kxs/4-kxt
3491  end select
3492  if(jx.lt.1) then
3493  ix=ix+imxin/2
3494  jx=2-jx
3495  elseif(jx.gt.jmxin) then
3496  ix=ix+imxin/2
3497  jx=2*jmxin-jx
3498  endif
3499  ix=modulo(ix-1,imxin)+1
3500  if(slmask(i).eq.rslmsk(ix,jx)) then
3501  gauout(i) = regin(ix,jx)
3502  imxnx(it) = max(imxnx(it),nx)
3503  go to 71
3504  endif
3505  enddo
3506 !
3507  if (num_threads == 1) then
3508  write(6,*) ' error!!! no filling value found in la2ga'
3509 ! write(6,*) ' i ix jx slmask(i) rslmsk ',
3510 ! & i,ix,jx,slmask(i),rslmsk(ix,jx)
3511  endif
3512  call abort
3513 !
3514  71 continue
3515  endif
3516 !
3517  enddo
3518  endif
3519  enddo ! end of threaded loop ...................
3520 !$omp end parallel do
3521 !
3522  if(inttyp /= 1)then
3523  ifills = 0
3524  do it=1,num_threads
3525  ifills = ifills + ifill(it)
3526  enddo
3527 
3528  if(ifills.gt.1) then
3529  if (me .eq. 0) then
3530  write(6,*) ' unable to interpolate. filled with nearest',
3531  & ' point value at ',ifills,' points'
3532 ! & ' point value at ',ifills,' points imxnx=',imxnx(:)
3533  endif
3534  endif
3535  deallocate (ifill)
3536  endif
3537 !
3538 ! kmami = 1
3539 ! if (me == 0) call maxmin(gauout,len,kmami)
3540 !
3541  return
3542  end subroutine la2ga
3543  subroutine maxmin(f,imax,kmax)
3544  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
3545  implicit none
3546  integer i,iimin,iimax,kmax,imax,k
3547  real (kind=kind_io8) fmin,fmax
3548 !
3549  real (kind=kind_io8) f(imax,kmax)
3550 !
3551  do k=1,kmax
3552 !
3553  fmax = f(1,k)
3554  fmin = f(1,k)
3555 !
3556  do i=1,imax
3557  if(fmax.le.f(i,k)) then
3558  fmax = f(i,k)
3559  iimax = i
3560  endif
3561  if(fmin.ge.f(i,k)) then
3562  fmin = f(i,k)
3563  iimin = i
3564  endif
3565  enddo
3566 !
3567 ! write(6,100) k,fmax,iimax,fmin,iimin
3568 ! 100 format(2x,'level=',i2,' max=',e11.4,' at i=',i7,
3569 ! & ' min=',e11.4,' at i=',i7)
3570 !
3571  enddo
3572 !
3573  return
3574  end
3575  subroutine filanl(tsfanl,tsfan2,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,
3576  & aisanl,
3577  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
3578  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,scvanl,veganl,
3579  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,
3580 !cwu [+1l] add ()anl for sih, sic
3581  & sihanl,sicanl,
3582 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3583  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
3584  & tsfclm,tsfcl2,wetclm,snoclm,zorclm,albclm,
3585  & aisclm,
3586  & tg3clm,cvclm ,cvbclm,cvtclm,
3587  & cnpclm,smcclm,stcclm,sliclm,scvclm,vegclm,
3588  & vetclm,sotclm,alfclm,
3589 !cwu [+1l] add ()clm for sih, sic
3590  & sihclm,sicclm,
3591 !clu [+1l] add ()clm for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3592  & vmnclm,vmxclm,slpclm,absclm,
3593  & len,lsoil)
3594  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
3595  implicit none
3596  integer i,j,len,lsoil
3597 !
3598  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len),tsfan2(len),wetanl(len),
3599  & snoanl(len),
3600  & zoranl(len),albanl(len,4),aisanl(len),
3601  & tg3anl(len),
3602  & cvanl(len),cvbanl(len),cvtanl(len),
3603  & cnpanl(len),
3604  & smcanl(len,lsoil),stcanl(len,lsoil),
3605  & slianl(len),scvanl(len),veganl(len),
3606  & vetanl(len),sotanl(len),alfanl(len,2)
3607 !cwu [+1l] add ()anl for sih, sic
3608  &, sihanl(len),sicanl(len)
3609 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3610  &, vmnanl(len),vmxanl(len),slpanl(len),absanl(len)
3611  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfclm(len),tsfcl2(len),wetclm(len),
3612  & snoclm(len),
3613  & zorclm(len),albclm(len,4),aisclm(len),
3614  & tg3clm(len),
3615  & cvclm(len),cvbclm(len),cvtclm(len),
3616  & cnpclm(len),
3617  & smcclm(len,lsoil),stcclm(len,lsoil),
3618  & sliclm(len),scvclm(len),vegclm(len),
3619  & vetclm(len),sotclm(len),alfclm(len,2)
3620 !cwu [+1l] add ()clm for sih, sic
3621  &, sihclm(len),sicclm(len)
3622 !clu [+1l] add ()clm for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3623  &, vmnclm(len),vmxclm(len),slpclm(len),absclm(len)
3624 !
3625  do i=1,len
3626  tsfanl(i) = tsfclm(i) ! tsf at t
3627  tsfan2(i) = tsfcl2(i) ! tsf at t-deltsfc
3628  wetanl(i) = wetclm(i) ! soil wetness
3629  snoanl(i) = snoclm(i) ! snow
3630  scvanl(i) = scvclm(i) ! snow cover
3631  aisanl(i) = aisclm(i) ! seaice
3632  slianl(i) = sliclm(i) ! land/sea/snow mask
3633  zoranl(i) = zorclm(i) ! surface roughness
3634 ! plranl(i) = plrclm(i) ! maximum stomatal resistance
3635  tg3anl(i) = tg3clm(i) ! deep soil temperature
3636  cnpanl(i) = cnpclm(i) ! canopy water content
3637  veganl(i) = vegclm(i) ! vegetation cover
3638  vetanl(i) = vetclm(i) ! vegetation type
3639  sotanl(i) = sotclm(i) ! soil type
3640  cvanl(i) = cvclm(i) ! cv
3641  cvbanl(i) = cvbclm(i) ! cvb
3642  cvtanl(i) = cvtclm(i) ! cvt
3643 !cwu [+4l] add sih, sic
3644  sihanl(i) = sihclm(i) ! sea ice thickness
3645  sicanl(i) = sicclm(i) ! sea ice concentration
3646 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3647  vmnanl(i) = vmnclm(i) ! min vegetation cover
3648  vmxanl(i) = vmxclm(i) ! max vegetation cover
3649  slpanl(i) = slpclm(i) ! slope type
3650  absanl(i) = absclm(i) ! max snow albedo
3651  enddo
3652 !
3653  do j=1,lsoil
3654  do i=1,len
3655  smcanl(i,j) = smcclm(i,j) ! layer soil wetness
3656  stcanl(i,j) = stcclm(i,j) ! soil temperature
3657  enddo
3658  enddo
3659  do j=1,4
3660  do i=1,len
3661  albanl(i,j) = albclm(i,j) ! albedo
3662  enddo
3663  enddo
3664  do j=1,2
3665  do i=1,len
3666  alfanl(i,j) = alfclm(i,j) ! vegetation fraction for albedo
3667  enddo
3668  enddo
3669 !
3670  return
3671  end
3672  subroutine analy(lugb,iy,im,id,ih,fh,len,lsoil,
3673  & slmask,fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
3674  & fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,fnvega,
3675  & fnveta,fnsota,
3676 !clu [+1l] add fn()a for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3677  & fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnslpa,fnabsa,
3678  & tsfanl,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,aisanl,
3679  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
3680  & smcanl,stcanl,slianl,scvanl,acnanl,veganl,
3681  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,tsfan0,
3682 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3683  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
3684 !cggg snow mods start & kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdzor,kpdalb,kpdais,
3685  & kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdsnd,kpdzor,kpdalb,kpdais,
3686 !cggg snow mods end
3687  & kpdtg3,kpdscv,kpdacn,kpdsmc,kpdstc,kpdveg,
3688  & kprvet,kpdsot,kpdalf,
3689 !clu [+1l] add kpd() for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3690  & kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,
3691  & irttsf,irtwet,irtsno,irtzor,irtalb,irtais,
3692  & irttg3,irtscv,irtacn,irtsmc,irtstc,irtveg,
3693  & irtvet,irtsot,irtalf
3694 !clu [+1l] add irt() for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3695  &, irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs
3696  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, outlat, outlon
3697  &, gaus, blno, blto, me, lanom)
3698  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
3699  implicit none
3700  logical lanom
3701  integer irtsmc,irtacn,irtstc,irtvet,irtveg,irtscv,irtzor,irtsno,
3702  & irtalb,irttg3,irtais,iret,me,kk,kpdvet,i,irtalf,irtsot,
3703 !cggg snow mods start & imsk,jmsk,irtwet,lsoil,len, kpdtsf,kpdsno,kpdwet,iy,
3704  & imsk,jmsk,irtwet,lsoil,len,kpdtsf,kpdsno,kpdsnd,kpdwet,iy,
3705 !cggg snow mods end
3706  & lugb,im,ih,id,kpdveg,kpdstc,kprvet,irttsf,kpdsot,kpdsmc,
3707  & kpdais,kpdzor,kpdtg3,kpdacn,kpdscv,j
3708 !clu [+1l] add kpd() and irt() for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3709  &, kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs
3710  real (kind=kind_io8) blto,blno,fh
3711 !
3712  real (kind=kind_io8) slmask(len)
3713  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(imsk,jmsk)
3714  real (kind=kind_io8) outlat(len), outlon(len)
3715  integer kpdalb(4), kpdalf(2)
3716 !cggg snow mods start
3717  integer kpds(1000),kgds(1000),jpds(1000),jgds(1000)
3718  integer lugi, lskip, lgrib, ndata
3719 !cggg snow mods end
3720 !
3721  character*500 fntsfa,fnweta,fnsnoa,fnzora,fnalba,fnaisa,
3722  & fntg3a,fnscva,fnsmca,fnstca,fnacna,fnvega,
3723  & fnveta,fnsota
3724 !clu [+1l] add fn()a for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3725  &, fnvmna,fnvmxa,fnslpa,fnabsa
3726 
3727  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len), wetanl(len), snoanl(len),
3728  & zoranl(len), albanl(len,4), aisanl(len),
3729  & tg3anl(len), acnanl(len),
3730  & cvanl(len), cvbanl(len), cvtanl(len),
3731  & slianl(len), scvanl(len), veganl(len),
3732  & vetanl(len), sotanl(len), alfanl(len,2),
3733  & smcanl(len,lsoil), stcanl(len,lsoil),
3734  & tsfan0(len)
3735 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
3736  &, vmnanl(len),vmxanl(len),slpanl(len),absanl(len)
3737 !
3738  logical gaus
3739 !
3740 ! tsf
3741 !
3742  irttsf = 1
3743  if(fntsfa(1:8).ne.' ') then
3744  call fixrda(lugb,fntsfa,kpdtsf,slmask,
3745  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,tsfanl,len,iret
3746  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3747  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3748  irttsf = iret
3749  if(iret == 1) then
3750  write(6,*) 't surface analysis read error'
3751  call abort
3752  elseif(iret == -1) then
3753  if (me == 0) then
3754  print *,'old t surface analysis provided, indicating proper'
3755  &, ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3756  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3757  endif
3758  else
3759  if (me == 0) print *,'t surface analysis provided.'
3760  endif
3761  else
3762  if (me == 0) then
3763 ! print *,'************************************************'
3764  print *,'no tsf analysis available. climatology used'
3765  endif
3766  endif
3767 !
3768 ! tsf0
3769 !
3770  if(fntsfa(1:8).ne.' ' .and. lanom) then
3771  call fixrda(lugb,fntsfa,kpdtsf,slmask,
3772  & iy,im,id,ih,0.,tsfan0,len,iret
3773  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3774  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3775  if(iret == 1) then
3776  write(6,*) 't surface at ft=0 analysis read error'
3777  call abort
3778  elseif(iret == -1) then
3779  if (me == 0) then
3780  write(6,*) 'could not find t surface analysis at ft=0'
3781  endif
3782  call abort
3783  else
3784  print *,'t surface analysis at ft=0 found.'
3785  endif
3786  else
3787  do i=1,len
3788  tsfan0(i)=-999.9
3789  enddo
3790  endif
3791 !
3792 ! albedo
3793 !
3794  irtalb=0
3795  if(fnalba(1:8).ne.' ') then
3796  do kk = 1, 4
3797  call fixrda(lugb,fnalba,kpdalb(kk),slmask,
3798  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,albanl(1,kk),len,iret
3799  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3800  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3801  irtalb=iret
3802  if(iret.eq.1) then
3803  write(6,*) 'albedo analysis read error'
3804  call abort
3805  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3806  if (me .eq. 0) then
3807  print *,'old albedo analysis provided, indicating proper',
3808  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3809  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3810  endif
3811  else
3812  if (me .eq. 0 .and. kk .eq. 4)
3813  & print *,'albedo analysis provided.'
3814  endif
3815  enddo
3816  else
3817  if (me .eq. 0) then
3818 ! print *,'************************************************'
3819  print *,'no albedo analysis available. climatology used'
3820  endif
3821  endif
3822 !
3823 ! vegetation fraction for albedo
3824 !
3825  irtalf=0
3826  if(fnalba(1:8).ne.' ') then
3827  do kk = 1, 2
3828  call fixrda(lugb,fnalba,kpdalf(kk),slmask,
3829  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,alfanl(1,kk),len,iret
3830  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3831  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3832  irtalf=iret
3833  if(iret.eq.1) then
3834  write(6,*) 'albedo analysis read error'
3835  call abort
3836  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3837  if (me .eq. 0) then
3838  print *,'old albedo analysis provided, indicating proper',
3839  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3840  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3841  endif
3842  else
3843  if (me .eq. 0 .and. kk .eq. 4)
3844  & print *,'albedo analysis provided.'
3845  endif
3846  enddo
3847  else
3848  if (me .eq. 0) then
3849 ! print *,'************************************************'
3850  print *,'no vegfalbedo analysis available. climatology used'
3851  endif
3852  endif
3853 !
3854 ! soil wetness
3855 !
3856  irtwet=0
3857  irtsmc=0
3858  if(fnweta(1:8).ne.' ') then
3859  call fixrda(lugb,fnweta,kpdwet,slmask,
3860  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,wetanl,len,iret
3861  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3862  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3863  irtwet=iret
3864  if(iret.eq.1) then
3865  write(6,*) 'bucket wetness analysis read error'
3866  call abort
3867  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3868  if (me .eq. 0) then
3869  print *,'old wetness analysis provided, indicating proper',
3870  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3871  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3872  endif
3873  else
3874  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'bucket wetness analysis provided.'
3875  endif
3876  elseif(fnsmca(1:8).ne.' ') then
3877  call fixrda(lugb,fnsmca,kpdsmc,slmask,
3878  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,smcanl(1,1),len,iret
3879  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3880  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3881  call fixrda(lugb,fnsmca,kpdsmc,slmask,
3882  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,smcanl(1,2),len,iret
3883  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3884  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3885  irtsmc=iret
3886  if(iret.eq.1) then
3887  write(6,*) 'layer soil wetness analysis read error'
3888  call abort
3889  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3890  if (me .eq. 0) then
3891  print *,'old layer soil wetness analysis provided',
3892  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
3893  print *,' no error suspected.'
3894  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3895  endif
3896  else
3897  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'layer soil wetness analysis provided.'
3898  endif
3899  else
3900  if (me .eq. 0) then
3901 ! print *,'************************************************'
3902  print *,'no soil wetness analysis available. climatology used'
3903  endif
3904  endif
3905 !
3906 ! read in snow depth/snow cover
3907 !
3908  irtscv=0
3909  if(fnsnoa(1:8).ne.' ') then
3910  do i=1,len
3911  scvanl(i)=0.
3912  enddo
3913 !cggg snow mods start
3914 !cggg need to determine if the snow data is on the gaussian grid
3915 !cggg or not. if gaussian, then data is a depth, not liq equiv
3916 !cggg depth. if not gaussian, then data is from hua-lu's
3917 !cggg program and is a liquid equiv. need to communicate
3918 !cggg this to routine fixrda via the 3rd argument which is
3919 !cggg the grib parameter id number.
3920  call baopenr(lugb,fnsnoa,iret)
3921  if (iret .ne. 0) then
3922  write(6,*) ' error in opening file ',trim(fnsnoa)
3923  print *,'error in opening file ',trim(fnsnoa)
3924  call abort
3925  endif
3926  lugi=0
3927  lskip=-1
3928  jpds=-1
3929  jgds=-1
3930  kpds=jpds
3931  call getgbh(lugb,lugi,lskip,jpds,jgds,lgrib,ndata,
3932  & lskip,kpds,kgds,iret)
3933  close(lugb)
3934  if (iret .ne. 0) then
3935  write(6,*) ' error reading header of file: ',trim(fnsnoa)
3936  print *,'error reading header of file: ',trim(fnsnoa)
3937  call abort
3938  endif
3939  if (kgds(1) == 4) then ! gaussian data is depth
3940  call fixrda(lugb,fnsnoa,kpdsnd,slmask,
3941  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,snoanl,len,iret
3942  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3943  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3944  snoanl=snoanl*100. ! convert from meters to liq. eq.
3945  ! depth in mm using 10:1 ratio
3946  else ! lat/lon data is liq equv. depth
3947  call fixrda(lugb,fnsnoa,kpdsno,slmask,
3948  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,snoanl,len,iret
3949  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3950  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3951  endif
3952 !cggg snow mods end
3953  irtscv=iret
3954  if(iret.eq.1) then
3955  write(6,*) 'snow depth analysis read error'
3956  call abort
3957  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3958  if (me .eq. 0) then
3959  print *,'old snow depth analysis provided, indicating proper',
3960  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3961  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3962  endif
3963  else
3964  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'snow depth analysis provided.'
3965  endif
3966  irtsno=0
3967  elseif(fnscva(1:8).ne.' ') then
3968  do i=1,len
3969  snoanl(i)=0.
3970  enddo
3971  call fixrda(lugb,fnscva,kpdscv,slmask,
3972  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,scvanl,len,iret
3973  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
3974  &, outlat, outlon, me)
3975  irtsno=iret
3976  if(iret.eq.1) then
3977  write(6,*) 'snow cover analysis read error'
3978  call abort
3979  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
3980  if (me .eq. 0) then
3981  print *,'old snow cover analysis provided, indicating proper',
3982  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
3983  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
3984  endif
3985  else
3986  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'snow cover analysis provided.'
3987  endif
3988  else
3989  if (me .eq. 0) then
3990 ! print *,'************************************************'
3991  print *,'no snow/snocov analysis available. climatology used'
3992  endif
3993  endif
3994 !
3995 ! sea ice mask
3996 !
3997  irtacn=0
3998  irtais=0
3999  if(fnacna(1:8).ne.' ') then
4000  call fixrda(lugb,fnacna,kpdacn,slmask,
4001  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,acnanl,len,iret
4002  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4003  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4004  irtacn=iret
4005  if(iret.eq.1) then
4006  write(6,*) 'ice concentration analysis read error'
4007  call abort
4008  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4009  if (me .eq. 0) then
4010  print *,'old ice concentration analysis provided',
4011  & ' indicating proper file name is given'
4012  print *,' no error suspected.'
4013  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4014  endif
4015  else
4016  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'ice concentration analysis provided.'
4017  endif
4018  elseif(fnaisa(1:8).ne.' ') then
4019  call fixrda(lugb,fnaisa,kpdais,slmask,
4020  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,aisanl,len,iret
4021  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4022  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4023  irtais=iret
4024  if(iret.eq.1) then
4025  write(6,*) 'ice mask analysis read error'
4026  call abort
4027  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4028  if (me .eq. 0) then
4029  print *,'old ice-mask analysis provided, indicating proper',
4030  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
4031  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4032  endif
4033  else
4034  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'ice mask analysis provided.'
4035  endif
4036  else
4037  if (me .eq. 0) then
4038 ! print *,'************************************************'
4039  print *,'no sea-ice analysis available. climatology used'
4040  endif
4041  endif
4042 !
4043 ! surface roughness
4044 !
4045  irtzor=0
4046  if(fnzora(1:8).ne.' ') then
4047  call fixrda(lugb,fnzora,kpdzor,slmask,
4048  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,zoranl,len,iret
4049  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4050  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4051  irtzor=iret
4052  if(iret.eq.1) then
4053  write(6,*) 'roughness analysis read error'
4054  call abort
4055  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4056  if (me .eq. 0) then
4057  print *,'old roughness analysis provided, indicating proper',
4058  & ' file name is given. no error suspected.'
4059  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4060  endif
4061  else
4062  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'roughness analysis provided.'
4063  endif
4064  else
4065  if (me .eq. 0) then
4066 ! print *,'************************************************'
4067  print *,'no srfc roughness analysis available. climatology used'
4068  endif
4069  endif
4070 !
4071 ! deep soil temperature
4072 !
4073  irttg3=0
4074  irtstc=0
4075  if(fntg3a(1:8).ne.' ') then
4076  call fixrda(lugb,fntg3a,kpdtg3,slmask,
4077  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,tg3anl,len,iret
4078  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4079  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4080  irttg3=iret
4081  if(iret.eq.1) then
4082  write(6,*) 'deep soil tmp analysis read error'
4083  call abort
4084  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4085  if (me .eq. 0) then
4086  print *,'old deep soil temp analysis provided',
4087  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4088  print *,' no error suspected.'
4089  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4090  endif
4091  else
4092  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'deep soil tmp analysis provided.'
4093  endif
4094  elseif(fnstca(1:8).ne.' ') then
4095  call fixrda(lugb,fnstca,kpdstc,slmask,
4096  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,stcanl(1,1),len,iret
4097  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4098  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4099  call fixrda(lugb,fnstca,kpdstc,slmask,
4100  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,stcanl(1,2),len,iret
4101  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4102  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4103  irtstc=iret
4104  if(iret.eq.1) then
4105  write(6,*) 'layer soil tmp analysis read error'
4106  call abort
4107  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4108  if (me .eq. 0) then
4109  print *,'old deep soil temp analysis provided',
4110  & 'iindicating proper file name is given.'
4111  print *,' no error suspected.'
4112  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4113  endif
4114  else
4115  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'layer soil tmp analysis provided.'
4116  endif
4117  else
4118  if (me .eq. 0) then
4119 ! print *,'************************************************'
4120  print *,'no deep soil temp analy available. climatology used'
4121  endif
4122  endif
4123 !
4124 ! vegetation cover
4125 !
4126  irtveg=0
4127  if(fnvega(1:8).ne.' ') then
4128  call fixrda(lugb,fnvega,kpdveg,slmask,
4129  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,veganl,len,iret
4130  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4131  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4132  irtveg=iret
4133  if(iret.eq.1) then
4134  write(6,*) 'vegetation cover analysis read error'
4135  call abort
4136  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4137  if (me .eq. 0) then
4138  print *,'old vegetation cover analysis provided',
4139  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4140  print *,' no error suspected.'
4141  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4142  endif
4143  else
4144  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'gegetation cover analysis provided.'
4145  endif
4146  else
4147  if (me .eq. 0) then
4148 ! print *,'************************************************'
4149  print *,'no vegetation cover anly available. climatology used'
4150  endif
4151  endif
4152 !
4153 ! vegetation type
4154 !
4155  irtvet=0
4156  if(fnveta(1:8).ne.' ') then
4157  call fixrda(lugb,fnveta,kpdvet,slmask,
4158  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,vetanl,len,iret
4159  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4160  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4161  irtvet=iret
4162  if(iret.eq.1) then
4163  write(6,*) 'vegetation type analysis read error'
4164  call abort
4165  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4166  if (me .eq. 0) then
4167  print *,'old vegetation type analysis provided',
4168  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4169  print *,' no error suspected.'
4170  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4171  endif
4172  else
4173  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'vegetation type analysis provided.'
4174  endif
4175  else
4176  if (me .eq. 0) then
4177 ! print *,'************************************************'
4178  print *,'no vegetation type anly available. climatology used'
4179  endif
4180  endif
4181 !
4182 ! soil type
4183 !
4184  irtsot=0
4185  if(fnsota(1:8).ne.' ') then
4186  call fixrda(lugb,fnsota,kpdsot,slmask,
4187  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,sotanl,len,iret
4188  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4189  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4190  irtsot=iret
4191  if(iret.eq.1) then
4192  write(6,*) 'soil type analysis read error'
4193  call abort
4194  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4195  if (me .eq. 0) then
4196  print *,'old soil type analysis provided',
4197  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4198  print *,' no error suspected.'
4199  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4200  endif
4201  else
4202  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'soil type analysis provided.'
4203  endif
4204  else
4205  if (me .eq. 0) then
4206 ! print *,'************************************************'
4207  print *,'no soil type anly available. climatology used'
4208  endif
4209  endif
4210 
4211 !clu [+120l]--------------------------------------------------------------
4212 !
4213 ! min vegetation cover
4214 !
4215  irtvmn=0
4216  if(fnvmna(1:8).ne.' ') then
4217  call fixrda(lugb,fnvmna,kpdvmn,slmask,
4218  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,vmnanl,len,iret
4219  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4220  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4221  irtvmn=iret
4222  if(iret.eq.1) then
4223  write(6,*) 'shdmin analysis read error'
4224  call abort
4225  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4226  if (me .eq. 0) then
4227  print *,'old shdmin analysis provided',
4228  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4229  print *,' no error suspected.'
4230  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4231  endif
4232  else
4233  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'shdmin analysis provided.'
4234  endif
4235  else
4236  if (me .eq. 0) then
4237 ! print *,'************************************************'
4238  print *,'no shdmin anly available. climatology used'
4239  endif
4240  endif
4241 
4242 !
4243 ! max vegetation cover
4244 !
4245  irtvmx=0
4246  if(fnvmxa(1:8).ne.' ') then
4247  call fixrda(lugb,fnvmxa,kpdvmx,slmask,
4248  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,vmxanl,len,iret
4249  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4250  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4251  irtvmx=iret
4252  if(iret.eq.1) then
4253  write(6,*) 'shdmax analysis read error'
4254  call abort
4255  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4256  if (me .eq. 0) then
4257  print *,'old shdmax analysis provided',
4258  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4259  print *,' no error suspected.'
4260  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4261  endif
4262  else
4263  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'shdmax analysis provided.'
4264  endif
4265  else
4266  if (me .eq. 0) then
4267 ! print *,'************************************************'
4268  print *,'no shdmax anly available. climatology used'
4269  endif
4270  endif
4271 
4272 !
4273 ! slope type
4274 !
4275  irtslp=0
4276  if(fnslpa(1:8).ne.' ') then
4277  call fixrda(lugb,fnslpa,kpdslp,slmask,
4278  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,slpanl,len,iret
4279  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4280  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4281  irtslp=iret
4282  if(iret.eq.1) then
4283  write(6,*) 'slope type analysis read error'
4284  call abort
4285  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4286  if (me .eq. 0) then
4287  print *,'old slope type analysis provided',
4288  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4289  print *,' no error suspected.'
4290  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4291  endif
4292  else
4293  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'slope type analysis provided.'
4294  endif
4295  else
4296  if (me .eq. 0) then
4297 ! print *,'************************************************'
4298  print *,'no slope type anly available. climatology used'
4299  endif
4300  endif
4301 
4302 !
4303 ! max snow albedo
4304 !
4305  irtabs=0
4306  if(fnabsa(1:8).ne.' ') then
4307  call fixrda(lugb,fnabsa,kpdabs,slmask,
4308  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,absanl,len,iret
4309  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
4310  &, outlat, outlon, me)
4311  irtabs=iret
4312  if(iret.eq.1) then
4313  write(6,*) 'snoalb analysis read error'
4314  call abort
4315  elseif(iret.eq.-1) then
4316  if (me .eq. 0) then
4317  print *,'old snoalb analysis provided',
4318  & ' indicating proper file name is given.'
4319  print *,' no error suspected.'
4320  write(6,*) 'forecast guess will be used'
4321  endif
4322  else
4323  if (me .eq. 0) print *,'snoalb analysis provided.'
4324  endif
4325  else
4326  if (me .eq. 0) then
4327 ! print *,'************************************************'
4328  print *,'no snoalb anly available. climatology used'
4329  endif
4330  endif
4331 
4332 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
4333 !
4334  return
4335  end
4336  subroutine filfcs(tsffcs,wetfcs,snofcs,zorfcs,albfcs,
4337  & tg3fcs,cvfcs ,cvbfcs,cvtfcs,
4338  & cnpfcs,smcfcs,stcfcs,slifcs,aisfcs,
4339  & vegfcs, vetfcs, sotfcs, alffcs,
4340 !cwu [+1l] add ()fcs for sih, sic
4341  & sihfcs,sicfcs,
4342 !clu [+1l] add ()fcs for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
4343  & vmnfcs,vmxfcs,slpfcs,absfcs,
4344  & tsfanl,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,
4345  & tg3anl,cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
4346  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,aisanl,
4347  & veganl, vetanl, sotanl, alfanl,
4348 !cwu [+1l] add ()anl for sih, sic
4349  & sihanl,sicanl,
4350 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
4351  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
4352  & len,lsoil)
4353 !
4354  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4355  implicit none
4356  integer i,j,len,lsoil
4357  real (kind=kind_io8) tsffcs(len),wetfcs(len),snofcs(len),
4358  & zorfcs(len),albfcs(len,4),aisfcs(len),
4359  & tg3fcs(len),
4360  & cvfcs(len),cvbfcs(len),cvtfcs(len),
4361  & cnpfcs(len),
4362  & smcfcs(len,lsoil),stcfcs(len,lsoil),
4363  & slifcs(len),vegfcs(len),
4364  & vetfcs(len),sotfcs(len),alffcs(len,2)
4365 !cwu [+1l] add ()fcs for sih, sic
4366  &, sihfcs(len),sicfcs(len)
4367 !clu [+1l] add ()fcs for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
4368  &, vmnfcs(len),vmxfcs(len),slpfcs(len),absfcs(len)
4369  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len),wetanl(len),snoanl(len),
4370  & zoranl(len),albanl(len,4),aisanl(len),
4371  & tg3anl(len),
4372  & cvanl(len),cvbanl(len),cvtanl(len),
4373  & cnpanl(len),
4374  & smcanl(len,lsoil),stcanl(len,lsoil),
4375  & slianl(len),veganl(len),
4376  & vetanl(len),sotanl(len),alfanl(len,2)
4377 !cwu [+1l] add ()anl for sih, sic
4378  &, sihanl(len),sicanl(len)
4379 !clu [+1l] add ()anl for vmn, vmx, slp, abs
4380  &, vmnanl(len),vmxanl(len),slpanl(len),absanl(len)
4381 !
4382  write(6,*) ' this is a dead start run, tsfc over land is',
4383  & ' set as lowest sigma level temperture if given.'
4384  write(6,*) ' if not, set to climatological tsf over land is used'
4385 !
4386 !
4387  do i=1,len
4388  tsffcs(i) = tsfanl(i) ! tsf
4389  albfcs(i,1) = albanl(i,1) ! albedo
4390  albfcs(i,2) = albanl(i,2) ! albedo
4391  albfcs(i,3) = albanl(i,3) ! albedo
4392  albfcs(i,4) = albanl(i,4) ! albedo
4393  wetfcs(i) = wetanl(i) ! soil wetness
4394  snofcs(i) = snoanl(i) ! snow
4395  aisfcs(i) = aisanl(i) ! seaice
4396  slifcs(i) = slianl(i) ! land/sea/snow mask
4397  zorfcs(i) = zoranl(i) ! surface roughness
4398 ! plrfcs(i) = plranl(i) ! maximum stomatal resistance
4399  tg3fcs(i) = tg3anl(i) ! deep soil temperature
4400  cnpfcs(i) = cnpanl(i) ! canopy water content
4401  cvfcs(i) = cvanl(i) ! cv
4402  cvbfcs(i) = cvbanl(i) ! cvb
4403  cvtfcs(i) = cvtanl(i) ! cvt
4404  vegfcs(i) = veganl(i) ! vegetation cover
4405  vetfcs(i) = vetanl(i) ! vegetation type
4406  sotfcs(i) = sotanl(i) ! soil type
4407  alffcs(i,1) = alfanl(i,1) ! vegetation fraction for albedo
4408  alffcs(i,2) = alfanl(i,2) ! vegetation fraction for albedo
4409 !cwu [+2l] add sih, sic
4410  sihfcs(i) = sihanl(i) ! sea ice thickness
4411  sicfcs(i) = sicanl(i) ! sea ice concentration
4412 !clu [+4l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
4413  vmnfcs(i) = vmnanl(i) ! min vegetation cover
4414  vmxfcs(i) = vmxanl(i) ! max vegetation cover
4415  slpfcs(i) = slpanl(i) ! slope type
4416  absfcs(i) = absanl(i) ! max snow albedo
4417  enddo
4418 !
4419  do j=1,lsoil
4420  do i=1,len
4421  smcfcs(i,j) = smcanl(i,j) ! layer soil wetness
4422  stcfcs(i,j) = stcanl(i,j) ! soil temperature
4423  enddo
4424  enddo
4425 !
4426  return
4427  end
4428  subroutine bktges(smcfcs,slianl,stcfcs,len,lsoil)
4429 !
4430  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4431  implicit none
4432  integer i,j,len,lsoil,k
4433  real (kind=kind_io8) smcfcs(len,lsoil), stcfcs(len,lsoil),
4434  & slianl(len)
4435 !
4436 ! note that smfcs comes in with the original unit (cm?) (not grib file)
4437 !
4438  do i = 1, len
4439  smcfcs(i,1) = (smcfcs(i,1)/150.) * .37 + .1
4440  enddo
4441  do k = 2, lsoil
4442  do i = 1, len
4443  smcfcs(i,k) = smcfcs(i,1)
4444  enddo
4445  enddo
4446  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
4447  do k = 3, lsoil
4448  do i = 1, len
4449  stcfcs(i,k) = stcfcs(i,2)
4450  enddo
4451  enddo
4452  endif
4453 !
4454  return
4455  end
4456  subroutine rof01(aisfld,len,op,crit)
4457  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4458  implicit none
4459  integer i,len
4460  real (kind=kind_io8) aisfld(len),crit
4461  character*2 op
4462 !
4463  if(op.eq.'ge') then
4464  do i=1,len
4465  if(aisfld(i).ge.crit) then
4466  aisfld(i)=1.
4467  else
4468  aisfld(i)=0.
4469  endif
4470  enddo
4471  elseif(op.eq.'gt') then
4472  do i=1,len
4473  if(aisfld(i).gt.crit) then
4474  aisfld(i)=1.
4475  else
4476  aisfld(i)=0.
4477  endif
4478  enddo
4479  elseif(op.eq.'le') then
4480  do i=1,len
4481  if(aisfld(i).le.crit) then
4482  aisfld(i)=1.
4483  else
4484  aisfld(i)=0.
4485  endif
4486  enddo
4487  elseif(op.eq.'lt') then
4488  do i=1,len
4489  if(aisfld(i).lt.crit) then
4490  aisfld(i)=1.
4491  else
4492  aisfld(i)=0.
4493  endif
4494  enddo
4495  else
4496  write(6,*) ' illegal operator in rof01. op=',op
4497  call abort
4498  endif
4499 !
4500  return
4501  end
4502  subroutine tsfcor(tsfc,orog,slmask,umask,len,rlapse)
4503 !
4504  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4505  implicit none
4506  integer i,len
4507  real (kind=kind_io8) rlapse,umask
4508  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfc(len), orog(len), slmask(len)
4509 !
4510  do i=1,len
4511  if(slmask(i).eq.umask) then
4512  tsfc(i) = tsfc(i) - orog(i)*rlapse
4513  endif
4514  enddo
4515  return
4516  end
4517  subroutine snodpth(scvanl,slianl,tsfanl,snoclm,
4518  & glacir,snwmax,snwmin,landice,len,snoanl, me)
4519  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4520  implicit none
4521  integer i,me,len
4522  logical, intent(in) :: landice
4523  real (kind=kind_io8) sno,snwmax,snwmin
4524 !
4525  real (kind=kind_io8) scvanl(len), slianl(len), tsfanl(len),
4526  & snoclm(len), snoanl(len), glacir(len)
4527 !
4528  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'snodpth'
4529 !
4530 ! use surface temperature to get snow depth estimate
4531 !
4532  do i=1,len
4533  sno = 0.0
4534 !
4535 ! over land
4536 !
4537  if(slianl(i).eq.1.) then
4538  if(scvanl(i).eq.1.0) then
4539  if(tsfanl(i).lt.243.0) then
4540  sno = snwmax
4541  elseif(tsfanl(i).lt.273.0) then
4542  sno = snwmin+(snwmax-snwmin)*(273.0-tsfanl(i))/30.0
4543  else
4544  sno = snwmin
4545  endif
4546  endif
4547 !
4548 ! if glacial points has snow in climatology, set sno to snomax
4549 !
4550  if (.not.landice) then
4551  if(glacir(i).eq.1.0) then
4552  sno = snoclm(i)
4553  if(sno.eq.0.) sno=snwmax
4554  endif
4555  endif
4556  endif
4557 !
4558 ! over sea ice
4559 !
4560 ! snow over sea ice is cycled as of 01/01/94.....hua-lu pan
4561 !
4562  if(slianl(i).eq.2.0) then
4563  sno=snoclm(i)
4564  if(sno.eq.0.) sno=snwmax
4565  endif
4566 !
4567  snoanl(i) = sno
4568  enddo
4569  return
4570  end subroutine snodpth
4571  subroutine merge(len,lsoil,iy,im,id,ih,fh,deltsfc,
4572  & sihfcs,sicfcs,
4573  & vmnfcs,vmxfcs,slpfcs,absfcs,
4574  & tsffcs,wetfcs,snofcs,zorfcs,albfcs,aisfcs,
4575  & cvfcs ,cvbfcs,cvtfcs,
4576  & cnpfcs,smcfcs,stcfcs,slifcs,vegfcs,
4577  & vetfcs,sotfcs,alffcs,
4578  & sihanl,sicanl,
4579  & vmnanl,vmxanl,slpanl,absanl,
4580  & tsfanl,tsfan2,wetanl,snoanl,zoranl,albanl,aisanl,
4581  & cvanl ,cvbanl,cvtanl,
4582  & cnpanl,smcanl,stcanl,slianl,veganl,
4583  & vetanl,sotanl,alfanl,
4584  & ctsfl,calbl,caisl,csnol,csmcl,czorl,cstcl,cvegl,
4585  & ctsfs,calbs,caiss,csnos,csmcs,czors,cstcs,cvegs,
4586  & ccv,ccvb,ccvt,ccnp,cvetl,cvets,csotl,csots,
4587  & calfl,calfs,
4588  & csihl,csihs,csicl,csics,
4589  & cvmnl,cvmns,cvmxl,cvmxs,cslpl,cslps,cabsl,cabss,
4590  & irttsf,irtwet,irtsno,irtzor,irtalb,irtais,
4591  & irttg3,irtscv,irtacn,irtsmc,irtstc,irtveg,
4592  & irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs,
4593  & irtvet,irtsot,irtalf, landice, me)
4594  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
4595  use sfccyc_module, only : veg_type_landice, soil_type_landice
4596  implicit none
4597  integer k,i,im,id,iy,len,lsoil,ih,irtacn,irtsmc,irtscv,irtais,
4598  & irttg3,irtstc,irtalf,me,irtsot,irtveg,irtvet, irtzor,
4599  & irtalb,irtsno,irttsf,irtwet,j
4600  &, irtvmn,irtvmx,irtslp,irtabs
4601  logical, intent(in) :: landice
4602  real (kind=kind_io8) rvegs,rvets,rzors,raiss,rsnos,rsots,rcnp,
4603  & rcvt,rcv,rcvb,rsnol,rzorl,raisl,ralbl,
4604  & ralfl,rvegl,ralbs,ralfs,rtsfs,rvetl,rsotl,
4605  & qzors,qvegs,qsnos,qalfs,qaiss,qvets,qcvt,
4606  & qcnp,qcvb,qsots,qcv,qaisl,qsnol,qalfl,
4607  & qtsfl,qalbl,qzorl,qtsfs,qalbs,qsotl,qvegl,
4608  & qvetl,rtsfl,calbs,caiss,ctsfs,czorl,cvegl,
4609  & csnos,ccvb,ccvt,ccv,czors,cvegs,caisl,csnol,
4610  & calbl,fh,ctsfl,ccnp,csots,calfl,csotl,cvetl,
4611  & cvets,calfs,deltsfc,
4612  & csihl,csihs,csicl,csics,
4613  & rsihl,rsihs,rsicl,rsics,
4614  & qsihl,qsihs,qsicl,qsics
4615  &, cvmnl,cvmns,cvmxl,cvmxs,cslpl,cslps
4616  &, cabsl,cabss,rvmnl,rvmns,rvmxl,rvmxs
4617  &, rslpl,rslps,rabsl,rabss,qvmnl,qvmns
4618  &, qvmxl,qvmxs,qslpl,qslps,qabsl,qabss
4619 !
4620  real (kind=kind_io8) tsffcs(len), wetfcs(len), snofcs(len),
4621  & zorfcs(len), albfcs(len,4), aisfcs(len),
4622  & cvfcs(len), cvbfcs(len), cvtfcs(len),
4623  & cnpfcs(len),
4624  & smcfcs(len,lsoil),stcfcs(len,lsoil),
4625  & slifcs(len), vegfcs(len),
4626  & vetfcs(len), sotfcs(len), alffcs(len,2)
4627  &, sihfcs(len), sicfcs(len)
4628  &, vmnfcs(len),vmxfcs(len),slpfcs(len),absfcs(len)
4629  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len),tsfan2(len),
4630  & wetanl(len),snoanl(len),
4631  & zoranl(len), albanl(len,4), aisanl(len),
4632  & cvanl(len), cvbanl(len), cvtanl(len),
4633  & cnpanl(len),
4634  & smcanl(len,lsoil),stcanl(len,lsoil),
4635  & slianl(len), veganl(len),
4636  & vetanl(len), sotanl(len), alfanl(len,2)
4637  &, sihanl(len),sicanl(len)
4638  &, vmnanl(len),vmxanl(len),slpanl(len),absanl(len)
4639 !
4640  real (kind=kind_io8) csmcl(lsoil), csmcs(lsoil),
4641  & cstcl(lsoil), cstcs(lsoil)
4642  real (kind=kind_io8) rsmcl(lsoil), rsmcs(lsoil),
4643  & rstcl(lsoil), rstcs(lsoil)
4644  real (kind=kind_io8) qsmcl(lsoil), qsmcs(lsoil),
4645  & qstcl(lsoil), qstcs(lsoil)
4646  logical first
4647  integer num_threads
4648  data first /.true./
4649  save num_threads, first
4650 !
4651  integer len_thread_m, i1_t, i2_t, it
4652  integer num_parthds
4653 !
4654  if (first) then
4655  num_threads = num_parthds()
4656  first = .false.
4657  endif
4658 !
4659 ! coeeficients of blending forecast and interpolated clim
4660 ! (or analyzed) fields over sea or land(l) (not for clouds)
4661 ! 1.0 = use of forecast
4662 ! 0.0 = replace with interpolated analysis
4663 !
4664 ! merging coefficients are defined by parameter statement in calling program
4665 ! and therefore they should not be modified in this program.
4666 !
4667  rtsfl = ctsfl
4668  ralbl = calbl
4669  ralfl = calfl
4670  raisl = caisl
4671  rsnol = csnol
4672 !clu rsmcl = csmcl
4673  rzorl = czorl
4674  rvegl = cvegl
4675  rvetl = cvetl
4676  rsotl = csotl
4677  rsihl = csihl
4678  rsicl = csicl
4679  rvmnl = cvmnl
4680  rvmxl = cvmxl
4681  rslpl = cslpl
4682  rabsl = cabsl
4683 !
4684  rtsfs = ctsfs
4685  ralbs = calbs
4686  ralfs = calfs
4687  raiss = caiss
4688  rsnos = csnos
4689 ! rsmcs = csmcs
4690  rzors = czors
4691  rvegs = cvegs
4692  rvets = cvets
4693  rsots = csots
4694  rsihs = csihs
4695  rsics = csics
4696  rvmns = cvmns
4697  rvmxs = cvmxs
4698  rslps = cslps
4699  rabss = cabss
4700 !
4701  rcv = ccv
4702  rcvb = ccvb
4703  rcvt = ccvt
4704  rcnp = ccnp
4705 !
4706  do k=1,lsoil
4707  rsmcl(k) = csmcl(k)
4708  rsmcs(k) = csmcs(k)
4709  rstcl(k) = cstcl(k)
4710  rstcs(k) = cstcs(k)
4711  enddo
4712  if (fh-deltsfc < -0.001 .and. irttsf == 1) then
4713  rtsfs = 1.0
4714  rtsfl = 1.0
4715 ! do k=1,lsoil
4716 ! rsmcl(k) = 1.0
4717 ! rsmcs(k) = 1.0
4718 ! rstcl(k) = 1.0
4719 ! rstcs(k) = 1.0
4720 ! enddo
4721  endif
4722 !
4723 ! if analysis file name is given but no matching analysis date found,
4724 ! use guess (these are flagged by irt???=1).
4725 !
4726  if(irttsf == -1) then
4727  rtsfl = 1.
4728  rtsfs = 1.
4729  endif
4730  if(irtalb == -1) then
4731  ralbl = 1.
4732  ralbs = 1.
4733  ralfl = 1.
4734  ralfs = 1.
4735  endif
4736  if(irtais == -1) then
4737  raisl = 1.
4738  raiss = 1.
4739  endif
4740  if(irtsno == -1 .or. irtscv == -1) then
4741  rsnol = 1.
4742  rsnos = 1.
4743  endif
4744  if(irtsmc == -1 .or. irtwet == -1) then
4745 ! rsmcl = 1.
4746 ! rsmcs = 1.
4747  do k=1,lsoil
4748  rsmcl(k) = 1.
4749  rsmcs(k) = 1.
4750  enddo
4751  endif
4752  if(irtstc.eq.-1) then
4753  do k=1,lsoil
4754  rstcl(k) = 1.
4755  rstcs(k) = 1.
4756  enddo
4757  endif
4758  if(irtzor == -1) then
4759  rzorl = 1.
4760  rzors = 1.
4761  endif
4762  if(irtveg == -1) then
4763  rvegl = 1.
4764  rvegs = 1.
4765  endif
4766  if(irtvet.eq.-1) then
4767  rvetl = 1.
4768  rvets = 1.
4769  endif
4770  if(irtsot == -1) then
4771  rsotl = 1.
4772  rsots = 1.
4773  endif
4774 
4775  if(irtacn == -1) then
4776  rsicl = 1.
4777  rsics = 1.
4778  endif
4779  if(irtvmn == -1) then
4780  rvmnl = 1.
4781  rvmns = 1.
4782  endif
4783  if(irtvmx == -1) then
4784  rvmxl = 1.
4785  rvmxs = 1.
4786  endif
4787  if(irtslp == -1) then
4788  rslpl = 1.
4789  rslps = 1.
4790  endif
4791  if(irtabs == -1) then
4792  rabsl = 1.
4793  rabss = 1.
4794  endif
4795 !
4796  if(raiss == 1. .or. irtacn == -1) then
4797  if (me == 0) print *,'use forecast land-sea-ice mask'
4798  do i = 1, len
4799  aisanl(i) = aisfcs(i)
4800  slianl(i) = slifcs(i)
4801  enddo
4802  endif
4803 !
4804  if (me == 0) then
4805  write(6,100) rtsfl,ralbl,raisl,rsnol,rsmcl,rzorl,rvegl
4806  100 format('rtsfl,ralbl,raisl,rsnol,rsmcl,rzorl,rvegl=',10f7.3)
4807  write(6,101) rtsfs,ralbs,raiss,rsnos,rsmcs,rzors,rvegs
4808  101 format('rtsfs,ralbs,raiss,rsnos,rsmcs,rzors,rvegs=',10f7.3)
4809 ! print *,' ralfl=',ralfl,' ralfs=',ralfs,' rsotl=',rsotl
4810 ! *,' rsots=',rsots,' rvetl=',rvetl,' rvets=',rvets
4811  endif
4812 !
4813  qtsfl = 1. - rtsfl
4814  qalbl = 1. - ralbl
4815  qalfl = 1. - ralfl
4816  qaisl = 1. - raisl
4817  qsnol = 1. - rsnol
4818 ! qsmcl = 1. - rsmcl
4819  qzorl = 1. - rzorl
4820  qvegl = 1. - rvegl
4821  qvetl = 1. - rvetl
4822  qsotl = 1. - rsotl
4823  qsihl = 1. - rsihl
4824  qsicl = 1. - rsicl
4825  qvmnl = 1. - rvmnl
4826  qvmxl = 1. - rvmxl
4827  qslpl = 1. - rslpl
4828  qabsl = 1. - rabsl
4829 !
4830  qtsfs = 1. - rtsfs
4831  qalbs = 1. - ralbs
4832  qalfs = 1. - ralfs
4833  qaiss = 1. - raiss
4834  qsnos = 1. - rsnos
4835 ! qsmcs = 1. - rsmcs
4836  qzors = 1. - rzors
4837  qvegs = 1. - rvegs
4838  qvets = 1. - rvets
4839  qsots = 1. - rsots
4840  qsihs = 1. - rsihs
4841  qsics = 1. - rsics
4842  qvmns = 1. - rvmns
4843  qvmxs = 1. - rvmxs
4844  qslps = 1. - rslps
4845  qabss = 1. - rabss
4846 !
4847  qcv = 1. - rcv
4848  qcvb = 1. - rcvb
4849  qcvt = 1. - rcvt
4850  qcnp = 1. - rcnp
4851 !
4852  do k=1,lsoil
4853  qsmcl(k) = 1. - rsmcl(k)
4854  qsmcs(k) = 1. - rsmcs(k)
4855  qstcl(k) = 1. - rstcl(k)
4856  qstcs(k) = 1. - rstcs(k)
4857  enddo
4858 !
4859 ! merging
4860 !
4861  if(me .eq. 0) then
4862  print *, 'dbgx-- csmcl:', (csmcl(k),k=1,lsoil)
4863  print *, 'dbgx-- rsmcl:', (rsmcl(k),k=1,lsoil)
4864  print *, 'dbgx-- csnol, csnos:',csnol,csnos
4865  print *, 'dbgx-- rsnol, rsnos:',rsnol,rsnos
4866  endif
4867 
4868 ! print *, rtsfs, qtsfs, raiss , qaiss
4869 ! *, rsnos , qsnos, rzors , qzors, rvegs , qvegs
4870 ! *, rvets , qvets, rsots , qsots
4871 ! *, rcv, rcvb, rcvt, qcv, qcvb, qcvt
4872 ! *, ralbs, qalbs, ralfs, qalfs
4873 ! print *, rtsfl, qtsfl, raisl , qaisl
4874 ! *, rsnol , qsnol, rzorl , qzorl, rvegl , qvegl
4875 ! *, rvetl , qvetl, rsotl , qsotl
4876 ! *, ralbl, qalbl, ralfl, qalfl
4877 !
4878 !
4879  len_thread_m = (len+num_threads-1) / num_threads
4880 
4881 !$omp parallel do private(i1_t,i2_t,it,i)
4882  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
4883  i1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
4884  i2_t = min(i1_t+len_thread_m-1,len)
4885  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4886  if(slianl(i).eq.0.) then
4887  vetanl(i) = vetfcs(i)*rvets + vetanl(i)*qvets
4888  sotanl(i) = sotfcs(i)*rsots + sotanl(i)*qsots
4889  else
4890  vetanl(i) = vetfcs(i)*rvetl + vetanl(i)*qvetl
4891  sotanl(i) = sotfcs(i)*rsotl + sotanl(i)*qsotl
4892  endif
4893  enddo
4894  enddo
4895 !$omp end parallel do
4896 !
4897 !$omp parallel do private(i1_t,i2_t,it,i,k)
4898 !
4899  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
4900  i1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
4901  i2_t = min(i1_t+len_thread_m-1,len)
4902 !
4903  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4904  if(slianl(i).eq.0.) then
4905 !.... tsffc2 is the previous anomaly + today's climatology
4906 ! tsffc2 = (tsffcs(i)-tsfan2(i))+tsfanl(i)
4907 ! tsfanl(i) = tsffc2 *rtsfs+tsfanl(i)*qtsfs
4908 !
4909  tsfanl(i) = tsffcs(i)*rtsfs + tsfanl(i)*qtsfs
4910 ! albanl(i) = albfcs(i)*ralbs + albanl(i)*qalbs
4911  aisanl(i) = aisfcs(i)*raiss + aisanl(i)*qaiss
4912  snoanl(i) = snofcs(i)*rsnos + snoanl(i)*qsnos
4913 
4914  zoranl(i) = zorfcs(i)*rzors + zoranl(i)*qzors
4915  veganl(i) = vegfcs(i)*rvegs + veganl(i)*qvegs
4916  sihanl(i) = sihfcs(i)*rsihs + sihanl(i)*qsihs
4917  sicanl(i) = sicfcs(i)*rsics + sicanl(i)*qsics
4918  vmnanl(i) = vmnfcs(i)*rvmns + vmnanl(i)*qvmns
4919  vmxanl(i) = vmxfcs(i)*rvmxs + vmxanl(i)*qvmxs
4920  slpanl(i) = slpfcs(i)*rslps + slpanl(i)*qslps
4921  absanl(i) = absfcs(i)*rabss + absanl(i)*qabss
4922  else
4923  tsfanl(i) = tsffcs(i)*rtsfl + tsfanl(i)*qtsfl
4924 ! albanl(i) = albfcs(i)*ralbl + albanl(i)*qalbl
4925  aisanl(i) = aisfcs(i)*raisl + aisanl(i)*qaisl
4926  if(rsnol.ge.0)then
4927  snoanl(i) = snofcs(i)*rsnol + snoanl(i)*qsnol
4928  else ! envelope method
4929  if(snoanl(i).ne.0)then
4930  snoanl(i) = max(-snoanl(i)/rsnol,
4931  & min(-snoanl(i)*rsnol, snofcs(i)))
4932  endif
4933  endif
4934  zoranl(i) = zorfcs(i)*rzorl + zoranl(i)*qzorl
4935  veganl(i) = vegfcs(i)*rvegl + veganl(i)*qvegl
4936  vmnanl(i) = vmnfcs(i)*rvmnl + vmnanl(i)*qvmnl
4937  vmxanl(i) = vmxfcs(i)*rvmxl + vmxanl(i)*qvmxl
4938  slpanl(i) = slpfcs(i)*rslpl + slpanl(i)*qslpl
4939  absanl(i) = absfcs(i)*rabsl + absanl(i)*qabsl
4940  sihanl(i) = sihfcs(i)*rsihl + sihanl(i)*qsihl
4941  sicanl(i) = sicfcs(i)*rsicl + sicanl(i)*qsicl
4942  endif
4943 
4944  cnpanl(i) = cnpfcs(i)*rcnp + cnpanl(i)*qcnp
4945 !
4946 ! snow over sea ice is cycled
4947 !
4948  if(slianl(i).eq.2.) then
4949  snoanl(i) = snofcs(i)
4950  endif
4951 !
4952  enddo
4953 
4954 ! at landice points, set the soil type, slope type and
4955 ! greenness fields to flag values.
4956 
4957  if (landice) then
4958  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4959  if (nint(slianl(i)) == 1) then
4960  if (nint(vetanl(i)) == veg_type_landice) then
4961  sotanl(i) = soil_type_landice
