4962  veganl(i) = 0.0
4963  slpanl(i) = 9.0
4964  vmnanl(i) = 0.0
4965  vmxanl(i) = 0.0
4966  endif
4967  end if ! if land
4968  enddo
4969  endif
4970 
4971  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4972  cvanl(i) = cvfcs(i)*rcv + cvanl(i)*qcv
4973  cvbanl(i) = cvbfcs(i)*rcvb + cvbanl(i)*qcvb
4974  cvtanl(i) = cvtfcs(i)*rcvt + cvtanl(i)*qcvt
4975  enddo
4976 !
4977  do k = 1, 4
4978  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4979  if(slianl(i).eq.0.) then
4980  albanl(i,k) = albfcs(i,k)*ralbs + albanl(i,k)*qalbs
4981  else
4982  albanl(i,k) = albfcs(i,k)*ralbl + albanl(i,k)*qalbl
4983  endif
4984  enddo
4985  enddo
4986 !
4987  do k = 1, 2
4988  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4989  if(slianl(i).eq.0.) then
4990  alfanl(i,k) = alffcs(i,k)*ralfs + alfanl(i,k)*qalfs
4991  else
4992  alfanl(i,k) = alffcs(i,k)*ralfl + alfanl(i,k)*qalfl
4993  endif
4994  enddo
4995  enddo
4996 !
4997  do k = 1, lsoil
4998  do i=i1_t,i2_t
4999  if(slianl(i).eq.0.) then
5000  smcanl(i,k) = smcfcs(i,k)*rsmcs(k) + smcanl(i,k)*qsmcs(k)
5001  stcanl(i,k) = stcfcs(i,k)*rstcs(k) + stcanl(i,k)*qstcs(k)
5002  else
5003 ! soil moisture not used at landice points, so
5004 ! don't bother merging it. also, for now don't allow nudging
5005 ! to raise subsurface temperature above freezing.
5006  stcanl(i,k) = stcfcs(i,k)*rstcl(k) + stcanl(i,k)*qstcl(k)
5007  if (landice .and. slianl(i) == 1.0 .and.
5008  & nint(vetanl(i)) == veg_type_landice) then
5009  smcanl(i,k) = 1.0 ! use value as flag
5010  stcanl(i,k) = min(stcanl(i,k), 273.15)
5011  else
5012  smcanl(i,k) = smcfcs(i,k)*rsmcl(k) + smcanl(i,k)*qsmcl(k)
5013  end if
5014  endif
5015  enddo
5016  enddo
5017 !
5018  enddo ! end of threaded loop ...................
5019 !$omp end parallel do
5020  return
5021  end subroutine merge
5022  subroutine newice(slianl,slifcs,tsfanl,tsffcs,len,lsoil,
5023 !cwu [+1l] add sihnew,sicnew,sihanl,sicanl
5024  & sihnew,sicnew,sihanl,sicanl,
5025  & albanl,snoanl,zoranl,smcanl,stcanl,
5026  & albsea,snosea,zorsea,smcsea,smcice,
5027  & tsfmin,tsfice,albice,zorice,tgice,
5028  & rla,rlo,me)
5029 !
5030  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5031  implicit none
5032  real (kind=kind_io8), parameter :: one=1.0
5033  real (kind=kind_io8) tgice,albice,zorice,tsfice,albsea,snosea,
5034  & smcice,tsfmin,zorsea,smcsea
5035 !cwu [+1l] add sicnew,sihnew
5036  &, sicnew,sihnew
5037  integer i,me,kount1,kount2,k,len,lsoil
5038  real (kind=kind_io8) slianl(len), slifcs(len),
5039  & tsffcs(len),tsfanl(len)
5040  real (kind=kind_io8) albanl(len,4), snoanl(len), zoranl(len)
5041  real (kind=kind_io8) smcanl(len,lsoil), stcanl(len,lsoil)
5042 !cwu [+1l] add sihanl & sicanl
5043  real (kind=kind_io8) sihanl(len), sicanl(len)
5044 !
5045  real (kind=kind_io8) rla(len), rlo(len)
5046 !
5047  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'newice'
5048 !
5049  kount1 = 0
5050  kount2 = 0
5051  do i=1,len
5052  if(slifcs(i).ne.slianl(i)) then
5053  if(slifcs(i).eq.1..or.slianl(i).eq.1.) then
5054  print *,'inconsistency in slifcs or slianl'
5055  print 910,rla(i),rlo(i),slifcs(i),slianl(i),
5056  & tsffcs(i),tsfanl(i)
5057  910 format(2x,'at lat=',f5.1,' lon=',f5.1,' slifcs=',f4.1,
5058  & ' slimsk=',f4.1,' tsffcs=',f5.1,' set to tsfanl=',f5.1)
5059  call abort
5060  endif
5061 !
5062 ! interpolated climatology indicates melted sea ice
5063 !
5064  if(slianl(i).eq.0..and.slifcs(i).eq.2.) then
5065  tsfanl(i) = tsfmin
5066  albanl(i,1) = albsea
5067  albanl(i,2) = albsea
5068  albanl(i,3) = albsea
5069  albanl(i,4) = albsea
5070  snoanl(i) = snosea
5071  zoranl(i) = zorsea
5072  do k = 1, lsoil
5073  smcanl(i,k) = smcsea
5074 !cwu [+1l] set stcanl to tgice (over sea-ice)
5075  stcanl(i,k) = tgice
5076  enddo
5077 !cwu [+2l] set siganl and sicanl
5078  sihanl(i) = 0.
5079  sicanl(i) = 0.
5080  kount1 = kount1 + 1
5081  endif
5082 !
5083 ! interplated climatoloyg/analysis indicates new sea ice
5084 !
5085  if(slianl(i).eq.2..and.slifcs(i).eq.0.) then
5086  tsfanl(i) = tsfice
5087  albanl(i,1) = albice
5088  albanl(i,2) = albice
5089  albanl(i,3) = albice
5090  albanl(i,4) = albice
5091  snoanl(i) = 0.
5092  zoranl(i) = zorice
5093  do k = 1, lsoil
5094  smcanl(i,k) = smcice
5095  stcanl(i,k) = tgice
5096  enddo
5097 !cwu [+2l] add sihanl & sicanl
5098  sihanl(i) = sihnew
5099  sicanl(i) = min(one, max(sicnew,sicanl(i)))
5100  kount2 = kount2 + 1
5101  endif
5102  endif
5103  enddo
5104 !
5105  if (me .eq. 0) then
5106  if(kount1.gt.0) then
5107  write(6,*) 'sea ice melted. tsf,alb,zor are filled',
5108  & ' at ',kount1,' points'
5109  endif
5110  if(kount2.gt.0) then
5111  write(6,*) 'sea ice formed. tsf,alb,zor are filled',
5112  & ' at ',kount2,' points'
5113  endif
5114  endif
5115 !
5116  return
5117  end
5118  subroutine qcsnow(snoanl,slmask,aisanl,glacir,len,snoval,
5119  & landice,me)
5120  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5121  implicit none
5122  integer kount,i,len,me
5123  logical, intent(in) :: landice
5124  real (kind=kind_io8) per,snoval
5125  real (kind=kind_io8) snoanl(len),slmask(len),
5126  & aisanl(len),glacir(len)
5127  if (me .eq. 0) then
5128  write(6,*) ' '
5129  write(6,*) 'qc of snow'
5130  endif
5131  if (.not.landice) then
5132  kount=0
5133  do i=1,len
5134  if(glacir(i).ne.0..and.snoanl(i).eq.0.) then
5135 ! if(glacir(i).ne.0..and.snoanl(i).lt.snoval*0.5) then
5136  snoanl(i) = snoval
5137  kount = kount + 1
5138  endif
5139  enddo
5140  per = float(kount) / float(len)*100.
5141  if(kount.gt.0) then
5142  if (me .eq. 0) then
5143  print *,'snow filled over glacier points at ',kount,
5144  & ' points (',per,'percent)'
5145  endif
5146  endif
5147  endif ! landice check
5148  kount = 0
5149  do i=1,len
5150  if(slmask(i).eq.0.and.aisanl(i).eq.0) then
5151  snoanl(i) = 0.
5152  kount = kount + 1
5153  endif
5154  enddo
5155  per = float(kount) / float(len)*100.
5156  if(kount.gt.0) then
5157  if (me .eq. 0) then
5158  print *,'snow set to zero over open sea at ',kount,
5159  & ' points (',per,'percent)'
5160  endif
5161  endif
5162  return
5163  end subroutine qcsnow
5164  subroutine qcsice(ais,glacir,amxice,aicice,aicsea,sllnd,slmask,
5165  & rla,rlo,len,me)
5166  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5167  implicit none
5168  integer kount1,kount,i,me,len
5169  real (kind=kind_io8) per,aicsea,aicice,sllnd
5170 !
5171  real (kind=kind_io8) ais(len), glacir(len),
5172  & amxice(len), slmask(len)
5173  real (kind=kind_io8) rla(len), rlo(len)
5174 !
5175 ! check sea-ice cover mask against land-sea mask
5176 !
5177  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'qc of sea ice'
5178  kount = 0
5179  kount1 = 0
5180  do i=1,len
5181  if(ais(i).ne.aicice.and.ais(i).ne.aicsea) then
5182  print *,'sea ice mask not ',aicice,' or ',aicsea
5183  print *,'ais(i),aicice,aicsea,rla(i),rlo(i,=',
5184  & ais(i),aicice,aicsea,rla(i),rlo(i)
5185  call abort
5186  endif
5187  if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.1..and.
5188 ! if(slmask(i).eq.0..and.glacir(i).eq.2..and.
5189  & ais(i).ne.1.) then
5190  kount1 = kount1 + 1
5191  ais(i) = 1.
5192  endif
5193  if(slmask(i).eq.sllnd.and.ais(i).eq.aicice) then
5194  kount = kount + 1
5195  ais(i) = aicsea
5196  endif
5197  enddo
5198 ! enddo
5199  per = float(kount) / float(len)*100.
5200  if(kount.gt.0) then
5201  if(me .eq. 0) then
5202  print *,' sea ice over land mask at ',kount,' points (',per,
5203  & 'percent)'
5204  endif
5205  endif
5206  per = float(kount1) / float(len)*100.
5207  if(kount1.gt.0) then
5208  if(me .eq. 0) then
5209  print *,' sea ice set over glacier points over ocean at ',
5210  & kount1,' points (',per,'percent)'
5211  endif
5212  endif
5213 ! kount=0
5214 ! do j=1,jdim
5215 ! do i=1,idim
5216 ! if(amxice(i,j).ne.0..and.ais(i,j).eq.0.) then
5217 ! ais(i,j)=0.
5218 ! kount=kount+1
5219 ! endif
5220 ! enddo
5221 ! enddo
5222 ! per=float(kount)/float(idim*jdim)*100.
5223 ! if(kount.gt.0) then
5224 ! print *,' sea ice exceeds maxice at ',kount,' points (',per,
5225 ! & 'percent)'
5226 ! endif
5227 !
5228 ! remove isolated open ocean surrounded by sea ice and/or land
5229 !
5230 ! remove isolated open ocean surrounded by sea ice and/or land
5231 !
5232 ! ij = 0
5233 ! do j=1,jdim
5234 ! do i=1,idim
5235 ! ij = ij + 1
5236 ! ip = i + 1
5237 ! im = i - 1
5238 ! jp = j + 1
5239 ! jm = j - 1
5240 ! if(jp.gt.jdim) jp = jdim - 1
5241 ! if(jm.lt.1) jm = 2
5242 ! if(ip.gt.idim) ip = 1
5243 ! if(im.lt.1) im = idim
5244 ! if(slmask(i,j).eq.0..and.ais(i,j).eq.0.) then
5245 ! if((slmask(ip,jp).eq.1..or.ais(ip,jp).eq.1.).and.
5246 ! & (slmask(i ,jp).eq.1..or.ais(i ,jp).eq.1.).and.
5247 ! & (slmask(im,jp).eq.1..or.ais(im,jp).eq.1.).and.
5248 ! & (slmask(ip,j ).eq.1..or.ais(ip,j ).eq.1.).and.
5249 ! & (slmask(im,j ).eq.1..or.ais(im,j ).eq.1.).and.
5250 ! & (slmask(ip,jm).eq.1..or.ais(ip,jm).eq.1.).and.
5251 ! & (slmask(i ,jm).eq.1..or.ais(i ,jm).eq.1.).and.
5252 ! & (slmask(im,jm).eq.1..or.ais(im,jm).eq.1.)) then
5253 ! ais(i,j) = 1.
5254 ! write(6,*) ' isolated open sea point surrounded by',
5255 ! & ' sea ice or land modified to sea ice',
5256 ! & ' at lat=',rla(i,j),' lon=',rlo(i,j)
5257 ! endif
5258 ! endif
5259 ! enddo
5260 ! enddo
5261  return
5262  end
5263  subroutine setlsi(slmask,aisfld,len,aicice,slifld)
5264 !
5265  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5266  implicit none
5267  integer i,len
5268  real (kind=kind_io8) aicice
5269  real (kind=kind_io8) slmask(len), slifld(len), aisfld(len)
5270 !
5271 ! set surface condition indicator slimsk
5272 !
5273  do i=1,len
5274  slifld(i) = slmask(i)
5275 ! if(aisfld(i).eq.aicice) slifld(i) = 2.0
5276  if(aisfld(i).eq.aicice .and. slmask(i) .eq. 0.0)
5277  & slifld(i) = 2.0
5278  enddo
5279  return
5280  end
5281  subroutine scale(fld,len,scl)
5282 !
5283  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5284  implicit none
5285  integer i,len
5286  real (kind=kind_io8) fld(len),scl
5287  do i=1,len
5288  fld(i) = fld(i) * scl
5289  enddo
5290  return
5291  end
5292  subroutine qcmxmn(ttl,fld,slimsk,sno,iceflg,
5293  & fldlmx,fldlmn,fldomx,fldomn,fldimx,fldimn,
5294  & fldjmx,fldjmn,fldsmx,fldsmn,epsfld,
5295  & rla,rlo,len,mode,percrit,lgchek,me)
5296 !
5297  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5298  implicit none
5299  real (kind=kind_io8) permax,per,fldimx,fldimn,fldjmx,fldomn,
5300  & fldlmx,fldlmn,fldomx,fldjmn,percrit,
5301  & fldsmx,fldsmn,epsfld
5302  integer kmaxi,kmini,kmaxj,kmino,kmaxl,kminl,kmaxo,mmprt,kminj,
5303  & ij,nprt,kmaxs,kmins,i,me,len,mode
5304  parameter(mmprt=2)
5305 !
5306  character*8 ttl
5307  logical iceflg(len)
5308  real (kind=kind_io8) fld(len),slimsk(len),sno(len),
5309  & rla(len), rlo(len)
5310  integer iwk(len)
5311  logical lgchek
5312 !
5313  logical first
5314  integer num_threads
5315  data first /.true./
5316  save num_threads, first
5317 !
5318  integer len_thread_m, i1_t, i2_t, it
5319  integer num_parthds
5320 !
5321  if (first) then
5322  num_threads = num_parthds()
5323  first = .false.
5324  endif
5325 !
5326 ! check against land-sea mask and ice cover mask
5327 !
5328  if(me .eq. 0) then
5329 ! print *,' '
5330  print *,'performing qc of ',ttl,' mode=',mode,
5331  & '(0=count only, 1=replace)'
5332  endif
5333 !
5334  len_thread_m = (len+num_threads-1) / num_threads
5335  kmaxl = 0
5336  kminl = 0
5337  kmaxo = 0
5338  kmino = 0
5339  kmaxi = 0
5340  kmini = 0
5341  kmaxj = 0
5342  kminj = 0
5343  kmaxs = 0
5344  kmins = 0
5345 !$omp parallel do private(i1_t,i2_t,it,i)
5346 !$omp+private(nprt,ij,iwk)
5347 !$omp+reduction(+:kmaxs,kmins,kmaxl,kminl,kmaxo)
5348 !$omp+reduction(+:kmino,kmaxi,kmini,kmaxj,kminj)
5349 !$omp+shared(mode,epsfld)
5350 !$omp+shared(fldlmx,fldlmn,fldomx,fldjmn,fldsmx,fldsmn)
5351 !$omp+shared(fld,slimsk,sno,rla,rlo)
5352  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop
5353  i1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
5354  i2_t = min(i1_t+len_thread_m-1,len)
5355 !
5356 !
5357 !
5358 ! lower bound check over bare land
5359 !
5360  if (fldlmn .ne. 999.0) then
5361  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5362  if(slimsk(i).eq.1..and.sno(i).le.0..and.
5363  & fld(i).lt.fldlmn-epsfld) then
5364  kminl=kminl+1
5365  iwk(kminl) = i
5366  endif
5367  enddo
5368  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5369  nprt = min(mmprt,kminl)
5370  do i=1,nprt
5371  ij = iwk(i)
5372  print 8001,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldlmn
5373  8001 format(' bare land min. check. lat=',f5.1,
5374  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e13.6, ' to ',e13.6)
5375  enddo
5376  endif
5377  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5378  do i=1,kminl
5379  fld(iwk(i)) = fldlmn
5380  enddo
5381  endif
5382  endif
5383 !
5384 ! upper bound check over bare land
5385 !
5386  if (fldlmx .ne. 999.0) then
5387  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5388  if(slimsk(i).eq.1..and.sno(i).le.0..and.
5389  & fld(i).gt.fldlmx+epsfld) then
5390  kmaxl=kmaxl+1
5391  iwk(kmaxl) = i
5392  endif
5393  enddo
5394  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5395  nprt = min(mmprt,kmaxl)
5396  do i=1,nprt
5397  ij = iwk(i)
5398  print 8002,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldlmx
5399  8002 format(' bare land max. check. lat=',f5.1,
5400  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e13.6, ' to ',e13.6)
5401  enddo
5402  endif
5403  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5404  do i=1,kmaxl
5405  fld(iwk(i)) = fldlmx
5406  enddo
5407  endif
5408  endif
5409 !
5410 ! lower bound check over snow covered land
5411 !
5412  if (fldsmn .ne. 999.0) then
5413  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5414  if(slimsk(i).eq.1..and.sno(i).gt.0..and.
5415  & fld(i).lt.fldsmn-epsfld) then
5416  kmins=kmins+1
5417  iwk(kmins) = i
5418  endif
5419  enddo
5420  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5421  nprt = min(mmprt,kmins)
5422  do i=1,nprt
5423  ij = iwk(i)
5424  print 8003,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldsmn
5425  8003 format(' sno covrd land min. check. lat=',f5.1,
5426  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5427  enddo
5428  endif
5429  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5430  do i=1,kmins
5431  fld(iwk(i)) = fldsmn
5432  enddo
5433  endif
5434  endif
5435 !
5436 ! upper bound check over snow covered land
5437 !
5438  if (fldsmx .ne. 999.0) then
5439  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5440  if(slimsk(i).eq.1..and.sno(i).gt.0..and.
5441  & fld(i).gt.fldsmx+epsfld) then
5442  kmaxs=kmaxs+1
5443  iwk(kmaxs) = i
5444  endif
5445  enddo
5446  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5447  nprt = min(mmprt,kmaxs)
5448  do i=1,nprt
5449  ij = iwk(i)
5450  print 8004,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldsmx
5451  8004 format(' snow land max. check. lat=',f5.1,
5452  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5453  enddo
5454  endif
5455  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5456  do i=1,kmaxs
5457  fld(iwk(i)) = fldsmx
5458  enddo
5459  endif
5460  endif
5461 !
5462 ! lower bound check over open ocean
5463 !
5464  if (fldomn .ne. 999.0) then
5465  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5466  if(slimsk(i).eq.0..and.
5467  & fld(i).lt.fldomn-epsfld) then
5468  kmino=kmino+1
5469  iwk(kmino) = i
5470  endif
5471  enddo
5472  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5473  nprt = min(mmprt,kmino)
5474  do i=1,nprt
5475  ij = iwk(i)
5476  print 8005,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldomn
5477  8005 format(' open ocean min. check. lat=',f5.1,
5478  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4,' to ',e11.4)
5479  enddo
5480  endif
5481  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5482  do i=1,kmino
5483  fld(iwk(i)) = fldomn
5484  enddo
5485  endif
5486  endif
5487 !
5488 ! upper bound check over open ocean
5489 !
5490  if (fldomx .ne. 999.0) then
5491  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5492  if(fldomx.ne.999..and.slimsk(i).eq.0..and.
5493  & fld(i).gt.fldomx+epsfld) then
5494  kmaxo=kmaxo+1
5495  iwk(kmaxo) = i
5496  endif
5497  enddo
5498  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5499  nprt = min(mmprt,kmaxo)
5500  do i=1,nprt
5501  ij = iwk(i)
5502  print 8006,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldomx
5503  8006 format(' open ocean max. check. lat=',f5.1,
5504  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5505  enddo
5506  endif
5507  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5508  do i=1,kmaxo
5509  fld(iwk(i)) = fldomx
5510  enddo
5511  endif
5512  endif
5513 !
5514 ! lower bound check over sea ice without snow
5515 !
5516  if (fldimn .ne. 999.0) then
5517  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5518  if(slimsk(i).eq.2..and.sno(i).le.0..and.
5519  & fld(i).lt.fldimn-epsfld) then
5520  kmini=kmini+1
5521  iwk(kmini) = i
5522  endif
5523  enddo
5524  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5525  nprt = min(mmprt,kmini)
5526  do i=1,nprt
5527  ij = iwk(i)
5528  print 8007,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldimn
5529  8007 format(' seaice no snow min. check lat=',f5.1,
5530  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5531  enddo
5532  endif
5533  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5534  do i=1,kmini
5535  fld(iwk(i)) = fldimn
5536  enddo
5537  endif
5538  endif
5539 !
5540 ! upper bound check over sea ice without snow
5541 !
5542  if (fldimx .ne. 999.0) then
5543  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5544  if(slimsk(i).eq.2..and.sno(i).le.0..and.
5545  & fld(i).gt.fldimx+epsfld .and. iceflg(i)) then
5546 ! & fld(i).gt.fldimx+epsfld) then
5547  kmaxi=kmaxi+1
5548  iwk(kmaxi) = i
5549  endif
5550  enddo
5551  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5552  nprt = min(mmprt,kmaxi)
5553  do i=1,nprt
5554  ij = iwk(i)
5555  print 8008,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldimx
5556  8008 format(' seaice no snow max. check lat=',f5.1,
5557  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5558  enddo
5559  endif
5560  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5561  do i=1,kmaxi
5562  fld(iwk(i)) = fldimx
5563  enddo
5564  endif
5565  endif
5566 !
5567 ! lower bound check over sea ice with snow
5568 !
5569  if (fldjmn .ne. 999.0) then
5570  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5571  if(slimsk(i).eq.2..and.sno(i).gt.0..and.
5572  & fld(i).lt.fldjmn-epsfld) then
5573  kminj=kminj+1
5574  iwk(kminj) = i
5575  endif
5576  enddo
5577  if(me == 0 . and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5578  nprt = min(mmprt,kminj)
5579  do i=1,nprt
5580  ij = iwk(i)
5581  print 8009,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldjmn
5582  8009 format(' sea ice snow min. check lat=',f5.1,
5583  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5584  enddo
5585  endif
5586  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5587  do i=1,kminj
5588  fld(iwk(i)) = fldjmn
5589  enddo
5590  endif
5591  endif
5592 !
5593 ! upper bound check over sea ice with snow
5594 !
5595  if (fldjmx .ne. 999.0) then
5596  do i=i1_t,i2_t
5597  if(slimsk(i).eq.2..and.sno(i).gt.0..and.
5598  & fld(i).gt.fldjmx+epsfld .and. iceflg(i)) then
5599 ! & fld(i).gt.fldjmx+epsfld) then
5600  kmaxj=kmaxj+1
5601  iwk(kmaxj) = i
5602  endif
5603  enddo
5604  if(me == 0 .and. it == 1 .and. num_threads == 1) then
5605  nprt = min(mmprt,kmaxj)
5606  do i=1,nprt
5607  ij = iwk(i)
5608  print 8010,rla(ij),rlo(ij),fld(ij),fldjmx
5609  8010 format(' seaice snow max check lat=',f5.1,
5610  & ' lon=',f6.1,' fld=',e11.4, ' to ',e11.4)
5611  enddo
5612  endif
5613  if (mode .eq. 1) then
5614  do i=1,kmaxj
5615  fld(iwk(i)) = fldjmx
5616  enddo
5617  endif
5618  endif
5619  enddo ! end of threaded loop
5620 !$omp end parallel do
5621 !
5622 ! print results
5623 !
5624  if(me .eq. 0) then
5625 ! write(6,*) 'summary of qc'
5626  permax=0.
5627  if(kminl.gt.0) then
5628  per=float(kminl)/float(len)*100.
5629  print 9001,fldlmn,kminl,per
5630  9001 format(' bare land min check. modified to ',f8.1,
5631  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f8.1,'percent')
5632  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5633  endif
5634  if(kmaxl.gt.0) then
5635  per=float(kmaxl)/float(len)*100.
5636  print 9002,fldlmx,kmaxl,per
5637  9002 format(' bare land max check. modified to ',f8.1,
5638  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5639  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5640  endif
5641  if(kmino.gt.0) then
5642  per=float(kmino)/float(len)*100.
5643  print 9003,fldomn,kmino,per
5644  9003 format(' open ocean min check. modified to ',f8.1,
5645  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5646  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5647  endif
5648  if(kmaxo.gt.0) then
5649  per=float(kmaxo)/float(len)*100.
5650  print 9004,fldomx,kmaxo,per
5651  9004 format(' open sea max check. modified to ',f8.1,
5652  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5653  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5654  endif
5655  if(kmins.gt.0) then
5656  per=float(kmins)/float(len)*100.
5657  print 9009,fldsmn,kmins,per
5658  9009 format(' snow covered land min check. modified to ',f8.1,
5659  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5660  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5661  endif
5662  if(kmaxs.gt.0) then
5663  per=float(kmaxs)/float(len)*100.
5664  print 9010,fldsmx,kmaxs,per
5665  9010 format(' snow covered land max check. modified to ',f8.1,
5666  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5667  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5668  endif
5669  if(kmini.gt.0) then
5670  per=float(kmini)/float(len)*100.
5671  print 9005,fldimn,kmini,per
5672  9005 format(' bare ice min check. modified to ',f8.1,
5673  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5674  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5675  endif
5676  if(kmaxi.gt.0) then
5677  per=float(kmaxi)/float(len)*100.
5678  print 9006,fldimx,kmaxi,per
5679  9006 format(' bare ice max check. modified to ',f8.1,
5680  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5681  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5682  endif
5683  if(kminj.gt.0) then
5684  per=float(kminj)/float(len)*100.
5685  print 9007,fldjmn,kminj,per
5686  9007 format(' snow covered ice min check. modified to ',f8.1,
5687  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5688  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5689  endif
5690  if(kmaxj.gt.0) then
5691  per=float(kmaxj)/float(len)*100.
5692  print 9008,fldjmx,kmaxj,per
5693  9008 format(' snow covered ice max check. modified to ',f8.1,
5694  & ' at ',i5,' points ',f4.1,'percent')
5695  if(per.gt.permax) permax=per
5696  endif
5697 ! commented on 06/30/99 -- moorthi
5698 ! if(lgchek) then
5699 ! if(permax.gt.percrit) then
5700 ! write(6,*) ' too many bad points. aborting ....'
5701 ! call abort
5702 ! endif
5703 ! endif
5704 !
5705  endif
5706 !
5707  return
5708  end
5709  subroutine setzro(fld,eps,len)
5710 !
5711  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5712  implicit none
5713  integer i,len
5714  real (kind=kind_io8) fld(len),eps
5715  do i=1,len
5716  if(abs(fld(i)).lt.eps) fld(i) = 0.
5717  enddo
5718  return
5719  end
5720  subroutine getscv(snofld,scvfld,len)
5721 !
5722  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5723  implicit none
5724  integer i,len
5725  real (kind=kind_io8) snofld(len),scvfld(len)
5726 !
5727  do i=1,len
5728  scvfld(i) = 0.
5729  if(snofld(i).gt.0.) scvfld(i) = 1.
5730  enddo
5731  return
5732  end
5733  subroutine getstc(tsffld,tg3fld,slifld,len,lsoil,stcfld,tsfimx)
5734 !
5735  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5736  implicit none
5737  integer k,i,len,lsoil
5738  real (kind=kind_io8) factor,tsfimx
5739  real (kind=kind_io8) tsffld(len), tg3fld(len), slifld(len)
5740  real (kind=kind_io8) stcfld(len,lsoil)
5741 !
5742 ! layer soil temperature
5743 !
5744  do k = 1, lsoil
5745  do i = 1, len
5746  if(slifld(i).eq.1.0) then
5747  factor = ((k-1) * 2 + 1) / (2. * lsoil)
5748  stcfld(i,k) = factor*tg3fld(i)+(1.-factor)*tsffld(i)
5749  elseif(slifld(i).eq.2.0) then
5750  factor = ((k-1) * 2 + 1) / (2. * lsoil)
5751  stcfld(i,k) = factor*tsfimx+(1.-factor)*tsffld(i)
5752  else
5753  stcfld(i,k) = tg3fld(i)
5754  endif
5755  enddo
5756  enddo
5757  if(lsoil.gt.2) then
5758  do k = 3, lsoil
5759  do i = 1, len
5760  stcfld(i,k) = stcfld(i,2)
5761  enddo
5762  enddo
5763  endif
5764  return
5765  end
5766  subroutine getsmc(wetfld,len,lsoil,smcfld,me)
5767 !
5768  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5769  implicit none
5770  integer k,i,len,lsoil,me
5771  real (kind=kind_io8) wetfld(len), smcfld(len,lsoil)
5772 !
5773  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'getsmc'
5774 !
5775 ! layer soil wetness
5776 !
5777  do k = 1, lsoil
5778  do i = 1, len
5779  smcfld(i,k) = (wetfld(i)*1000./150.)*.37 + .1
5780  enddo
5781  enddo
5782  return
5783  end
5784  subroutine usesgt(sig1t,slianl,tg3anl,len,lsoil,tsfanl,stcanl,
5785  & tsfimx)
5786 !
5787  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5788  implicit none
5789  integer i,len,lsoil
5790  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfimx
5791  real (kind=kind_io8) sig1t(len), slianl(len), tg3anl(len)
5792  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len), stcanl(len,lsoil)
5793 !
5794 ! soil temperature
5795 !
5796  if(sig1t(1).gt.0.) then
5797  do i=1,len
5798  if(slianl(i).ne.0.) then
5799  tsfanl(i) = sig1t(i)
5800  endif
5801  enddo
5802  endif
5803  call getstc(tsfanl,tg3anl,slianl,len,lsoil,stcanl,tsfimx)
5804 !
5805  return
5806  end
5807  subroutine snosfc(snoanl,tsfanl,tsfsmx,len,me)
5808  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5809  implicit none
5810  integer kount,i,len,me
5811  real (kind=kind_io8) per,tsfsmx
5812  real (kind=kind_io8) snoanl(len), tsfanl(len)
5813 !
5814  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'set snow temp to tsfsmx if greater'
5815  kount=0
5816  do i=1,len
5817  if(snoanl(i).gt.0.) then
5818  if(tsfanl(i).gt.tsfsmx) tsfanl(i)=tsfsmx
5819  kount = kount + 1
5820  endif
5821  enddo
5822  if(kount.gt.0) then
5823  if(me .eq. 0) then
5824  per=float(kount)/float(len)*100.
5825  write(6,*) 'snow sfc. tsf set to ',tsfsmx,' at ',
5826  & kount, ' points ',per,'percent'
5827  endif
5828  endif
5829  return
5830  end
5831  subroutine albocn(albclm,slmask,albomx,len)
5832  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5833  implicit none
5834  integer i,len
5835  real (kind=kind_io8) albomx
5836  real (kind=kind_io8) albclm(len,4), slmask(len)
5837  do i=1,len
5838  if(slmask(i).eq.0) then
5839  albclm(i,1) = albomx
5840  albclm(i,2) = albomx
5841  albclm(i,3) = albomx
5842  albclm(i,4) = albomx
5843  endif
5844  enddo
5845  return
5846  end
5847  subroutine qcmxice(glacir,amxice,len,me)
5848  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5849  implicit none
5850  integer i,kount,len,me
5851  real (kind=kind_io8) glacir(len),amxice(len),per
5852  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'qc of maximum ice extent'
5853  kount=0
5854  do i=1,len
5855  if(glacir(i).eq.1..and.amxice(i).eq.0.) then
5856  amxice(i) = 0.
5857  kount = kount + 1
5858  endif
5859  enddo
5860  if(kount.gt.0) then
5861  per = float(kount) / float(len)*100.
5862  if(me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' max ice limit less than glacier'
5863  &, ' coverage at ', kount, ' points ',per,'percent'
5864  endif
5865  return
5866  end
5867  subroutine qcsli(slianl,slifcs,len,me)
5868  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5869  implicit none
5870  integer i,kount,len,me
5871  real (kind=kind_io8) slianl(len), slifcs(len),per
5872  if (me .eq. 0) then
5873  write(6,*) ' '
5874  write(6,*) 'qcsli'
5875  endif
5876  kount=0
5877  do i=1,len
5878  if(slianl(i).eq.1..and.slifcs(i).eq.0.) then
5879  kount = kount + 1
5880  slifcs(i) = 1.
5881  endif
5882  if(slianl(i).eq.0..and.slifcs(i).eq.1.) then
5883  kount = kount + 1
5884  slifcs(i) = 0.
5885  endif
5886  if(slianl(i).eq.2..and.slifcs(i).eq.1.) then
5887  kount = kount + 1
5888  slifcs(i) = 0.
5889  endif
5890  if(slianl(i).eq.1..and.slifcs(i).eq.2.) then
5891  kount = kount + 1
5892  slifcs(i) = 1.
5893  endif
5894  enddo
5895  if(kount.gt.0) then
5896  per=float(kount)/float(len)*100.
5897  if(me .eq. 0) then
5898  write(6,*) ' inconsistency of slmask between forecast and',
5899  & ' analysis corrected at ',kount, ' points ',per,
5900  & 'percent'
5901  endif
5902  endif
5903  return
5904  end
5905 ! subroutine nntprt(data,imax,fact)
5906 ! real (kind=kind_io8) data(imax)
5907 ! ilast=0
5908 ! i1=1
5909 ! i2=80
5910 !1112 continue
5911 ! if(i2.ge.imax) then
5912 ! ilast=1
5913 ! i2=imax
5914 ! endif
5915 ! write(6,*) ' '
5916 ! do j=1,jmax
5917 ! write(6,1111) (nint(data(imax*(j-1)+i)*fact),i=i1,i2)
5918 ! enddo
5919 ! if(ilast.eq.1) return
5920 ! i1=i1+80
5921 ! i2=i1+79
5922 ! if(i2.ge.imax) then
5923 ! ilast=1
5924 ! i2=imax
5925 ! endif
5926 ! go to 1112
5927 !1111 format(80i1)
5928 ! return
5929 ! end
5930  subroutine qcbyfc(tsffcs,snofcs,qctsfs,qcsnos,qctsfi,
5931  & len,lsoil,snoanl,aisanl,slianl,tsfanl,albanl,
5932  & zoranl,smcanl,
5933  & smcclm,tsfsmx,albomx,zoromx, me)
5934 !
5935  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
5936  implicit none
5937  integer kount,me,k,i,lsoil,len
5938  real (kind=kind_io8) zoromx,per,albomx,qctsfi,qcsnos,qctsfs,tsfsmx
5939  real (kind=kind_io8) tsffcs(len), snofcs(len)
5940  real (kind=kind_io8) snoanl(len), aisanl(len),
5941  & slianl(len), zoranl(len),
5942  & tsfanl(len), albanl(len,4),
5943  & smcanl(len,lsoil)
5944  real (kind=kind_io8) smcclm(len,lsoil)
5945 !
5946  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'qc of snow and sea-ice analysis'
5947 !
5948 ! qc of snow analysis
5949 !
5950 ! questionable snow cover
5951 !
5952  kount = 0
5953  do i=1,len
5954  if(slianl(i).gt.0..and.
5955  & tsffcs(i).gt.qctsfs.and.snoanl(i).gt.0.) then
5956  kount = kount + 1
5957  snoanl(i) = 0.
5958  tsfanl(i) = tsffcs(i)
5959  endif
5960  enddo
5961  if(kount.gt.0) then
5962  per=float(kount)/float(len)*100.
5963  if (me .eq. 0) then
5964  write(6,*) .gt.' guess surface temp ',qctsfs,
5965  & ' but snow analysis indicates snow cover'
5966  write(6,*) ' snow analysis set to zero',
5967  & ' at ',kount, ' points ',per,'percent'
5968  endif
5969  endif
5970 !
5971 ! questionable no snow cover
5972 !
5973  kount = 0
5974  do i=1,len
5975  if(slianl(i).gt.0..and.
5976  & snofcs(i).gt.qcsnos.and.snoanl(i).lt.0.) then
5977  kount = kount + 1
5978  snoanl(i) = snofcs(i)
5979  tsfanl(i) = tsffcs(i)
5980  endif
5981  enddo
5982  if(kount.gt.0) then
5983  per=float(kount)/float(len)*100.
5984  if (me .eq. 0) then
5985  write(6,*) .gt.' guess snow depth ',qcsnos,
5986  & ' but snow analysis indicates no snow cover'
5987  write(6,*) ' snow analysis set to guess value',
5988  & ' at ',kount, ' points ',per,'percent'
5989  endif
5990  endif
5991 !
5992 ! questionable sea ice cover ! this qc is disable to correct error in
5993 ! surface temparature over observed sea ice points
5994 !
5995 ! kount = 0
5996 ! do i=1,len
5997 ! if(slianl(i).eq.2..and.
5998 ! & tsffcs(i).gt.qctsfi.and.aisanl(i).eq.1.) then
5999 ! kount = kount + 1
6000 ! aisanl(i) = 0.
6001 ! slianl(i) = 0.
6002 ! tsfanl(i) = tsffcs(i)
6003 ! snoanl(i) = 0.
6004 ! zoranl(i) = zoromx
6005 ! albanl(i,1) = albomx
6006 ! albanl(i,2) = albomx
6007 ! albanl(i,3) = albomx
6008 ! albanl(i,4) = albomx
6009 ! do k=1,lsoil
6010 ! smcanl(i,k) = smcclm(i,k)
6011 ! enddo
6012 ! endif
6013 ! enddo
6014 ! if(kount.gt.0) then
6015 ! per=float(kount)/float(len)*100.
6016 ! if (me .eq. 0) then
6017 ! write(6,*) ' guess surface temp .gt. ',qctsfi,
6018 ! & ' but sea-ice analysis indicates sea-ice'
6019 ! write(6,*) ' sea-ice analysis set to zero',
6020 ! & ' at ',kount, ' points ',per,'percent'
6021 ! endif
6022 ! endif
6023 !
6024  return
6025  end
6026  subroutine setrmsk(kpds5,slmask,igaul,jgaul,wlon,rnlat,
6027  & data,imax,jmax,rlnout,rltout,lmask,rslmsk
6028  &, gaus,blno, blto, kgds1, kpds4, lbms)
6029  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6030  use sfccyc_module
6031  implicit none
6032  real (kind=kind_io8) blno,blto,wlon,rnlat,crit,data_max
6033  integer i,j,ijmax,jgaul,igaul,kpds5,jmax,imax, kgds1, kspla
6034  integer, intent(in) :: kpds4
6035  logical*1, intent(in) :: lbms(imax,jmax)
6036  real*4 :: dummy(imax,jmax)
6037 
6038  real (kind=kind_io8) slmask(igaul,jgaul)
6039  real (kind=kind_io8) data(imax,jmax),rslmsk(imax,jmax)
6040  &, rlnout(imax), rltout(jmax)
6041  real (kind=kind_io8) a(jmax), w(jmax), radi, dlat, dlon
6042  logical lmask, gaus
6043 !
6044 ! set the longitude and latitudes for the grib file
6045 !
6046  if (kgds1 .eq. 4) then ! grib file on gaussian grid
6047  kspla=4
6048  call splat(kspla, jmax, a, w)
6049 !
6050  radi = 180.0 / (4.*atan(1.))
6051  do j=1,jmax
6052  rltout(j) = acos(a(j)) * radi
6053  enddo
6054 !
6055  if (rnlat .gt. 0.0) then
6056  do j=1,jmax
6057  rltout(j) = 90. - rltout(j)
6058  enddo
6059  else
6060  do j=1,jmax
6061  rltout(j) = -90. + rltout(j)
6062  enddo
6063  endif
6064  elseif (kgds1 .eq. 0) then ! grib file on lat/lon grid
6065  dlat = -(rnlat+rnlat) / float(jmax-1)
6066  do j=1,jmax
6067  rltout(j) = rnlat + (j-1) * dlat
6068  enddo
6069  else ! grib file on some other grid
6070  call abort
6071  endif
6072  dlon = 360.0 / imax
6073  do i=1,imax
6074  rlnout(i) = wlon + (i-1)*dlon
6075  enddo
6076 !
6077 !
6078  ijmax = imax*jmax
6079  rslmsk = 0.
6080 ! TG3 MODS BEGIN
6081  if(kpds5 == kpdtsf .and. imax == 138 .and. jmax == 116
6082  & .and. kpds4 == 128) then
6083 ! print*,'turn off setrmsk for tg3'
6084  lmask = .false.
6085 
6086  elseif(kpds5 == kpdtsf) then
6087 ! TG3 MODS END
6088 !
6089 ! surface temperature
6090 !
6091  lmask = .false.
6092  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6093  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6094 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6095  crit = 0.5
6096  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6097  lmask = .true.
6098 !
6099 ! bucket soil wetness
6100 !
6101  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdwet) then
6102  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6103  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6104 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6105  crit = 0.5
6106  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6107  lmask = .true.
6108 ! write(6,*) 'wet rslmsk'
6109 ! znnt=1.
6110 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6111 !
6112 ! snow depth
6113 !
6114  elseif(kpds5 == kpdsnd) then
6115  if(kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6116  rslmsk = 0.
6117  do j = 1, jmax
6118  do i = 1, imax
6119  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6120  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6121  end if
6122  enddo
6123  enddo
6124  lmask=.true.
6125  else
6126  lmask=.false.
6127  end if
6128 !
6129 ! snow liq equivalent depth
6130 !
6131  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdsno) then
6132  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6133  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6134 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6135  crit=0.5
6136  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6137  lmask=.true.
6138 ! write(6,*) 'sno rslmsk'
6139 ! znnt=1.
6140 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6141 !
6142 ! soil moisture
6143 !
6144  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdsmc) then
6145  if(kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6146  rslmsk = 0.
6147  do j = 1, jmax
6148  do i = 1, imax
6149  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6150  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6151  end if
6152  enddo
6153  enddo
6154  lmask=.true.
6155  else
6156  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6157  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6158  crit=0.5
6159  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6160  lmask=.true.
6161  endif
6162 !
6163 ! surface roughness
6164 !
6165  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdzor) then
6166  do j=1,jmax
6167  do i=1,imax
6168  rslmsk(i,j)=data(i,j)
6169  enddo
6170  enddo
6171  crit=9.9
6172  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'lt',crit)
6173  lmask=.true.
6174 ! write(6,*) 'zor rslmsk'
6175 ! znnt=1.
6176 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6177 !
6178 ! albedo
6179 !
6180 ! elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalb) then
6181 ! do j=1,jmax
6182 ! do i=1,imax
6183 ! rslmsk(i,j)=data(i,j)
6184 ! enddo
6185 ! enddo
6186 ! crit=99.
6187 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'lt',crit)
6188 ! lmask=.true.
6189 ! write(6,*) 'alb rslmsk'
6190 ! znnt=1.
6191 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6192 !
6193 ! albedo
6194 !
6195 !cbosu new snowfree albedo database has bitmap, use it.
6196  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalb(1)) then
6197  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6198  rslmsk = 0.
6199  do j = 1, jmax
6200  do i = 1, imax
6201  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6202  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6203  end if
6204  enddo
6205  enddo
6206  lmask = .true.
6207  else ! no bitmap. old database has no water flag.
6208  lmask=.false.
6209  end if
6210  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalb(2)) then
6211 !cbosu
6212  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6213  rslmsk = 0.
6214  do j = 1, jmax
6215  do i = 1, imax
6216  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6217  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6218  end if
6219  enddo
6220  enddo
6221  lmask = .true.
6222  else ! no bitmap. old database has no water flag.
6223  lmask=.false.
6224  end if
6225  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalb(3)) then
6226 !cbosu
6227  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6228  rslmsk = 0.
6229  do j = 1, jmax
6230  do i = 1, imax
6231  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6232  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6233  end if
6234  enddo
6235  enddo
6236  lmask = .true.
6237  else ! no bitmap. old database has no water flag.
6238  lmask=.false.
6239  end if
6240  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalb(4)) then
6241 !cbosu
6242  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6243  rslmsk = 0.
6244  do j = 1, jmax
6245  do i = 1, imax
6246  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6247  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6248  end if
6249  enddo
6250  enddo
6251  lmask = .true.
6252  else ! no bitmap. old database has no water flag.
6253  lmask=.false.
6254  end if
6255 !
6256 ! vegetation fraction for albedo
6257 !
6258  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalf(1)) then
6259 ! rslmsk=data
6260 ! crit=0.
6261 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6262 ! lmask=.true.
6263  lmask=.false.
6264  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdalf(2)) then
6265 ! rslmsk=data
6266 ! crit=0.
6267 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6268 ! lmask=.true.
6269  lmask=.false.
6270 !
6271 ! sea ice
6272 !
6273  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdais) then
6274  lmask=.false.
6275 ! call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6276 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6277 ! crit=0.5
6278 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6279 !
6280  data_max = 0.0
6281  do j=1,jmax
6282  do i=1,imax
6283  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6284  data_max= max(data_max,data(i,j))
6285  enddo
6286  enddo
6287  crit=1.0
6288  if (data_max .gt. crit) then
6289  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6290  lmask=.true.
6291  else
6292  lmask=.false.
6293  endif
6294 ! write(6,*) 'acn rslmsk'
6295 ! znnt=1.
6296 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6297 !
6298 ! deep soil temperature
6299 !
6300  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdtg3) then
6301  lmask=.false.
6302 ! call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6303 ! &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6304 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6305 ! crit=0.5
6306 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6307 ! lmask=.true.
6308 !
6309 ! plant resistance
6310 !
6311 ! elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdplr) then
6312 ! call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6313 ! &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6314 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6315 ! crit=0.5
6316 ! call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6317 ! lmask=.true.
6318 !
6319 ! write(6,*) 'plr rslmsk'
6320 ! znnt=1.
6321 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6322 !
6323 ! glacier points
6324 !
6325  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdgla) then
6326  lmask=.false.
6327 !
6328 ! max ice extent
6329 !
6330  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdmxi) then
6331  lmask=.false.
6332 !
6333 ! snow cover
6334 !
6335  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdscv) then
6336  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6337  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6338 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6339  crit=0.5
6340  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6341  lmask=.true.
6342 ! write(6,*) 'scv rslmsk'
6343 ! znnt=1.
6344 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6345 !
6346 ! sea ice concentration
6347 !
6348  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdacn) then
6349  lmask=.false.
6350  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6351  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6352 ! &, dlon, dlat, gaus, blno, blto)
6353  crit=0.5
6354  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6355  lmask=.true.
6356 ! write(6,*) 'acn rslmsk'
6357 ! znnt=1.
6358 ! call nntprt(rslmsk,ijmax,znnt)
6359 !
6360 ! vegetation cover
6361 !
6362  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdveg) then
6363 !cggg
6364  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6365  rslmsk = 0.
6366  do j = 1, jmax
6367  do i = 1, imax
6368  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6369  rslmsk(i,jmax-j+1) = 1. ! need to flip grid in n/s direction
6370  end if
6371  enddo
6372  enddo
6373  lmask = .true.
6374  else ! no bitmap, set mask the old way.
6375 
6376  call ga2la(slmask,igaul,jgaul,rslmsk,imax,jmax,wlon,rnlat
6377  &, rlnout, rltout, gaus, blno, blto)
6378  crit=0.5
6379  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'ge',crit)
6380  lmask=.true.
6381 
6382  end if
6383 !
6384 ! soil type
6385 !
6386  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdsot) then
6387 
6388  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6389  rslmsk = 0.
6390  do j = 1, jmax
6391  do i = 1, imax
6392  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6393  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6394  end if
6395  enddo
6396  enddo
6397 ! soil type is zero over water, use this to get a bitmap.
6398  else
6399  do j = 1, jmax
6400  do i = 1, imax
6401  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6402  enddo
6403  enddo
6404  crit=0.1
6405  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6406  endif
6407  lmask=.true.
6408 !
6409 ! vegetation type
6410 !
6411  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdvet) then
6412 
6413  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6414  rslmsk = 0.
6415  do j = 1, jmax
6416  do i = 1, imax
6417  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6418  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6419  end if
6420  enddo
6421  enddo
6422 ! veg type is zero over water, use this to get a bitmap.
6423  else
6424  do j = 1, jmax
6425  do i = 1, imax
6426  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6427  enddo
6428  enddo
6429  crit=0.1
6430  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6431  endif
6432  lmask=.true.
6433 !
6434 ! these are for four new data type added by clu -- not sure its correct!
6435 !
6436  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdvmn) then
6437 !
6438 !cggg greenness is zero over water, use this to get a bitmap.
6439 !
6440  do j = 1, jmax
6441  do i = 1, imax
6442  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6443  enddo
6444  enddo
6445 !
6446  crit=0.1
6447  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6448  lmask=.true.
6449 !cggg lmask=.false.
6450 !
6451  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdvmx) then
6452 !
6453 !cggg greenness is zero over water, use this to get a bitmap.
6454 !
6455  do j = 1, jmax
6456  do i = 1, imax
6457  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6458  enddo
6459  enddo
6460 !
6461  crit=0.1
6462  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6463  lmask=.true.
6464 !cggg lmask=.false.
6465 !
6466  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdslp) then
6467 !
6468 !cggg slope type is zero over water, use this to get a bitmap.
6469 !
6470  do j = 1, jmax
6471  do i = 1, imax
6472  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6473  enddo
6474  enddo
6475 !
6476  crit=0.1
6477  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6478  lmask=.true.
6479 !cggg lmask=.false.
6480 !
6481 !cbosu new maximum snow albedo database has bitmap
6482  elseif(kpds5.eq.kpdabs) then
6483  if (kpds4 == 192) then ! use the bitmap
6484  rslmsk = 0.
6485  do j = 1, jmax
6486  do i = 1, imax
6487  if (lbms(i,j)) then
6488  rslmsk(i,j) = 1.
6489  end if
6490  enddo
6491  enddo
6492  lmask = .true.
6493  else ! no bitmap. old database has zero over water
6494  do j = 1, jmax
6495  do i = 1, imax
6496  rslmsk(i,j) = data(i,j)
6497  enddo
6498  enddo
6499  crit=0.1
6500  call rof01(rslmsk,ijmax,'gt',crit)
6501  lmask=.true.
6502  end if
6503  endif
6504 !
6505  return
6506  end
6507  subroutine ga2la(gauin,imxin,jmxin,regout,imxout,jmxout,
6508  & wlon,rnlat,rlnout,rltout,gaus,blno, blto)
6509  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6510  implicit none
6511  integer i1,i2,j2,ishft,i,jj,j1,jtem,jmxout,imxin,jmxin,imxout,
6512  & j,iret
6513  real (kind=kind_io8) alamd,dxin,aphi,x,sum1,sum2,y,dlati,wlon,
6514  & rnlat,dxout,dphi,dlat,facns,tem,blno,
6515  & blto
6516 !
6517 ! interpolation from lat/lon grid to other lat/lon grid
6518 !
6519  real (kind=kind_io8) gauin (imxin,jmxin), regout(imxout,jmxout)
6520  &, rlnout(imxout), rltout(jmxout)
6521  logical gaus
6522 !
6523  real, allocatable :: gaul(:)
6524  real (kind=kind_io8) ddx(imxout),ddy(jmxout)
6525  integer iindx1(imxout), iindx2(imxout),
6526  & jindx1(jmxout), jindx2(jmxout)
6527  integer jmxsav,n,kspla
6528  data jmxsav/0/
6529  save jmxsav, gaul, dlati
6530  real (kind=kind_io8) radi
6531  real (kind=kind_io8) a(jmxin), w(jmxin)
6532 !
6533 !
6534  logical first
6535  integer num_threads
6536  data first /.true./
6537  save num_threads, first
6538 !
6539  integer len_thread_m, j1_t, j2_t, it
6540  integer num_parthds
6541 !
6542  if (first) then
6543  num_threads = num_parthds()
6544  first = .false.
6545  endif
6546 !
6547  if (jmxin .ne. jmxsav) then
6548  if (jmxsav .gt. 0) deallocate (gaul, stat=iret)
6549  allocate (gaul(jmxin))
6550  jmxsav = jmxin
6551  if (gaus) then
6552 cjfe call gaulat(gaul,jmxin)
6553 cjfe
6554 !
6555  kspla=4
6556  call splat(kspla, jmxin, a, w)
6557 !
6558  radi = 180.0 / (4.*atan(1.))
6559  do n=1,jmxin
6560  gaul(n) = acos(a(n)) * radi
6561  enddo
6562 cjfe
6563  do j=1,jmxin
6564  gaul(j) = 90. - gaul(j)
6565  enddo
6566  else
6567  dlat = -2*blto / float(jmxin-1)
6568  dlati = 1 / dlat
6569  do j=1,jmxin
6570  gaul(j) = blto + (j-1) * dlat
6571  enddo
6572  endif
6573  endif
6574 !
6575 !
6576  dxin = 360. / float(imxin )
6577 !
6578  do i=1,imxout
6579  alamd = rlnout(i)
6580  i1 = floor((alamd-blno)/dxin) + 1
6581  ddx(i) = (alamd-blno)/dxin-(i1-1)
6582  iindx1(i) = modulo(i1-1,imxin) + 1
6583  iindx2(i) = modulo(i1 ,imxin) + 1
6584  enddo
6585 !
6586 !
6587  len_thread_m = (jmxout+num_threads-1) / num_threads
6588 !
6589  if (gaus) then
6590 !
6591 !$omp parallel do private(j1_t,j2_t,it,j1,j2,jj)
6592 !$omp+private(aphi)
6593 !$omp+shared(num_threads,len_thread_m)
6594 !$omp+shared(jmxin,jmxout,gaul,rltout,jindx1,ddy)
6595 !
6596  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
6597  j1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
6598  j2_t = min(j1_t+len_thread_m-1,jmxout)
6599 !
6600  j2=1
6601  do 40 j=j1_t,j2_t
6602  aphi=rltout(j)
6603  do 50 jj=1,jmxin
6604  if(aphi.lt.gaul(jj)) go to 50
6605  j2=jj
6606  go to 42
6607  50 continue
6608  42 continue
6609  if(j2.gt.2) go to 43
6610  j1=1
6611  j2=2
6612  go to 44
6613  43 continue
6614  if(j2.le.jmxin) go to 45
6615  j1=jmxin-1
6616  j2=jmxin
6617  go to 44
6618  45 continue
6619  j1=j2-1
6620  44 continue
6621  jindx1(j)=j1
6622  jindx2(j)=j2
6623  ddy(j)=(aphi-gaul(j1))/(gaul(j2)-gaul(j1))
6624  40 continue
6625  enddo ! end of threaded loop ...................
6626 !$omp end parallel do
6627 !
6628  else
6629 !$omp parallel do private(j1_t,j2_t,it,j1,j2,jtem)
6630 !$omp+private(aphi)
6631 !$omp+shared(num_threads,len_thread_m)
6632 !$omp+shared(jmxin,jmxout,gaul,rltout,jindx1,ddy,dlati,blto)
6633 !
6634  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
6635  j1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
6636  j2_t = min(j1_t+len_thread_m-1,jmxout)
6637 !
6638  j2=1
6639  do 400 j=j1_t,j2_t
6640  aphi=rltout(j)
6641  jtem = (aphi - blto) * dlati + 1
6642  if (jtem .ge. 1 .and. jtem .lt. jmxin) then
6643  j1 = jtem
6644  j2 = j1 + 1
6645  ddy(j)=(aphi-gaul(j1))/(gaul(j2)-gaul(j1))
6646  elseif (jtem .eq. jmxin) then
6647  j1 = jmxin
6648  j2 = jmxin
6649  ddy(j)=1.0
6650  else
6651  j1 = 1
6652  j2 = 1
6653  ddy(j)=1.0
6654  endif
6655 !
6656  jindx1(j) = j1
6657  jindx2(j) = j2
6658  400 continue
6659  enddo ! end of threaded loop ...................
6660 !$omp end parallel do
6661  endif
6662 !
6663 ! write(6,*) 'ga2la'
6664 ! write(6,*) 'iindx1'
6665 ! write(6,*) (iindx1(n),n=1,imxout)
6666 ! write(6,*) 'iindx2'
6667 ! write(6,*) (iindx2(n),n=1,imxout)
6668 ! write(6,*) 'jindx1'
6669 ! write(6,*) (jindx1(n),n=1,jmxout)
6670 ! write(6,*) 'jindx2'
6671 ! write(6,*) (jindx2(n),n=1,jmxout)
6672 ! write(6,*) 'ddy'
6673 ! write(6,*) (ddy(n),n=1,jmxout)
6674 ! write(6,*) 'ddx'
6675 ! write(6,*) (ddx(n),n=1,jmxout)
6676 !
6677 !
6678 !$omp parallel do private(j1_t,j2_t,it,i,i1,i2)
6679 !$omp+private(j,j1,j2,x,y)
6680 !$omp+shared(num_threads,len_thread_m)
6681 !$omp+shared(imxout,iindx1,jindx1,ddx,ddy,gauin,regout)
6682 !
6683  do it=1,num_threads ! start of threaded loop ...................
6684  j1_t = (it-1)*len_thread_m+1
6685  j2_t = min(j1_t+len_thread_m-1,jmxout)
6686 !
6687  do j=j1_t,j2_t
6688  y = ddy(j)
6689  j1 = jindx1(j)
6690  j2 = jindx2(j)
6691  do i=1,imxout
6692  x = ddx(i)
6693  i1 = iindx1(i)
6694  i2 = iindx2(i)
6695  regout(i,j) = (1.-x)*((1.-y)*gauin(i1,j1) + y*gauin(i1,j2))
6696  & + x *((1.-y)*gauin(i2,j1) + y*gauin(i2,j2))
6697  enddo
6698  enddo
6699  enddo ! end of threaded loop ...................
6700 !$omp end parallel do
6701 !
6702  sum1 = 0.
6703  sum2 = 0.
6704  do i=1,imxin
6705  sum1 = sum1 + gauin(i,1)
6706  sum2 = sum2 + gauin(i,jmxin)
6707  enddo
6708  sum1 = sum1 / float(imxin)
6709  sum2 = sum2 / float(imxin)
6710 !
6711  if (gaus) then
6712  if (rnlat .gt. 0.0) then
6713  do i=1,imxout
6714  regout(i, 1) = sum1
6715  regout(i,jmxout) = sum2
6716  enddo
6717  else
6718  do i=1,imxout
6719  regout(i, 1) = sum2
6720  regout(i,jmxout) = sum1
6721  enddo
6722  endif
6723  else
6724  if (blto .lt. 0.0) then
6725  if (rnlat .gt. 0.0) then
6726  do i=1,imxout
6727  regout(i, 1) = sum2
6728  regout(i,jmxout) = sum1
6729  enddo
6730  else
6731  do i=1,imxout
6732  regout(i, 1) = sum1
6733  regout(i,jmxout) = sum2
6734  enddo
6735  endif
6736  else
6737  if (rnlat .lt. 0.0) then
6738  do i=1,imxout
6739  regout(i, 1) = sum2
6740  regout(i,jmxout) = sum1
6741  enddo
6742  else
6743  do i=1,imxout
6744  regout(i, 1) = sum1
6745  regout(i,jmxout) = sum2
6746  enddo
6747  endif
6748  endif
6749  endif
6750 !
6751  return
6752  end
6753  subroutine landtyp(vegtype,soiltype,slptype,slmask,len)
6754  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6755  implicit none
6756  integer i,len
6757  real (kind=kind_io8) vegtype(len),soiltype(len),slmask(len)
6758  +, slptype(len)
6759 !
6760 ! make sure that the soil type and veg type are non-zero over land
6761 !
6762  do i = 1, len
6763  if (slmask(i) .eq. 1) then
6764  if (vegtype(i) .eq. 0.) vegtype(i) = 7
6765  if (soiltype(i) .eq. 0.) soiltype(i) = 2
6766  if (slptype(i) .eq. 0.) slptype(i) = 1
6767  endif
6768  enddo
6769  return
6770  end subroutine landtyp
6771  subroutine gaulat(gaul,k)
6772 !
6773  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6774  implicit none
6775  integer n,k
6776  real (kind=kind_io8) radi
6777  real (kind=kind_io8) a(k), w(k), gaul(k)
6778 !
6779  call splat(4, k, a, w)
6780 !
6781  radi = 180.0 / (4.*atan(1.))
6782  do n=1,k
6783  gaul(n) = acos(a(n)) * radi
6784  enddo
6785 !
6786 ! print *,'gaussian lat (deg) for jmax=',k
6787 ! print *,(gaul(n),n=1,k)
6788 !
6789  return
6790  70 write(6,6000)
6791  6000 format(//5x,'error in gauaw'//)
6792  stop
6793  end
6794 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6795  subroutine anomint(tsfan0,tsfclm,tsfcl0,tsfanl,len)
6796 !
6797  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6798  implicit none
6799  integer i,len
6800  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfanl(len), tsfan0(len),
6801  & tsfclm(len), tsfcl0(len)
6802 !
6803 ! time interpolation of anomalies
6804 ! add initial anomaly to date interpolated climatology
6805 !
6806  write(6,*) 'anomint'
6807  do i=1,len
6808  tsfanl(i) = tsfan0(i) - tsfcl0(i) + tsfclm(i)
6809  enddo
6810  return
6811  end
6812  subroutine clima(lugb,iy,im,id,ih,fh,len,lsoil,
6813  & slmask,fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
6814  & fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,fnvegc,
6815  & fnvetc,fnsotc,
6816  & fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnslpc,fnabsc,
6817  & tsfclm,tsfcl2,wetclm,snoclm,zorclm,albclm,aisclm,
6818  & tg3clm,cvclm ,cvbclm,cvtclm,
6819  & cnpclm,smcclm,stcclm,sliclm,scvclm,acnclm,vegclm,
6820  & vetclm,sotclm,alfclm,
6821  & vmnclm,vmxclm,slpclm,absclm,
6822  & kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdsno,kpdzor,kpdalb,kpdais,
6823  & kpdtg3,kpdscv,kpdacn,kpdsmc,kpdstc,kpdveg,
6824  & kpdvet,kpdsot,kpdalf,tsfcl0,
6825  & kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,
6826  & deltsfc, lanom
6827  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, outlat, outlon
6828  &, gaus, blno, blto, me,lprnt,iprnt, fnalbc2, ialb
6829  &, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index)
6830 !
6831  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
6832  implicit none
6833  character(len=*), intent(in) :: tile_num_ch
6834  integer, intent(in) :: i_index(len), j_index(len)
6835  real (kind=kind_io8) rjday,wei1x,wei2x,rjdayh,wei2m,wei1m,wei1s,
6836  & wei2s,fh,stcmon1s,blto,blno,deltsfc,rjdayh2
6837  real (kind=kind_io8) wei1y,wei2y
6838  integer jdoy,jday,jh,jdow,mmm,mmp,mm,iret,monend,i,k,jm,jd,iy4,
6839  & jy,mon1,is2,isx,kpd9,is1,l,nn,mon2,mon,is,kpdsno,
6840  & kpdzor,kpdtsf,kpdwet,kpdscv,kpdacn,kpdais,kpdtg3,im,id,
6841  & lugb,iy,len,lsoil,ih,kpdsmc,iprnt,me,m1,m2,k1,k2,
6842  & kpdvet,kpdsot,kpdstc,kpdveg,jmsk,imsk,j,ialb
6843  &, kpdvmn,kpdvmx,kpdslp,kpdabs,landice_cat
6844  integer kpdalb(4), kpdalf(2)
6845 !
6846  character*500 fntsfc,fnwetc,fnsnoc,fnzorc,fnalbc,fnaisc,
6847  & fntg3c,fnscvc,fnsmcc,fnstcc,fnacnc,fnvegc,
6848  & fnvetc,fnsotc,fnalbc2
6849  &, fnvmnc,fnvmxc,fnslpc,fnabsc
6850  real (kind=kind_io8) tsfclm(len),tsfcl2(len),
6851  & wetclm(len),snoclm(len),
6852  & zorclm(len),albclm(len,4),aisclm(len),
6853  & tg3clm(len),acnclm(len),
6854  & cvclm(len),cvbclm(len),cvtclm(len),
6855  & cnpclm(len),
6856  & smcclm(len,lsoil),stcclm(len,lsoil),
6857  & sliclm(len),scvclm(len),vegclm(len),
6858  & vetclm(len),sotclm(len),alfclm(len,2)
6859  &, vmnclm(len),vmxclm(len),slpclm(len),absclm(len)
6860  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(imsk,jmsk)
6861  real (kind=kind_io8) outlat(len), outlon(len)
6862 !
6863  real (kind=kind_io8) slmask(len), tsfcl0(len)
6864  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: slmask_noice(:)
6865 !
6866  logical lanom, gaus, first
6867 !
6868 ! set z0 based on sib vegetation type
6869  real (kind=kind_io8) z0_sib(13)
6870  data z0_sib /2.653, 0.826, 0.563, 1.089, 0.854, 0.856,
6871  & 0.035, 0.238, 0.065, 0.076, 0.011, 0.125,
6872  & 0.011 /
6873 ! set z0 based on igbp vegetation type
6874  real (kind=kind_io8) z0_igbp_min(20), z0_igbp_max(20)
6875  real (kind=kind_io8) z0_season(12)
6876  data z0_igbp_min /1.089, 2.653, 0.854, 0.826, 0.800, 0.050,
6877  & 0.030, 0.856, 0.856, 0.150, 0.040, 0.130,
6878  & 1.000, 0.250, 0.011, 0.011, 0.001, 0.076,
6879  & 0.050, 0.030/
6880  data z0_igbp_max /1.089, 2.653, 0.854, 0.826, 0.800, 0.050,
6881  & 0.030, 0.856, 0.856, 0.150, 0.040, 0.130,
6882  & 1.000, 0.250, 0.011, 0.011, 0.001, 0.076,
6883  & 0.050, 0.030/
6884 !
6885 ! dayhf : julian day of the middle of each month
6886 !
6887  real (kind=kind_io8) dayhf(13)
6888  data dayhf/ 15.5, 45.0, 74.5,105.0,135.5,166.0,
6889  & 196.5,227.5,258.0,288.5,319.0,349.5,380.5/
6890 !
6891  real (kind=kind_io8) fha(5)
6892  real(4) fha4(5)
6893  integer w3kindreal,w3kindint
6894  integer ida(8),jda(8),ivtyp, kpd7
6895 !
6896  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: tsf(:,:),sno(:,:),
6897  & zor(:,:),wet(:,:),
6898  & ais(:,:), acn(:,:), scv(:,:), smc(:,:,:),
6899  & tg3(:), alb(:,:,:), alf(:,:),
6900  & vet(:), sot(:), tsf2(:),
6901  & veg(:,:), stc(:,:,:)
6902  &, vmn(:), vmx(:), slp(:), absm(:)
6903 !
6904  integer mon1s, mon2s, sea1s, sea2s, sea1, sea2, hyr1, hyr2
6905  data first/.true./
6906  data mon1s/0/, mon2s/0/, sea1s/0/, sea2s/0/
6907 !
6908  save first, tsf, sno, zor, wet, ais, acn, scv, smc, tg3,
6909  & alb, alf, vet, sot, tsf2, veg, stc,
6910  & vmn, vmx, slp, absm,
6911  & mon1s, mon2s, sea1s, sea2s, dayhf, k1, k2, m1, m2,
6912  & landice_cat
6913 !
6914  logical lprnt
6915 !
6916  do i=1,len
6917  tsfclm(i) = 0.0
6918  tsfcl2(i) = 0.0
6919  snoclm(i) = 0.0
6920  wetclm(i) = 0.0
6921  zorclm(i) = 0.0
6922  aisclm(i) = 0.0
6923  tg3clm(i) = 0.0
6924  acnclm(i) = 0.0
6925  cvclm(i) = 0.0
6926  cvbclm(i) = 0.0
6927  cvtclm(i) = 0.0
6928  cnpclm(i) = 0.0
6929  sliclm(i) = 0.0
6930  scvclm(i) = 0.0
6931  vmnclm(i) = 0.0
6932  vmxclm(i) = 0.0
6933  slpclm(i) = 0.0
6934  absclm(i) = 0.0
6935  enddo
6936  do k=1,lsoil
6937  do i=1,len
6938  smcclm(i,k) = 0.0
6939  stcclm(i,k) = 0.0
6940  enddo
6941  enddo
6942  do k=1,4
6943  do i=1,len
6944  albclm(i,k) = 0.0
6945  enddo
6946  enddo
6947  do k=1,2
6948  do i=1,len
6949  alfclm(i,k) = 0.0
6950  enddo
6951  enddo
6952 !
6953  iret = 0
6954  monend = 9999
6955 !
6956  if (first) then
6957 !
6958 ! allocate variables to be saved
6959 !
6960  allocate (tsf(len,2), sno(len,2), zor(len,2),
6961  & wet(len,2), ais(len,2), acn(len,2),
6962  & scv(len,2), smc(len,lsoil,2),
6963  & tg3(len), alb(len,4,2), alf(len,2),
6964  & vet(len), sot(len), tsf2(len),
6965 !clu [+1l] add vmn, vmx, slp, abs
6966  & vmn(len), vmx(len), slp(len), absm(len),
6967  & veg(len,2), stc(len,lsoil,2))
6968 !
6969 ! get tsf climatology for the begining of the forecast
6970 !
6971  if (fh > 0.0) then
6972 !cbosu
6973  if (me == 0) print*,'bosu fh gt 0'
6974 
6975  iy4 = iy
6976  if (iy < 101) iy4 = 1900 + iy4
6977  fha = 0
6978  ida = 0
6979  jda = 0
6980 ! fha(2) = nint(fh)
6981  ida(1) = iy
6982  ida(2) = im
6983  ida(3) = id
6984  ida(5) = ih
6985  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
6986  if(w3kindreal == 4) then
6987  fha4 = fha
6988  call w3movdat(fha4,ida,jda)
6989  else
6990  call w3movdat(fha,ida,jda)
6991  endif
6992  jy = jda(1)
6993  jm = jda(2)
6994  jd = jda(3)
6995  jh = jda(5)
6996  if (me == 0) write(6,*) ' forecast jy,jm,jd,jh',
6997  & jy,jm,jd,jh
6998  jdow = 0
6999  jdoy = 0
7000  jday = 0
7001  call w3doxdat(jda,jdow,jdoy,jday)
7002  rjday = jdoy + jda(5) / 24.
7003  if(rjday < dayhf(1)) rjday = rjday + 365.
7004 !
7005  if (me == 0) write(6,*) 'forecast jy,jm,jd,jh=',jy,jm,jd,jh
7006 !
7007 ! for monthly mean climatology
7008 !
7009  monend = 12
7010  do mm=1,monend
7011  mmm = mm
7012  mmp = mm + 1
7013  if(rjday >= dayhf(mmm) .and. rjday < dayhf(mmp)) then
7014  mon1 = mmm
7015  mon2 = mmp
7016  go to 10
7017  endif
7018  enddo
7019  print *,'wrong rjday',rjday
7020  call abort
7021  10 continue
7022  wei1m = (dayhf(mon2)-rjday)/(dayhf(mon2)-dayhf(mon1))
7023  wei2m = 1.0 - wei1m
7024 ! wei2m = (rjday-dayhf(mon1))/(dayhf(mon2)-dayhf(mon1))
7025  if (mon2 == 13) mon2 = 1
7026  if (me == 0) print *,'rjday,mon1,mon2,wei1m,wei2m=',
7027  & rjday,mon1,mon2,wei1m,wei2m
7028 !
7029 ! read monthly mean climatology of tsf
7030 !
7031  kpd7 = -1
7032  do nn=1,2
7033  mon = mon1
7034  if (nn == 2) mon = mon2
7035  call fixrdc(lugb,fntsfc,kpdtsf,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7036  & tsf(1,nn),len,iret
7037  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7038  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7039  enddo
7040 !
7041 ! tsf at the begining of forecast i.e. fh=0
7042 !
7043  do i=1,len
7044  tsfcl0(i) = wei1m * tsf(i,1) + wei2m * tsf(i,2)
7045  enddo
7046  endif
7047  endif
7048 !
7049 ! compute current jy,jm,jd,jh of forecast and the day of the year
7050 !
7051  iy4 = iy
7052  if (iy < 101) iy4=1900+iy4
7053  fha = 0
7054  ida = 0
7055  jda = 0
7056  fha(2) = nint(fh)
7057  ida(1) = iy
7058  ida(2) = im
7059  ida(3) = id
7060  ida(5) = ih
7061  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
7062  if(w3kindreal == 4) then
7063  fha4 = fha
7064  call w3movdat(fha4,ida,jda)
7065  else
7066  call w3movdat(fha,ida,jda)
7067  endif
7068  jy = jda(1)
7069  jm = jda(2)
7070  jd = jda(3)
7071  jh = jda(5)
7072 ! if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' forecast jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday=',
7073 ! & jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday
7074  jdow = 0
7075  jdoy = 0
7076  jday = 0
7077  call w3doxdat(jda,jdow,jdoy,jday)
7078  rjday = jdoy + jda(5) / 24.
7079  if(rjday < dayhf(1)) rjday = rjday + 365.
7080 
7081  if (me == 0) write(6,*) ' forecast jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday=',
7082  & jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday
7083 !
7084  if (me == 0) write(6,*) 'forecast jy,jm,jd,jh=',jy,jm,jd,jh
7085 !
7086 ! for monthly mean climatology
7087 !
7088  monend = 12
7089  do mm=1,monend
7090  mmm = mm
7091  mmp = mm + 1
7092  if(rjday >= dayhf(mmm) .and. rjday < dayhf(mmp)) then
7093  mon1 = mmm
7094  mon2 = mmp
7095  go to 20
7096  endif
7097  enddo
7098  print *,'wrong rjday',rjday
7099  call abort
7100  20 continue
7101  wei1m = (dayhf(mon2)-rjday)/(dayhf(mon2)-dayhf(mon1))
7102  wei2m = 1.0 - wei1m
7103 ! wei2m = (rjday-dayhf(mon1))/(dayhf(mon2)-dayhf(mon1))
7104  if (mon2 == 13) mon2 = 1
7105  if (me == 0) print *,'rjday,mon1,mon2,wei1m,wei2m=',
7106  & rjday,mon1,mon2,wei1m,wei2m
7107 !
7108 ! for seasonal mean climatology
7109 !
7110  monend = 4
7111  is = im/3 + 1
7112  if (is == 5) is = 1
7113  do mm=1,monend
7114  mmm = mm*3 - 2
7115  mmp = (mm+1)*3 - 2
7116  if(rjday >= dayhf(mmm) .and. rjday < dayhf(mmp)) then
7117  sea1 = mmm
7118  sea2 = mmp
7119  go to 30
7120  endif
7121  enddo
7122  print *,'wrong rjday',rjday
7123  call abort
7124  30 continue
7125  wei1s = (dayhf(sea2)-rjday)/(dayhf(sea2)-dayhf(sea1))
7126  wei2s = 1.0 - wei1s
7127 ! wei2s = (rjday-dayhf(sea1))/(dayhf(sea2)-dayhf(sea1))
7128  if (sea2 == 13) sea2 = 1
7129  if (me == 0) print *,'rjday,sea1,sea2,wei1s,wei2s=',
7130  & rjday,sea1,sea2,wei1s,wei2s
7131 !
7132 ! for summer and winter values (maximum and minimum).
7133 !
7134  monend = 2
7135  is = im/6 + 1
7136  if (is == 3) is = 1
7137  do mm=1,monend
7138  mmm = mm*6 - 5
7139  mmp = (mm+1)*6 - 5
7140  if(rjday >= dayhf(mmm) .and. rjday < dayhf(mmp)) then
7141  hyr1 = mmm
7142  hyr2 = mmp
7143  go to 31
7144  endif
7145  enddo
7146  print *,'wrong rjday',rjday
7147  call abort
7148  31 continue
7149  wei1y = (dayhf(hyr2)-rjday)/(dayhf(hyr2)-dayhf(hyr1))
7150  wei2y = 1.0 - wei1y
7151 ! wei2y = (rjday-dayhf(hyr1))/(dayhf(hyr2)-dayhf(hyr1))
7152  if (hyr2 == 13) hyr2 = 1
7153  if (me == 0) print *,'rjday,hyr1,hyr2,wei1y,wei2y=',
7154  & rjday,hyr1,hyr2,wei1y,wei2y
7155 !
7156 ! start reading in climatology and interpolate to the date
7157 !
7158  first_time : if (first) then
7159 !cbosu
7160  if (me == 0) print*,'bosu first time thru'
7161 !
7162 ! annual mean climatology
7163 !
7164 ! fraction of vegetation field for albedo -- there are two
7165 ! fraction fields in this version: strong zenith angle dependent
7166 ! and weak zenith angle dependent
7167 !
7168  kpd9 = -1
7169 cjfe
7170  alf=0.
7171 cjfe
7172 
7173  kpd7=-1
7174  if (ialb == 1) then
7175 !cbosu still need facsf and facwf. read them from the production
7176 !cbosu file
7177  if ( index(fnalbc2, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7178  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc2,kpdalf(1),kpd7,kpd9,slmask
7179  &, alf,len,iret
7180  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7181  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7182  else
7183  call fixrdc_tile(fnalbc2, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7184  & kpdalf(1), alf(:,1), 1, len, me)
7185  endif
7186  else
7187  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc,kpdalf(1),kpd7,kpd9,slmask
7188  &, alf,len,iret
7189  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7190  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7191  endif
7192  do i = 1, len
7193  if(slmask(i).eq.1.) then
7194  alf(i,2) = 100. - alf(i,1)
7195  endif
7196  enddo
7197 !
7198 ! deep soil temperature
7199 !
7200  if(fntg3c(1:8).ne.' ') then
7201  if ( index(fntg3c, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7202  kpd7=-1
7203  call fixrdc(lugb,fntg3c,kpdtg3,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7204  & tg3,len,iret
7205  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7206  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7207  else
7208  call fixrdc_tile(fntg3c, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7209  & kpdtg3, tg3, 1, len, me)
7210  endif
7211  endif
7212 !
7213 ! vegetation type
7214 !
7215 ! when using the new gldas soil moisture climatology, a veg type
7216 ! dataset must be selected.
7217 !
7218  if(fnvetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7219  if ( index(fnvetc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7220  kpd7=-1
7221  call fixrdc(lugb,fnvetc,kpdvet,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7222  & vet,len,iret
7223  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7224  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7225  landice_cat=13
7226  if (maxval(vet)> 13.0) landice_cat=15
7227  else
7228  call fixrdc_tile(fnvetc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7229  & kpdvet, vet, 1, len, me)
7230  landice_cat=15
7231  endif
7232  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological vegetation',
7233  & ' type read in.'
7234  elseif(index(fnsmcc,'soilmgldas') /= 0) then ! new soil moisture climo
7235  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'fatal error: must choose'
7236  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological veg type when'
7237  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'using new gldas soil moisture.'
7238  call abort
7239  endif
7240 !
7241 ! soil type
7242 !
7243  if(fnsotc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7244  if ( index(fnsotc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7245  kpd7=-1
7246  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsotc,kpdsot,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7247  & sot,len,iret
7248  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7249  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7250  else
7251  call fixrdc_tile(fnsotc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7252  & kpdsot, sot, 1, len, me)
7253  endif
7254  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological soil type read in.'
7255  endif
7256 
7257 !
7258 ! min vegetation cover
7259 !
7260  if(fnvmnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7261  if ( index(fnvmnc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7262  kpd7=-1
7263  call fixrdc(lugb,fnvmnc,kpdvmn,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7264  & vmn,len,iret
7265  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7266  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7267  else
7268  call fixrdc_tile(fnvmnc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7269  & 257, vmn, 99, len, me)
7270 
7271  endif
7272  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological shdmin read in.'
7273  endif
7274 !
7275 ! max vegetation cover
7276 !
7277  if(fnvmxc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7278  if ( index(fnvmxc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7279  kpd7=-1
7280  call fixrdc(lugb,fnvmxc,kpdvmx,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7281  & vmx,len,iret
7282  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7283  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7284  else
7285  call fixrdc_tile(fnvmxc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7286  & 256, vmx, 99, len, me)
7287  endif
7288  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological shdmax read in.'
7289  endif
7290 !
7291 ! slope type
7292 !
7293  if(fnslpc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7294  if ( index(fnslpc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7295  kpd7=-1
7296  call fixrdc(lugb,fnslpc,kpdslp,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7297  & slp,len,iret
7298  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7299  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7300  else
7301  call fixrdc_tile(fnslpc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7302  & kpdslp, slp, 1, len, me)
7303  endif
7304  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological slope read in.'
7305  endif
7306 !
7307 ! max snow albeod
7308 !
7309  if(fnabsc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7310  if ( index(fnabsc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7311  kpd7=-1
7312  call fixrdc(lugb,fnabsc,kpdabs,kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7313  & absm,len,iret
7314  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7315  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7316  else
7317  call fixrdc_tile(fnabsc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7318  & kpdabs, absm, 1, len, me)
7319  endif
7320  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological snoalb read in.'
7321  endif
7322 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
7323 !
7324  is1 = sea1/3 + 1
7325  is2 = sea2/3 + 1
7326  if (is1 .eq. 5) is1 = 1
7327  if (is2 .eq. 5) is2 = 1
7328  do nn=1,2
7329 !
7330 ! seasonal mean climatology
7331  if(nn.eq.1) then
7332  isx=is1
7333  else
7334  isx=is2
7335  endif
7336  if(isx.eq.1) kpd9 = 12
7337  if(isx.eq.2) kpd9 = 3
7338  if(isx.eq.3) kpd9 = 6
7339  if(isx.eq.4) kpd9 = 9
7340 !
7341 ! seasonal mean climatology
7342 !
7343 ! albedo
7344 ! there are four albedo fields in this version:
7345 ! two for strong zeneith angle dependent (visible and near ir)
7346 ! and two for weak zeneith angle dependent (vis ans nir)
7347 !
7348  if (ialb == 0) then
7349  kpd7=-1
7350  do k = 1, 4
7351  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc,kpdalb(k),kpd7,kpd9,slmask,
7352  & alb(1,k,nn),len,iret
7353  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7354  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7355  enddo
7356  endif
7357 !
7358 ! monthly mean climatology
7359 !
7360  mon = mon1
7361  if (nn .eq. 2) mon = mon2
7362 !cbosu
7363 !cbosu new snowfree albedo database is monthly.
7364  if (ialb == 1) then
7365  if ( index(fnalbc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7366  kpd7=-1
7367  do k = 1, 4
7368  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc,kpdalb(k),kpd7,mon,slmask,
7369  & alb(1,k,nn),len,iret
7370  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7371  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7372  enddo
7373  else
7374  do k = 1, 4
7375  call fixrdc_tile(fnalbc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7376  & kpdalb(k), alb(:,k,nn), mon, len, me)
7377  enddo
7378  endif
7379  endif
7380 
7381 ! if(lprnt) print *,' mon1=',mon1,' mon2=',mon2
7382 !
7383 ! tsf at the current time t
7384 !
7385  kpd7=-1
7386  call fixrdc(lugb,fntsfc,kpdtsf,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7387  & tsf(1,nn),len,iret
7388  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7389  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7390 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsf=',tsf(iprnt,nn),' nn=',nn
7391 !
7392 ! tsf...at time t-deltsfc
7393 !
7394 ! fh2 = fh - deltsfc
7395 ! if (fh2 .gt. 0.0) then
7396 ! call fixrd(lugb,fntsfc,kpdtsf,lclim,slmask,
7397 ! & iy,im,id,ih,fh2,tsfcl2,len,iret
7398 ! &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7399 ! &, outlat, outlon, me)
7400 ! else
7401 ! do i=1,len
7402 ! tsfcl2(i) = tsfclm(i)
7403 ! enddo
7404 ! endif
7405 !
7406 ! soil wetness
7407 !
7408  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7409  kpd7=-1
7410  call fixrdc(lugb,fnwetc,kpdwet,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7411  & wet(1,nn),len,iret
7412  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7413  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7414  elseif(fnsmcc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7415  if (index(fnsmcc,'global_soilmcpc.1x1.grb') /= 0) then ! the old climo data
7416  kpd7=-1
7417  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsmcc,kpdsmc,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7418  & smc(1,lsoil,nn),len,iret
7419  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7420  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7421  do l=1,lsoil-1
7422  do i = 1, len
7423  smc(i,l,nn) = smc(i,lsoil,nn)
7424  enddo
7425  enddo
7426  else ! the new gldas data. it does not have data defined at landice
7427  ! points. so for efficiency, don't have fixrdc try to
7428  ! find a value at landice points as defined by the vet type (vet).
7429  allocate(slmask_noice(len))
7430  slmask_noice=1.0
7431  do i = 1, len
7432  if (nint(vet(i)) < 1 .or.
7433  & nint(vet(i)) == landice_cat) then
7434  slmask_noice(i) = 0.0
7435  endif
7436  enddo
7437  do k = 1, lsoil
7438  if (k==1) kpd7=10 ! 0_10 cm (pds octs 11 and 12)
7439  if (k==2) kpd7=2600 ! 10_40 cm
7440  if (k==3) kpd7=10340 ! 40_100 cm
7441  if (k==4) kpd7=25800 ! 100_200 cm
7442  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsmcc,kpdsmc,kpd7,mon,slmask_noice,
7443  & smc(1,k,nn),len,iret
7444  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7445  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7446  enddo
7447  deallocate(slmask_noice)
7448  endif
7449  else
7450  write(6,*) 'climatological soil wetness file not given'
7451  call abort
7452  endif
7453 !
7454 ! soil temperature
7455 !
7456  if(fnstcc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7457  kpd7=-1
7458  call fixrdc(lugb,fnstcc,kpdstc,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7459  & stc(1,lsoil,nn),len,iret
7460  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7461  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7462  do l=1,lsoil-1
7463  do i = 1, len
7464  stc(i,l,nn) = stc(i,lsoil,nn)
7465  enddo
7466  enddo
7467  endif
7468 !
7469 ! sea ice
7470 !
7471  kpd7=-1
7472  if(fnacnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7473  call fixrdc(lugb,fnacnc,kpdacn,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7474  & acn(1,nn),len,iret
7475  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7476  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7477  elseif(fnaisc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7478  call fixrdc(lugb,fnaisc,kpdais,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7479  & ais(1,nn),len,iret
7480  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7481  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7482  else
7483  write(6,*) 'climatological ice cover file not given'
7484  call abort
7485  endif
7486 !
7487 ! snow depth
7488 !
7489  kpd7=-1
7490  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsnoc,kpdsno,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7491  & sno(1,nn),len,iret
7492  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7493  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7494 !
7495 ! snow cover
7496 !
7497  if(fnscvc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7498  kpd7=-1
7499  call fixrdc(lugb,fnscvc,kpdscv,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7500  & scv(1,nn),len,iret
7501  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7502  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7503  write(6,*) 'climatological snow cover read in.'
7504  endif
7505 !
7506 ! surface roughness
7507 !
7508  if(fnzorc(1:3) == 'sib') then
7509  if (me == 0) then
7510  write(6,*) 'roughness length to be set from sib veg type'
7511  endif
7512  elseif(fnzorc(1:4) == 'igbp') then
7513  if (me == 0) then
7514  write(6,*) 'roughness length to be set from igbp veg type'
7515  endif
7516  else
7517  kpd7=-1
7518  call fixrdc(lugb,fnzorc,kpdzor,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7519  & zor(1,nn),len,iret
7520  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7521  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7522  endif
7523 !
7524  do i = 1, len
7525 ! set clouds climatology to zero
7526  cvclm(i) = 0.
7527  cvbclm(i) = 0.
7528  cvtclm(i) = 0.
7529 !
7530  cnpclm(i) = 0. !set canopy water content climatology to zero
7531  enddo
7532 !
7533 ! vegetation cover
7534 !
7535  if(fnvegc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7536  if ( index(fnvegc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7537  kpd7=-1
7538  call fixrdc(lugb,fnvegc,kpdveg,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7539  & veg(1,nn),len,iret
7540  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7541  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7542  else
7543  call fixrdc_tile(fnvegc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7544  & kpdveg, veg(:,nn), mon, len, me)
7545  endif
7546  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological vegetation',
7547  & ' cover read in for mon=',mon
7548  endif
7549 
7550  enddo
7551 !
7552  mon1s = mon1 ; mon2s = mon2 ; sea1s = sea1 ; sea2s = sea2
7553 !
7554  if (me == 0) print *,' mon1s=',mon1s,' mon2s=',mon2s
7555  &,' sea1s=',sea1s,' sea2s=',sea2s
7556 !
7557  k1 = 1 ; k2 = 2
7558  m1 = 1 ; m2 = 2
7559 !
7560  first = .false.
7561  endif first_time
7562 !
7563 ! to get tsf climatology at the previous call to sfccycle
7564 !
7565 ! if (fh-deltsfc >= 0.0) then
7566  rjdayh = rjday - deltsfc/24.0
7567 ! else
7568 ! rjdayh = rjday
7569 ! endif
7570 ! if(lprnt) print *,' rjdayh=',rjdayh,' mon1=',mon1,' mon2='
7571 ! &,mon2,' mon1s=',mon1s,' mon2s=',mon2s,' k1=',k1,' k2=',k2
7572  if (rjdayh .ge. dayhf(mon1)) then
7573  if (mon2 .eq. 1) mon2 = 13
7574  wei1x = (dayhf(mon2)-rjdayh)/(dayhf(mon2)-dayhf(mon1))
7575  wei2x = 1.0 - wei1x
7576  if (mon2 .eq. 13) mon2 = 1
7577  else
7578  rjdayh2 = rjdayh
7579  if (rjdayh .lt. dayhf(1)) rjdayh2 = rjdayh2 + 365.0
7580  if (mon1s .eq. mon1) then
7581  mon1s = mon1 - 1
7582  if (mon1s .eq. 0) mon1s = 12
7583  k2 = k1
7584  k1 = mod(k2,2) + 1
7585  mon = mon1s
7586  kpd7=-1
7587  call fixrdc(lugb,fntsfc,kpdtsf,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7588  & tsf(1,k1),len,iret
7589  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7590  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7591  endif
7592  mon2s = mon1s + 1
7593 ! if (mon2s .eq. 1) mon2s = 13
7594  wei1x = (dayhf(mon2s)-rjdayh2)/(dayhf(mon2s)-dayhf(mon1s))
7595  wei2x = 1.0 - wei1x
7596  if (mon2s .eq. 13) mon2s = 1
7597  do i=1,len
7598  tsf2(i) = wei1x * tsf(i,k1) + wei2x * tsf(i,k2)
7599  enddo
7600  endif
7601 !
7602 !cbosu new albedo is monthly
7603  if (sea1 .ne. sea1s) then
7604  sea1s = sea1
7605  sea2s = sea2
7606  m1 = mod(m1,2) + 1
7607  m2 = mod(m1,2) + 1
7608 !
7609 ! seasonal mean climatology
7610 !
7611  isx = sea2/3 + 1
7612  if (isx == 5) isx = 1
7613  if (isx == 1) kpd9 = 12
7614  if (isx == 2) kpd9 = 3
7615  if (isx == 3) kpd9 = 6
7616  if (isx == 4) kpd9 = 9
7617 !
7618 ! albedo
7619 ! there are four albedo fields in this version:
7620 ! two for strong zeneith angle dependent (visible and near ir)
7621 ! and two for weak zeneith angle dependent (vis ans nir)
7622 !
7623 !cbosu
7624  if (ialb == 0) then
7625  kpd7=-1
7626  do k = 1, 4
7627  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc,kpdalb(k),kpd7,kpd9,slmask
7628  &, alb(1,k,m2),len,iret
7629  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7630  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7631  enddo
7632  endif
7633 
7634  endif
7635 
7636  if (mon1 .ne. mon1s) then
7637 
7638  mon1s = mon1
7639  mon2s = mon2
7640  k1 = mod(k1,2) + 1
7641  k2 = mod(k1,2) + 1
7642 !
7643 ! monthly mean climatology
7644 !
7645  mon = mon2
7646  nn = k2
7647 !cbosu
7648  if (ialb == 1) then
7649  if (me == 0) print*,'bosu 2nd time in clima for month ',
7650  & mon, k1,k2
7651  if ( index(fnalbc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7652  kpd7 = -1
7653  do k = 1, 4
7654  call fixrdc(lugb,fnalbc,kpdalb(k),kpd7,mon,slmask,
7655  & alb(1,k,nn),len,iret
7656  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7657  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7658  enddo
7659  else
7660  do k = 1, 4
7661  call fixrdc_tile(fnalbc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7662  & kpdalb(k), alb(:,k,nn), mon, len, me)
7663  enddo
7664  endif
7665  endif
7666 !
7667 ! tsf at the current time t
7668 !
7669  kpd7 = -1
7670  call fixrdc(lugb,fntsfc,kpdtsf,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7671  & tsf(1,nn),len,iret
7672  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7673  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7674 !
7675 ! soil wetness
7676 !
7677  if (fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7678  kpd7=-1
7679  call fixrdc(lugb,fnwetc,kpdwet,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7680  & wet(1,nn),len,iret
7681  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7682  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7683  elseif (fnsmcc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7684  if (index(fnsmcc,'global_soilmcpc.1x1.grb') /= 0) then ! the old climo data
7685  kpd7=-1
7686  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsmcc,kpdsmc,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7687  & smc(1,lsoil,nn),len,iret
7688  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7689  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7690  do l=1,lsoil-1
7691  do i = 1, len
7692  smc(i,l,nn) = smc(i,lsoil,nn)
7693  enddo
7694  enddo
7695  else ! the new gldas data. it does not have data defined at landice
7696  ! points. so for efficiency, don't have fixrdc try to
7697  ! find a value at landice points as defined by the vet type (vet).
7698  allocate(slmask_noice(len))
7699  slmask_noice=1.0
7700  do i = 1, len
7701  if (nint(vet(i)) < 1 .or.
7702  & nint(vet(i)) == landice_cat) then
7703  slmask_noice(i) = 0.0
7704  endif
7705  enddo
7706  do k = 1, lsoil
7707  if (k==1) kpd7=10 ! 0_10 cm (pds octs 11 and 12)
7708  if (k==2) kpd7=2600 ! 10_40 cm
7709  if (k==3) kpd7=10340 ! 40_100 cm
7710  if (k==4) kpd7=25800 ! 100_200 cm
7711  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsmcc,kpdsmc,kpd7,mon,slmask_noice,
7712  & smc(1,k,nn),len,iret
7713  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7714  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7715  enddo
7716  deallocate(slmask_noice)
7717  endif
7718  else
7719  write(6,*) 'climatological soil wetness file not given'
7720  call abort
7721  endif
7722 !
7723 ! sea ice
7724 !
7725  kpd7 = -1
7726  if (fnacnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7727  call fixrdc(lugb,fnacnc,kpdacn,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7728  & acn(1,nn),len,iret
7729  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7730  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7731  elseif (fnaisc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7732  call fixrdc(lugb,fnaisc,kpdais,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7733  & ais(1,nn),len,iret
7734  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7735  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7736  else
7737  write(6,*) 'climatological ice cover file not given'
7738  call abort
7739  endif
7740 !
7741 ! snow depth
7742 !
7743  kpd7=-1
7744  call fixrdc(lugb,fnsnoc,kpdsno,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7745  & sno(1,nn),len,iret
7746  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7747  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7748 !
7749 ! snow cover
7750 !
7751  if (fnscvc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7752  kpd7=-1
7753  call fixrdc(lugb,fnscvc,kpdscv,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7754  & scv(1,nn),len,iret
7755  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7756  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7757  write(6,*) 'climatological snow cover read in.'
7758  endif
7759 !
7760 ! surface roughness
7761 !
7762  if (fnzorc(1:3) == 'sib') then
7763  if (me == 0) then
7764  write(6,*) 'roughness length to be set from sib veg type'
7765  endif
7766  elseif(fnzorc(1:4) == 'igbp') then
7767  if (me == 0) then
7768  write(6,*) 'roughness length to be set from igbp veg type'
7769  endif
7770  else
7771  kpd7=-1
7772  call fixrdc(lugb,fnzorc,kpdzor,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7773  & zor(1,nn),len,iret
7774  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7775  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7776  endif
7777 !
7778 ! vegetation cover
7779 !
7780  if (fnvegc(1:8) .ne. ' ') then
7781  if ( index(fnvegc, "tileX.nc") == 0) then ! grib file
7782  kpd7=-1
7783  call fixrdc(lugb,fnvegc,kpdveg,kpd7,mon,slmask,
7784  & veg(1,nn),len,iret
7785  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
7786  &, outlat, outlon, me)
7787  else
7788  call fixrdc_tile(fnvegc, tile_num_ch, i_index, j_index,
7789  & kpdveg, veg(:,nn), mon, len, me)
7790  endif
7791 ! if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'climatological vegetation',
7792 ! & ' cover read in for mon=',mon
7793  endif
7794 !
7795  endif
7796 !
7797 ! now perform the time interpolation
7798 !
7799 ! when chosen, set the z0 based on the vegetation type.
7800 ! for this option to work, namelist variable fnvetc must be
7801 ! set to point at the proper vegetation type file.
7802  if (fnzorc(1:3) == 'sib') then
7803  if (fnvetc(1:4) == ' ') then
7804  if (me==0) write(6,*) "must choose sib veg type climo file"
7805  call abort
7806  endif
7807  zorclm = 0.0
7808  do i=1,len
7809  ivtyp = nint(vet(i))
7810  if (ivtyp >= 1 .and. ivtyp <= 13) then
7811  zorclm(i) = z0_sib(ivtyp)
7812  endif
7813  enddo
7814  elseif(fnzorc(1:4) == 'igbp') then
7815  if (fnvetc(1:4) == ' ') then
7816  if (me == 0) write(6,*) "must choose igbp veg type climo file"
7817  call abort
7818  endif
7819  zorclm = 0.0
7820  do i=1,len
7821  ivtyp = nint(vet(i))
7822  if (ivtyp >= 1 .and. ivtyp <= 20) then
7823  z0_season(1) = z0_igbp_min(ivtyp)
7824  z0_season(7) = z0_igbp_max(ivtyp)
7825  if (outlat(i) < 0.0) then
7826  zorclm(i) = wei1y * z0_season(hyr2) +
7827  & wei2y * z0_season(hyr1)
7828  else
7829  zorclm(i) = wei1y * z0_season(hyr1) +
7830  & wei2y * z0_season(hyr2)
7831  endif
7832  endif
7833  enddo
7834  else
7835  do i=1,len
7836  zorclm(i) = wei1m * zor(i,k1) + wei2m * zor(i,k2)
7837  enddo
7838  endif
7839 !
7840  do i=1,len
