7841  tsfclm(i) = wei1m * tsf(i,k1) + wei2m * tsf(i,k2)
7842  snoclm(i) = wei1m * sno(i,k1) + wei2m * sno(i,k2)
7843  cvclm(i) = 0.0
7844  cvbclm(i) = 0.0
7845  cvtclm(i) = 0.0
7846  cnpclm(i) = 0.0
7847  tsfcl2(i) = tsf2(i)
7848  enddo
7849 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsfclm=',tsfclm(iprnt),' wei1m=',wei1m
7850 ! &,' wei2m=',wei2m,' tsfk12=',tsf(iprnt,k1),tsf(iprnt,k2)
7851 !
7852  if (fh .eq. 0.0) then
7853  do i=1,len
7854  tsfcl0(i) = tsfclm(i)
7855  enddo
7856  endif
7857  if (rjdayh .ge. dayhf(mon1)) then
7858  do i=1,len
7859  tsf2(i) = wei1x * tsf(i,k1) + wei2x * tsf(i,k2)
7860  tsfcl2(i) = tsf2(i)
7861  enddo
7862  endif
7863 ! if(lprnt) print *,' tsf2=',tsf2(iprnt),' wei1x=',wei1x
7864 ! &,' wei2x=',wei2x,' tsfk12=',tsf(iprnt,k1),tsf(iprnt,k2)
7865 ! &,' mon1s=',mon1s,' mon2s=',mon2s
7866 ! &,' slmask=',slmask(iprnt)
7867 !
7868  if(fnacnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7869  do i=1,len
7870  acnclm(i) = wei1m * acn(i,k1) + wei2m * acn(i,k2)
7871  enddo
7872  elseif(fnaisc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7873  do i=1,len
7874  aisclm(i) = wei1m * ais(i,k1) + wei2m * ais(i,k2)
7875  enddo
7876  endif
7877 !
7878  if(fnwetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7879  do i=1,len
7880  wetclm(i) = wei1m * wet(i,k1) + wei2m * wet(i,k2)
7881  enddo
7882  elseif(fnsmcc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7883  do k=1,lsoil
7884  do i=1,len
7885  smcclm(i,k) = wei1m * smc(i,k,k1) + wei2m * smc(i,k,k2)
7886  enddo
7887  enddo
7888  endif
7889 !
7890  if(fnscvc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7891  do i=1,len
7892  scvclm(i) = wei1m * scv(i,k1) + wei2m * scv(i,k2)
7893  enddo
7894  endif
7895 !
7896  if(fntg3c(1:8).ne.' ') then
7897  do i=1,len
7898  tg3clm(i) = tg3(i)
7899  enddo
7900  elseif(fnstcc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7901  do k=1,lsoil
7902  do i=1,len
7903  stcclm(i,k) = wei1m * stc(i,k,k1) + wei2m * stc(i,k,k2)
7904  enddo
7905  enddo
7906  endif
7907 !
7908  if(fnvegc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7909  do i=1,len
7910  vegclm(i) = wei1m * veg(i,k1) + wei2m * veg(i,k2)
7911  enddo
7912  endif
7913 !
7914  if(fnvetc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7915  do i=1,len
7916  vetclm(i) = vet(i)
7917  enddo
7918  endif
7919 !
7920  if(fnsotc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7921  do i=1,len
7922  sotclm(i) = sot(i)
7923  enddo
7924  endif
7925 
7926 
7927 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
7928 !
7929  if(fnvmnc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7930  do i=1,len
7931  vmnclm(i) = vmn(i)
7932  enddo
7933  endif
7934 !
7935  if(fnvmxc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7936  do i=1,len
7937  vmxclm(i) = vmx(i)
7938  enddo
7939  endif
7940 !
7941  if(fnslpc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7942  do i=1,len
7943  slpclm(i) = slp(i)
7944  enddo
7945  endif
7946 !
7947  if(fnabsc(1:8).ne.' ') then
7948  do i=1,len
7949  absclm(i) = absm(i)
7950  enddo
7951  endif
7952 !clu ----------------------------------------------------------------------
7953 !
7954 !cbosu diagnostic print
7955  if (me == 0) print*,'monthly albedo weights are ',
7956  & wei1m,' for k', k1, wei2m, ' for k', k2
7957 
7958  if (ialb == 1) then
7959  do k=1,4
7960  do i=1,len
7961  albclm(i,k) = wei1m * alb(i,k,k1) + wei2m * alb(i,k,k2)
7962  enddo
7963  enddo
7964  else
7965  do k=1,4
7966  do i=1,len
7967  albclm(i,k) = wei1s * alb(i,k,m1) + wei2s * alb(i,k,m2)
7968  enddo
7969  enddo
7970  endif
7971 !
7972  do k=1,2
7973  do i=1,len
7974  alfclm(i,k) = alf(i,k)
7975  enddo
7976  enddo
7977 !
7978 ! end of climatology reads
7979 !
7980  return
7981  end subroutine clima
7982  subroutine fixrdc_tile(filename_raw, tile_num_ch,
7983  & i_index, j_index, kpds,
7984  & var, mon, npts, me)
7985  use netcdf
7986  use machine , only : kind_io8
7987  implicit none
7988  character(len=*), intent(in) :: filename_raw
7989  character(len=*), intent(in) :: tile_num_ch
7990  integer, intent(in) :: npts, me, kpds, mon
7991  integer, intent(in) :: i_index(npts)
7992  integer, intent(in) :: j_index(npts)
7993  real(kind_io8), intent(out) :: var(npts)
7994  character(len=500) :: filename
7995  character(len=80) :: errmsg
7996  integer :: i, ii, ncid, t
7997  integer :: error, id_dim
7998  integer :: nx, ny, num_times
7999  integer :: id_var
8000  real(kind=4), allocatable :: dummy(:,:,:)
8001  ii=index(filename_raw,"tileX")
8002 
8003  do i = 1, len(filename)
8004  filename(i:i) = " "
8005  enddo
8006 
8007  filename = filename_raw(1:ii-1) // tile_num_ch // ".nc"
8008 
8009  if (me == 0) print*, ' in fixrdc_tile for mon=',mon,
8010  & ' filename=', trim(filename)
8011 
8012  error=nf90_open(trim(filename), nf90_nowrite, ncid)
8013  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8014 
8015  error=nf90_inq_dimid(ncid, 'nx', id_dim)
8016  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8017  error=nf90_inquire_dimension(ncid,id_dim,len=nx)
8018  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8019 
8020  error=nf90_inq_dimid(ncid, 'ny', id_dim)
8021  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8022  error=nf90_inquire_dimension(ncid,id_dim,len=ny)
8023  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8024 
8025  error=nf90_inq_dimid(ncid, 'time', id_dim)
8026  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8027  error=nf90_inquire_dimension(ncid,id_dim,len=num_times)
8028  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8029 
8030  select case (kpds)
8031  case(11)
8032  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'substrate_temperature', id_var)
8033  case(87)
8034  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'vegetation_greenness', id_var)
8035  case(159)
8036  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'maximum_snow_albedo', id_var)
8037  case(189)
8038  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'visible_black_sky_albedo', id_var)
8039  case(190)
8040  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'visible_white_sky_albedo', id_var)
8041  case(191)
8042  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'near_IR_black_sky_albedo', id_var)
8043  case(192)
8044  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'near_IR_white_sky_albedo', id_var)
8045  case(214)
8046  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'facsf', id_var)
8047  case(224)
8048  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'soil_type', id_var)
8049  case(225)
8050  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'vegetation_type', id_var)
8051  case(236)
8052  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'slope_type', id_var)
8053  case(256:257)
8054  error=nf90_inq_varid(ncid, 'vegetation_greenness', id_var)
8055  case default
8056  print*,'fatal error in fixrdc_tile of sfcsub.F.'
8057  print*,'unknown variable.'
8058  call abort
8059  end select
8060  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8061 
8062  allocate(dummy(nx,ny,1))
8063 
8064  if (kpds == 256) then ! max veg greenness
8065 
8066  var = -9999.
8067  do t = 1, num_times
8068  error=nf90_get_var(ncid, id_var, dummy, start=(/1,1,t/),
8069  & count=(/nx,ny,1/) )
8070  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8071  do ii = 1,npts
8072  var(ii) = max(var(ii), dummy(i_index(ii),j_index(ii),1))
8073  enddo
8074  enddo
8075 
8076  elseif (kpds == 257) then ! min veg greenness
8077 
8078  var = 9999.
8079  do t = 1, num_times
8080  error=nf90_get_var(ncid, id_var, dummy, start=(/1,1,t/),
8081  & count=(/nx,ny,1/) )
8082  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8083  do ii = 1, npts
8084  var(ii) = min(var(ii), dummy(i_index(ii),j_index(ii),1))
8085  enddo
8086  enddo
8087 
8088  else
8089 
8090  error=nf90_get_var(ncid, id_var, dummy, start=(/1,1,mon/),
8091  & count=(/nx,ny,1/) )
8092  if (error /= nf90_noerr) call netcdf_err(error)
8093 
8094  do ii = 1, npts
8095  var(ii) = dummy(i_index(ii),j_index(ii),1)
8096  enddo
8097 
8098  endif
8099 
8100  deallocate(dummy)
8101 
8102  error=nf90_close(ncid)
8103 
8104  select case (kpds)
8105  case(159) ! max snow alb
8106  var = var * 100.0
8107  case(214) ! facsf
8108  where (var < 0.0) var = 0.0
8109  var = var * 100.0
8110  case(189:192)
8111  var = var * 100.0
8112  case(256:257)
8113  var = var * 100.0
8114  end select
8115 
8116  return
8117 
8118  end subroutine fixrdc_tile
8119  subroutine netcdf_err(error)
8120 
8121  use netcdf
8122  implicit none
8123 
8124  integer,intent(in) :: error
8125  character(len=256) :: errmsg
8126 
8127  errmsg = nf90_strerror(error)
8128  print*,'fatal error in sfcsub.F: ', trim(errmsg)
8129  call abort
8130 
8131  end subroutine netcdf_err
8132  subroutine fixrdc(lugb,fngrib,kpds5,kpds7,mon,slmask,
8133  & gdata,len,iret
8134  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
8135  &, outlat, outlon, me)
8136  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
8137  use sfccyc_module, only : mdata
8138  implicit none
8139  integer imax,jmax,ijmax,i,j,n,jret,inttyp,iret,imsk,
8140  & jmsk,len,lugb,kpds5,mon,lskip,lgrib,ndata,lugi,me,kmami
8141  &, jj,w3kindreal,w3kindint
8142  real (kind=kind_io8) wlon,elon,rnlat,dlat,dlon,rslat,blno,blto
8143 !
8144 ! read in grib climatology files and interpolate to the input
8145 ! grid. grib files should allow all the necessary parameters
8146 ! to be extracted from the description records.
8147 !
8148 !
8149  character*500 fngrib
8150 ! character*80 fngrib, asgnstr
8151 !
8152  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(imsk,jmsk)
8153 !
8154  real (kind=kind_io8) gdata(len), slmask(len)
8155  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: data(:,:), rslmsk(:,:)
8156  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: data8(:)
8157  real (kind=kind_io4), allocatable :: data4(:)
8158  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: rlngrb(:), rltgrb(:)
8159 !
8160  logical lmask, yr2kc, gaus, ijordr
8161  logical*1, allocatable :: lbms(:)
8162 !
8163  integer, intent(in) :: kpds7
8164  integer kpds(1000),kgds(1000)
8165  integer jpds(1000),jgds(1000), kpds0(1000)
8166  real (kind=kind_io8) outlat(len), outlon(len)
8167 !
8168  allocate(data8(1:mdata))
8169  allocate(lbms(mdata))
8170 !
8171 ! integer imax_sv, jmax_sv, wlon_sv, rnlat_sv, kpds1_sv
8172 ! date imax_sv/0/, jmax_sv/0/, wlon_sv/999.0/, rnlat_sv/999.0/
8173 ! &, kpds1_sv/-1/
8174 ! save imax_sv, jmax_sv, wlon_sv, rnlat_sv, kpds1_sv
8175 ! &, rlngrb, rltgrb
8176 !
8177  iret = 0
8178 !
8179  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' in fixrdc for mon=',mon
8180  &,' fngrib=',trim(fngrib)
8181 !
8182  close(lugb)
8183  call baopenr(lugb,fngrib,iret)
8184  if (iret .ne. 0) then
8185  write(6,*) ' error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
8186  print *,'error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
8187  call abort
8188  endif
8189  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' file ',trim(fngrib),
8190  & ' opened. unit=',lugb
8191 !
8192  lugi = 0
8193 !
8194  lskip = -1
8195  jpds = -1
8196  jgds = -1
8197  jpds(5) = kpds5
8198  jpds(7) = kpds7
8199  kpds = jpds
8200  call getgbh(lugb,lugi,lskip,jpds,jgds,lgrib,ndata,
8201  & lskip,kpds,kgds,iret)
8202  if (me .eq. 0) then
8203  write(6,*) ' first grib record.'
8204  write(6,*) ' kpds( 1-10)=',(kpds(j),j= 1,10)
8205  write(6,*) ' kpds(11-20)=',(kpds(j),j=11,20)
8206  write(6,*) ' kpds(21- )=',(kpds(j),j=21,22)
8207  endif
8208  yr2kc = (kpds(8) / 100) .gt. 0
8209  kpds0 = jpds
8210  kpds0(4) = -1
8211  kpds0(18) = -1
8212  if(iret.ne.0) then
8213  write(6,*) ' error in getgbh. iret: ', iret
8214  if (iret==99) write(6,*) ' field not found.'
8215  call abort
8216  endif
8217 !
8218 ! handling climatology file
8219 !
8220  lskip = -1
8221  n = 0
8222  jpds = kpds0
8223  jpds(9) = mon
8224  if(jpds(9).eq.13) jpds(9) = 1
8225  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
8226  if (w3kindreal==8) then
8227  call getgb(lugb,lugi,mdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
8228  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data8,jret)
8229  else if (w3kindreal==4) then
8230  allocate(data4(1:mdata))
8231  call getgb(lugb,lugi,mdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
8232  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data4,jret)
8233  data8 = real(data4, kind=kind_io8)
8234  deallocate(data4)
8235  endif
8236  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' input grib file dates=',
8237  & (kpds(i),i=8,11)
8238  if(jret.eq.0) then
8239  if(ndata.eq.0) then
8240  write(6,*) ' error in getgb'
8241  write(6,*) ' kpds=',kpds
8242  write(6,*) ' kgds=',kgds
8243  call abort
8244  endif
8245  imax=kgds(2)
8246  jmax=kgds(3)
8247  ijmax=imax*jmax
8248  allocate (data(imax,jmax))
8249  do j=1,jmax
8250  jj = (j-1)*imax
8251  do i=1,imax
8252  data(i,j) = data8(jj+i)
8253  enddo
8254  enddo
8255  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'imax,jmax,ijmax=',imax,jmax,ijmax
8256  else
8257  write(6,*) ' error in getgb - jret=', jret
8258  call abort
8259  endif
8260 !
8261 ! if (me == 0) then
8262 ! write(6,*) ' maxmin of input as is'
8263 ! kmami=1
8264 ! call maxmin(data(1,1),ijmax,kmami)
8265 ! endif
8266 !
8267  call getarea(kgds,dlat,dlon,rslat,rnlat,wlon,elon,ijordr,me)
8268  if (me == 0) then
8269  write(6,*) 'imax,jmax,ijmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr,wlon,rnlat='
8270  write(6,*) imax,jmax,ijmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr,wlon,rnlat
8271  endif
8272  call subst(data,imax,jmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr)
8273 !
8274 ! first get slmask over input grid
8275 !
8276  allocate (rlngrb(imax), rltgrb(jmax))
8277  allocate (rslmsk(imax,jmax))
8278 
8279  call setrmsk(kpds5,slmskh,imsk,jmsk,wlon,rnlat,
8280  & data,imax,jmax,rlngrb,rltgrb,lmask,rslmsk
8281  &, gaus,blno, blto, kgds(1), kpds(4), lbms)
8282 ! write(6,*) ' kpds5=',kpds5,' lmask=',lmask
8283 !
8284  inttyp = 0
8285  if(kpds5.eq.225) inttyp = 1
8286  if(kpds5.eq.230) inttyp = 1
8287  if(kpds5.eq.236) inttyp = 1
8288  if(kpds5.eq.224) inttyp = 1
8289  if (me .eq. 0) then
8290  if(inttyp.eq.1) print *, ' nearest grid point used'
8291  &, ' kpds5=',kpds5, ' lmask = ',lmask
8292  endif
8293 !
8294  call la2ga(data,imax,jmax,rlngrb,rltgrb,wlon,rnlat,inttyp,
8295  & gdata,len,lmask,rslmsk,slmask
8296  &, outlat, outlon,me)
8297 !
8298  deallocate (rlngrb, stat=iret)
8299  deallocate (rltgrb, stat=iret)
8300  deallocate (data, stat=iret)
8301  deallocate (rslmsk, stat=iret)
8302  call baclose(lugb,iret)
8303 !
8304  deallocate(data8)
8305  deallocate(lbms)
8306  return
8307  end subroutine fixrdc
8308  subroutine fixrda(lugb,fngrib,kpds5,slmask,
8309  & iy,im,id,ih,fh,gdata,len,iret
8310  &, imsk, jmsk, slmskh, gaus,blno, blto
8311  &, outlat, outlon, me)
8312  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
8313  use sfccyc_module, only : mdata
8314  implicit none
8315  integer nrepmx,nvalid,imo,iyr,idy,jret,ihr,nrept,lskip,lugi,
8316  & lgrib,j,ndata,i,inttyp,jmax,imax,ijmax,ij,jday,len,iret,
8317  & jmsk,imsk,ih,kpds5,lugb,iy,id,im,jh,jd,jdoy,jdow,jm,me,
8318  & monend,jy,iy4,kmami,iret2,jj,w3kindreal,w3kindint
8319  real (kind=kind_io8) rnlat,rslat,wlon,elon,dlon,dlat,fh,blno,
8320  & rjday,blto
8321 !
8322 ! read in grib climatology/analysis files and interpolate to the input
8323 ! dates and the grid. grib files should allow all the necessary parameters
8324 ! to be extracted from the description records.
8325 !
8326 ! nrepmx: max number of days for going back date search
8327 ! nvalid: analysis later than (current date - nvalid) is regarded as
8328 ! valid for current analysis
8329 !
8330  parameter(nrepmx=15, nvalid=4)
8331 !
8332  character*500 fngrib
8333 ! character*80 fngrib, asgnstr
8334 !
8335  real (kind=kind_io8) slmskh(imsk,jmsk)
8336 !
8337  real (kind=kind_io8) gdata(len), slmask(len)
8338  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: data(:,:),rslmsk(:,:)
8339  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: data8(:)
8340  real (kind=kind_io4), allocatable :: data4(:)
8341  real (kind=kind_io8), allocatable :: rlngrb(:), rltgrb(:)
8342 !
8343  logical lmask, yr2kc, gaus, ijordr
8344  logical*1 lbms(mdata)
8345 !
8346  integer kpds(1000),kgds(1000)
8347  integer jpds(1000),jgds(1000), kpds0(1000)
8348  real (kind=kind_io8) outlat(len), outlon(len)
8349 !
8350 ! dayhf : julian day of the middle of each month
8351 !
8352  real (kind=kind_io8) dayhf(13)
8353  data dayhf/ 15.5, 45.0, 74.5,105.0,135.5,166.0,
8354  & 196.5,227.5,258.0,288.5,319.0,349.5,380.5/
8355 !
8356 ! mjday : number of days in a month
8357 !
8358  integer mjday(12)
8359  data mjday/31,28,31,30,31,30,31,31,30,31,30,31/
8360 !
8361  real (kind=kind_io8) fha(5)
8362  real(4) fha4(5)
8363  integer ida(8),jda(8)
8364 !
8365  allocate(data8(1:mdata))
8366  iret = 0
8367  monend = 9999
8368 !
8369 ! compute jy,jm,jd,jh of forecast and the day of the year
8370 !
8371  iy4=iy
8372  if(iy.lt.101) iy4=1900+iy4
8373  fha=0
8374  ida=0
8375  jda=0
8376  fha(2)=nint(fh)
8377  ida(1)=iy
8378  ida(2)=im
8379  ida(3)=id
8380  ida(5)=ih
8381  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
8382  if(w3kindreal==4) then
8383  fha4=fha
8384  call w3movdat(fha4,ida,jda)
8385  else
8386  call w3movdat(fha,ida,jda)
8387  endif
8388  jy=jda(1)
8389  jm=jda(2)
8390  jd=jda(3)
8391  jh=jda(5)
8392 ! if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' forecast jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday=',
8393 ! & jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday
8394  jdow = 0
8395  jdoy = 0
8396  jday = 0
8397  call w3doxdat(jda,jdow,jdoy,jday)
8398  rjday=jdoy+jda(5)/24.
8399  if(rjday.lt.dayhf(1)) rjday=rjday+365.
8400 
8401  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' forecast jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday=',
8402  & jy,jm,jd,jh,rjday
8403 !
8404  if (me .eq. 0) then
8405  write(6,*) 'forecast jy,jm,jd,jh=',jy,jm,jd,jh
8406 !
8407  write(6,*) ' '
8408  write(6,*) '************************************************'
8409  endif
8410 !
8411  close(lugb)
8412  call baopenr(lugb,fngrib,iret)
8413  if (iret .ne. 0) then
8414  write(6,*) ' error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
8415  print *,'error in opening file ',trim(fngrib)
8416  call abort
8417  endif
8418  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' file ',trim(fngrib),
8419  & ' opened. unit=',lugb
8420 !
8421  lugi = 0
8422 !
8423  lskip=-1
8424  jpds=-1
8425  jgds=-1
8426  jpds(5)=kpds5
8427  kpds = jpds
8428  call getgbh(lugb,lugi,lskip,jpds,jgds,lgrib,ndata,
8429  & lskip,kpds,kgds,iret)
8430  if (me .eq. 0) then
8431  write(6,*) ' first grib record.'
8432  write(6,*) ' kpds( 1-10)=',(kpds(j),j= 1,10)
8433  write(6,*) ' kpds(11-20)=',(kpds(j),j=11,20)
8434  write(6,*) ' kpds(21- )=',(kpds(j),j=21,22)
8435  endif
8436  yr2kc = (kpds(8) / 100) .gt. 0
8437  kpds0=jpds
8438  kpds0(4)=-1
8439  kpds0(18)=-1
8440  if(iret.ne.0) then
8441  write(6,*) ' error in getgbh. iret: ', iret
8442  if(iret==99) write(6,*) ' field not found.'
8443  call abort
8444  endif
8445 !
8446 ! handling analysis file
8447 !
8448 ! find record for the given hour/day/month/year
8449 !
8450  nrept=0
8451  jpds=kpds0
8452  lskip = -1
8453  iyr=jy
8454  if(iyr.le.100) iyr=2050-mod(2050-iyr,100)
8455  imo=jm
8456  idy=jd
8457  ihr=jh
8458 ! year 2000 compatible data
8459  if (yr2kc) then
8460  jpds(8) = iyr
8461  else
8462  jpds(8) = mod(iyr,1900)
8463  endif
8464  50 continue
8465  jpds( 8)=mod(iyr-1,100)+1
8466  jpds( 9)=imo
8467  jpds(10)=idy
8468 ! jpds(11)=ihr
8469  jpds(21)=(iyr-1)/100+1
8470  call w3kind(w3kindreal,w3kindint)
8471  if (w3kindreal == 8) then
8472  call getgb(lugb,lugi,mdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
8473  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data8,jret)
8474  elseif (w3kindreal == 4) then
8475  allocate (data4(1:mdata))
8476  call getgb(lugb,lugi,mdata,lskip,jpds,jgds,ndata,lskip,
8477  & kpds,kgds,lbms,data4,jret)
8478  data8 = real(data4, kind=kind_io8)
8479  deallocate(data4)
8480  endif
8481  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' input grib file dates=',
8482  & (kpds(i),i=8,11)
8483  if(jret.eq.0) then
8484  if(ndata.eq.0) then
8485  write(6,*) ' error in getgb'
8486  write(6,*) ' kpds=',kpds
8487  write(6,*) ' kgds=',kgds
8488  call abort
8489  endif
8490  imax=kgds(2)
8491  jmax=kgds(3)
8492  ijmax=imax*jmax
8493  allocate (data(imax,jmax))
8494  do j=1,jmax
8495  jj = (j-1)*imax
8496  do i=1,imax
8497  data(i,j) = data8(jj+i)
8498  enddo
8499  enddo
8500  else
8501  if(nrept.eq.0) then
8502  if (me .eq. 0) then
8503  write(6,*) ' no matching dates found. start searching',
8504  & ' nearest matching dates (going back).'
8505  endif
8506  endif
8507 !
8508 ! no matching ih found. search nearest hour
8509 !
8510  if(ihr.eq.6) then
8511  ihr=0
8512  go to 50
8513  elseif(ihr.eq.12) then
8514  ihr=0
8515  go to 50
8516  elseif(ihr.eq.18) then
8517  ihr=12
8518  go to 50
8519  elseif(ihr.eq.0.or.ihr.eq.-1) then
8520  idy=idy-1
8521  if(idy.eq.0) then
8522  imo=imo-1
8523  if(imo.eq.0) then
8524  iyr=iyr-1
8525  if(iyr.lt.0) iyr=99
8526  imo=12
8527  endif
8528  idy=31
8529  if(imo.eq.4.or.imo.eq.6.or.imo.eq.9.or.imo.eq.11) idy=30
8530  if(imo.eq.2) then
8531  if(mod(iyr,4).eq.0) then
8532  idy=29
8533  else
8534  idy=28
8535  endif
8536  endif
8537  endif
8538  ihr=-1
8539  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) ' decremented dates=',
8540  & iyr,imo,idy,ihr
8541  nrept=nrept+1
8542  if(nrept.gt.nvalid) iret=-1
8543  if(nrept.gt.nrepmx) then
8544  if (me .eq. 0) then
8545  write(6,*) ' <warning:cycl> searching range exceeded.'
8546  &, ' may be wrong grib file given'
8547  write(6,*) ' <warning:cycl> fngrib=',trim(fngrib)
8548  write(6,*) ' <warning:cycl> terminating search and',
8549  & ' and setting gdata to -999'
8550  write(6,*) ' range max=',nrepmx
8551  endif
8552 ! imax=kgds(2)
8553 ! jmax=kgds(3)
8554 ! ijmax=imax*jmax
8555 ! do ij=1,ijmax
8556 ! data(ij)=0.
8557 ! enddo
8558  go to 100
8559  endif
8560  go to 50
8561  else
8562  if (me .eq. 0) then
8563  write(6,*) ' search of analysis for ihr=',ihr,' failed.'
8564  write(6,*) ' kpds=',kpds
8565  write(6,*) ' iyr,imo,idy,ihr=',iyr,imo,idy,ihr
8566  endif
8567  go to 100
8568  endif
8569  endif
8570 !
8571  80 continue
8572 ! if (me == 0) then
8573 ! write(6,*) ' maxmin of input as is'
8574 ! kmami=1
8575 ! call maxmin(data(1,1),ijmax,kmami)
8576 ! endif
8577 !
8578  call getarea(kgds,dlat,dlon,rslat,rnlat,wlon,elon,ijordr,me)
8579  if (me == 0) then
8580  write(6,*) 'imax,jmax,ijmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr,wlon,rnlat='
8581  write(6,*) imax,jmax,ijmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr,wlon,rnlat
8582  endif
8583  call subst(data,imax,jmax,dlon,dlat,ijordr)
8584 !
8585 ! first get slmask over input grid
8586 !
8587  allocate (rlngrb(imax), rltgrb(jmax))
8588  allocate (rslmsk(imax,jmax))
8589  call setrmsk(kpds5,slmskh,imsk,jmsk,wlon,rnlat,
8590  & data,imax,jmax,rlngrb,rltgrb,lmask,rslmsk
8591 ! & data,imax,jmax,abs(dlon),abs(dlat),lmask,rslmsk
8592 !cggg &, gaus,blno, blto, kgds(1))
8593  &, gaus,blno, blto, kgds(1), kpds(4), lbms)
8594 
8595 ! write(6,*) ' kpds5=',kpds5,' lmask=',lmask
8596 !
8597  inttyp = 0
8598  if(kpds5.eq.225) inttyp = 1
8599  if(kpds5.eq.230) inttyp = 1
8600  if(kpds5.eq.66) inttyp = 1
8601  if(inttyp.eq.1) print *, ' nearest grid point used'
8602 !
8603  call la2ga(data,imax,jmax,rlngrb,rltgrb,wlon,rnlat,inttyp,
8604  & gdata,len,lmask,rslmsk,slmask
8605  &, outlat, outlon, me)
8606 !
8607  deallocate (rlngrb, stat=iret)
8608  deallocate (rltgrb, stat=iret)
8609  deallocate (data, stat=iret)
8610  deallocate (rslmsk, stat=iret)
8611  call baclose(lugb,iret2)
8612 ! write(6,*) ' '
8613  deallocate(data8)
8614  return
8615 !
8616  100 continue
8617  iret=1
8618  do i=1,len
8619  gdata(i) = -999.
8620  enddo
8621 !
8622  call baclose(lugb,iret2)
8623 !
8624  deallocate(data8)
8625  return
8626  end subroutine fixrda
8627  subroutine snodpth2(glacir,snwmax,snoanl, len, me)
8628  use machine , only : kind_io8,kind_io4
8629  implicit none
8630  integer i,me,len
8631  real (kind=kind_io8) snwmax
8632 !
8633  real (kind=kind_io8) snoanl(len), glacir(len)
8634 !
8635  if (me .eq. 0) write(6,*) 'snodpth2'
8636 !
8637  do i=1,len
8638 !
8639 ! if glacial points has snow in climatology, set sno to snomax
8640 !
8641  if(glacir(i).ne.0..and.snoanl(i).lt.snwmax*0.5) then
8642  snoanl(i) = snwmax + snoanl(i)
8643  endif
8644 !
8645  enddo
8646  return
8647  end
netcdf_err
subroutine netcdf_err(err, string)
Error handler for netcdf.
Definition: utils.f90:32
sfccyc_module
Definition: sfcsub.F:2
machine
Definition: machine_8.f90:2
